column2: If the Defender throws a Special Attack while far away from the Attacker, they gain an indefinite Cruelty, increasing Critical Damage Rating by 10%. Max Stacks: 5.
If the Defender throws a Special Attack while far away from the Attacker, they gain an indefinite Cruelty, increasing Critical Damage Rating by 20%. Max Stacks: 5.
If the Defender throws a Special Attack while far away from the Attacker, they gain an indefinite Cruelty, increasing Critical Damage Rating by 30%. Max Stacks: 5.

Whenever the Defender is Intercepted or their Heavy Attack is Interrupted, they gain an indefinite Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by 50% of their Base Attack. Upon gaining 5 Fury Passives this way, they are all removed and the Attacker gains a Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by 200% of their Base Attack for 10 seconds.
Certain Champions may experience enhanced cranial mass. Please consult a doctor or game developer if effects last longer than 24 hours.
Certain Champions may experience enhanced cranial mass. Please consult a doctor or game developer if effects last longer than 1 month.

Damage taken by the Defender is adjusted based on the length of the fight. •At the start of the fight, the Defender reduces damage taken by 90%. •After 20 seconds, the Defender reduces damage taken by 75%. •After 40 seconds, the Defender reduces damage taken by 50%. •After 60 seconds, the Defender increases damage taken by 100%. The Attacker’s Health is also fully restored. •After 120 seconds, the Defender increases damage taken by 200% for the rest of the fight. Also, the Attacker reduces all damage taken by 25% for the rest of the fight. These effects cannot be affected by Ability Accuracy.

The Attacker’s Well-Timed Blocks place a random Debuff from Weakness, Armor Break, Suppression, or Disorient on the Defender for 13 second(s). Each time the Attacker Dodges an Attack, place a random Buff from Fury, Armor Up, Power Gain, or Precision on the Attacker for 13 second(s).
#Hero Attackers gain an indefinite Energize Passive when the Defender activates a Special Attack, increasing Combat Power Rate by 200%. This Energize is removed when the Attacker's Combo falls to 0.

#Villain Attackers gain an indefinite Energize Passive when the Defender activates a Special Attack, increasing Combat Power Rate by 200%. This Energize is removed when the Attacker's Combo falls to 0.
The Champion has been practicing the fighting styles of others. In this fight, he has the abilities of Ghost.
The Champion has been practicing the fighting styles of others. In this fight, he has the abilities of Hercules, except Bleed and Poison Resistance.
The Champion has been practicing the fighting styles of others. In this fight, he has the abilities of Juggernaut.
The Champion has been practicing the fighting styles of others. In this fight, he has the abilities of Red Guardian, except Buff Immunity.
The Champion has been practicing the fighting styles of others. In this fight, he has the abilities of Shang-Chi.
The Champion has been practicing the fighting styles of others. In this fight, he has the abilities of Sunspot, except Incinerate Immunity.

Every 16 seconds the Defender gains a Protection Passive, reducing all incoming damage by 20%. All Protection Passives are removed whenever the Defender is struck by a Striker while they are inflicted with a Heal Block effect. While the Defender does not have one of these Protection Passives, the Attacker gains 50% of their base Attack Rating.

Every 14 seconds the Defender gains a Protection Passive, reducing all incoming damage by 20%. All Protection Passives are removed whenever the Defender is struck by a Striker while they are inflicted with a Heal Block effect. While the Defender does not have one of these Protection Passives, the Attacker gains 50% of their base Attack Rating.

Every 12 seconds the Defender gains a Protection Passive, reducing all incoming damage by 20%. All Protection Passives are removed whenever the Defender is struck by a Striker while they are inflicted with a Heal Block effect. While the Defender does not have one of these Protection Passives, the Attacker gains 50% of their base Attack Rating.
The Defender is immune to effects that alter Ability Power Rate, including Petrify.
The Defender's Abilities have been altered and improved by the chaotic energy of the Abyss.

Science Attackers reduce the potency of the Defender's Poison effects by 85%. Additionally, whenever a Science Attacker Dodges an attack or performs a Well-Timed block all their Poison Debuffs and Passives are removed.
Every 5 second(s) the Attacker is inflicted with a Debuff in the order of Weakness, Disorient, Armor Break and then Special Lock before repeating, each lasting 10 second(s).

Every 5 hits on their Combo Meter, Mutant Attackers Purify all Bleed, Incinerate, and Coldsnap Debuffs currently on them. Any Debuffs Purified this way provide the Attacker with 10% of a Bar of Power.
The Defender takes 20% reduced damage from all sources except Special Attacks, Heavy Attacks and Unblockable Attacks.
The Defender takes 50% reduced damage from all sources except Special Attacks, Heavy Attacks and Unblockable Attacks.
The Defender takes 70% reduced damage from all sources except Special Attacks, Heavy Attacks and Unblockable Attacks.
Poison Debuffs and Passives deal 25% more damage to the Defender, and they take 90% less damage from all sources unless they are inflicted with a Poison Debuff or Passive.
Each time the Defender is inflicted with a Poison they gain a Passive Fury increasing Attack Rating by 15%. Max stacks 20.
Every 7 seconds the next Poison inflicted on the Attacker grants them a Passive Fury increasing Attack Rating by 20%.
When the Defender’s attacks are Blocked while the Attacker has a Power Sting effect there is a 25% chance to inflict the Attacker with a 100% Retribution Debuff for 20 seconds.
When the Defender’s attacks are Blocked while the Attacker has a Power Sting effect there is a 50% chance to inflict the Attacker with a 100% Retribution Debuff for 20 seconds.

At the start of the fight, the Attacker's Block Proficiency decays to 0 over 60 seconds. At zero the Defender becomes Passively Unblockable. The Attacker's Block Proficiency resets to full whenever they activate a Striker.

At the start of the fight, the Attacker's Block Proficiency decays to 0 over 30 seconds. At zero the Defender becomes Passively Unblockable. The Attacker's Block Proficiency resets to full whenever they activate a Striker.

At the start of the fight, the Attacker's Block Proficiency decays to 0 over 15 seconds. At zero the Defender becomes Passively Unblockable. The Attacker's Block Proficiency resets to full whenever they activate a Striker.
While the Defender has a Pursuit Passive active, the Attacker is inflicted with a Fear Passive.
The Defender is Immune to Heal Block. Every time the Defender is struck, they have a 70% chance to Passively Regenerate 70% of the hit damage received over 3 seconds.
The effects of Quest and Battlegrounds Nodes cannot have their Ability Accuracy modified.
Each time a Fury Buff is gained, gain an indefinite 10% Intensify Buff. Max stacks: 5.

When the Defender is struck, they gain either an indefinite +4% Physical Resistance or Energy Resistance Buff. The type of Buff gained cycles every 8 seconds, starting with Physical Resistance, and only one can be gained per cycle.

When the Defender is struck, they gain either an indefinite +4% Physical Resistance or Energy Resistance Passive. The type of Passive gained cycles every 8 seconds, starting with Physical Resistance, and only one can be gained per cycle.

All of the Attacker's Special Attacks and Basic Attacks are overridden to be Contact Attacks and to deal only Physical Damage or only Energy Damage. The Attacker starts with Physical Damage and whenever the Attacker knocks the Defender down with a Heavy Attack, this damage override cycles.
The Defender takes 90% reduced damage from all sources except Special Attacks. While performing a Special Attack the Attacker gains +200% Attack Rating for each bar of Power spent.
The Defender stores 20% of damage taken as Adrenaline.
The Defender stores 30% of damage taken as Adrenaline.
The Defender stores 40% of damage taken as Adrenaline.
When taking damage, a portion of the Health Bar remains for a short duration. Landing attacks regain some of that Health.
At the start of the fight and whenever they are knocked down, the Defender gains a non-stacking 70% Stimulate Passive for 4 seconds.
At the start of the fight and whenever they are knocked down, the Defender gains a non-stacking 70% Stimulate Passive for 8 seconds.
At the start of the fight and whenever they are knocked down, the Defender gains a non-stacking 70% Stimulate Passive for 12 seconds.
The Attacker gains up to 100% Damage Reduction at all times, scaling with their current Adrenaline. Adrenaline is gained after being Struck.

When the Defender activates a Special Attack, they gain a Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by 1,000% for 20 second(s). This Fury starts paused and unpauses after the Special Attack has finished. For every Debuff on the Defender when they activate a Special, the Fury's duration is reduced by 4 second(s) to a minimum of 1. When this Fury expires, the Defender takes a burst of Damage equal to 200% of the Attacker's Attack.
If Guardian is affected by a Debuff, Force Field Charges are gained an additional 6 second(s) faster.
Whenever a Debuff is Purified, removed, or expires on the Defender, they immediately gain 5% of a Bar of Power. This does not trigger when a Debuff is prevented by Immunity.
Whenever a Debuff is Purified, removed, or expires on the Defender, they immediately gain 10% of a Bar of Power. This does not trigger when a Debuff is prevented by Immunity.
Whenever a Debuff is Purified, removed, or expires on the Defender, they immediately gain 15% of a Bar of Power. This does not trigger when a Debuff is prevented by Immunity.
Whenever a Debuff is Purified, removed, or expires on the Defender, they immediately gain 20% of a Bar of Power. This does not trigger when a Debuff is prevented by Immunity.
The Defender begins with 2 Indestructible charges. Each Heavy Attack strike against the Defender removes 1 charge.
The Defender begins with 4 Indestructible charges. Each Heavy Attack strike against the Defender removes 1 charge.
The Defender begins with 6 Indestructible charges. Each Heavy Attack strike against the Defender removes 1 charge.
The Defender begins with 1 Indestructible charges. Intercepting the Defender's Attack removes 1 charge.
The Defender begins with 2 Indestructible charges. Intercepting the Defender's Attack removes 1 charge.
The Defender begins with 3 Indestructible charges. Intercepting the Defender's Attack removes 1 charge.
While the Defender’s back is against the wall, the Attacker takes 25% of the Defender’s Base Attack as Direct Damage when they strike the Defender with Contact attacks.
While the Attacker is suffering from a Debuff their Defensive Ability Accuracy is reduced by -50%.
Every 2 seconds, the Defender gains an indefinite +50% Armor Up Passive. When they are struck, reset the timer and remove a stack.
Every 2 seconds, the Defender gains an indefinite +150% Cruelty Passive. When they are struck, reset the timer and remove a stack.
Every 2 seconds, the Defender gains an indefinite +50% Fury Passive. When they are struck, reset the timer and remove a stack.
Every 2 seconds, the Defender gains an indefinite +25% Precision Passive. When they are struck, reset the timer and remove a stack.
Every 2 seconds, the Defender gains an indefinite +50% Prowess Passive. When they are struck, reset the timer and remove a stack.
Every 2 seconds, the Defender gains an indefinite Regeneration Passive that heals for 0.25% of their Max Health every second. When they are struck, reset the timer and remove a stack.
Scytalis' Corrupted Armor gains a 50% chance to reflect incoming Stun effects. This effect is disabled while Scytalis is under the effect of an Armor Break Debuff.

The Attacker starts with 6 Light Charge(s), 6 Medium Charge(s), and 3 Heavy Charge(s). A Charge is removed whenever the Attacker lands a corresponding Attack, and all Charges are reset when the Attacker lands a Special Attack. When any Charge reaches 0, the Defender reduces the duration of Stuns by 20% every 4 seconds until Charges are reset.
The Attacker cannot gain Buffs and the Defender cannot be inflicted with any Debuffs.

Increase Attackers Ability Accuracy by a Flat 10% and increase the potency of all “Attack Enhancement” Hacks by 50%. If the Attacker has a Relic equipped, double the Potency of effects granted by this Hack.

Attackers gain 10% increased Buff and Debuff Duration and increase the potency of all “Reinforcement” Hacks by 30%. If the Attacker has a Relic equipped, double the Potency of effects granted by this Hack.
A bundle of Masteries commonly used on AvA Defense, updated with Despair, Unfazed, and Deep Wounds
A bundle of Masterys commonly used on AvA Defense

Every 7 seconds the Attacker is inflicted with a Shock Debuff dealing 10% of the Defender's Attack Rating as Energy Damage over 20 seconds. Each of the Attacker's Well-Timed Blocks converts 1 Shock Debuff into an Energy Resistance Buff, increasing Energy Resistance by 10% for 20 seconds.

Every 5 seconds the Attacker is inflicted with a Shock Debuff dealing 10% of the Defender's Attack Rating as Energy Damage over 20 seconds. Each of the Attacker's Well-Timed Blocks converts 1 Shock Debuff into an Energy Resistance Buff, increasing Energy Resistance by 10% for 20 seconds.

Every 3 seconds the Attacker is inflicted with a Shock Debuff dealing 10% of the Defender's Attack Rating as Energy Damage over 20 seconds. Each of the Attacker's Well-Timed Blocks converts 1 Shock Debuff into an Energy Resistance Buff, increasing Energy Resistance by 10% for 20 seconds.

If the Attacker ends a Combo differently than last used, they gain a 20% Prowess Buff for 12 seconds. When striking, the Attacker has a 10% chance per Prowess effect on them to be Passively Unblockable for their hit, this can trigger through Block. If the Attacking Champion has a Relic Equipped, double the chance to go Unblockable.
The Defender cannot heal above the amount of Health they started the fight with.
Female Attackers gain +25% Attack Rating. Additionally, the effects from Class Advantage are 50% more potent.
Break the normal limitations of a Genetic Memory with perfect recollection of up to 20 effects.
All Attacker classes but Science and Mystic reduce their Attack by 50%.
All Champion classes but Mystic reduce their Base Attack by 50%.
All Attacker classes but Tech and Mystic reduce their Attack by 50%.
Tech and Mystic Attackers gain 25% Attack Rating.
All Attacker classes but Skill and Mystic reduce their Attack by 50%.
Fury effects on the Attacker are 25% more potent, but the Defender takes 30% less damage from all sources unless the Attacker has a Fury effect active.
Fury effects on the Attacker are 25% more potent, but the Defender takes 50% less damage from all sources unless the Attacker has a Fury effect active.
Fury effects on the Attacker are 25% more potent, but the Defender takes 75% less damage from all sources unless the Attacker has a Fury effect active.
Fury effects on the Attacker are 25% more potent, but the Defender takes 90% less damage from all sources unless the Attacker has a Fury effect active.
The Attacker's damage-per-hit is capped at 1.5% of the Defender's maximum Health.
The Defender's Special 3 is enabled and gains 800% additional Attack Rating.
The Attacker’s Immortality and Indestructible Buffs have their durations reduced by 1,000%, and the Willpower Mastery has its potency reduced by 50%.

The Defender starts with a number of Vengeance charges equal to the Attacker’s Challenge Rating. The Defender loses a Vengeance charge every second. This timer is paused during either Champion’s Special Attacks or while a Striker is attacking. Each time a Striker is activated by the Attacker, the Defender gains 6 Vengeance charges. Effects that reduce the Ability Accuracy of all abilities cannot reduce the Defender's Abilities below 50% Ability Accuracy unless the Attacker has Class Advantage. While the Defender has half of their starting Vengeance Charges or less, they gain +200% Attack Rating, effects that reduce the Ability Accuracy of all abilities cannot reduce the Defender's Ability Accuracy unless the Attacker has Class Advantage, and the Attacker is Passively Rooted during the Defender’s Special Attacks. While the Defender has 0 Vengeance Charges, they are Stun Immune, Immune to all forms of Power manipulation, Passively Unblockable, and they gain 15% of a Bar of Power every second while the Attacker is not within striking distance.
Each time the Attacker gains an Unstoppable Buff, the Attacker gains an Extend Passive, extending the duration of all Buffs by 10% for 30 seconds.

Each time a Mutant Attacker knocks the Defender down with a Heavy Attack, the Attacker gains an Unblockable Buff lasting for 3 second(s), plus 2 second(s) for each Buff on the Attacker. Max duration of 9 second(s).
Sentinel gains Analysis Charges at twice the normal rate, and their attacks deal 1% additional Direct Damage per Charge.

Every 30 second(s), all Buffs on both Champions are Nullified. The Champion with the most Buffs Nullified this way gains a Fury Passive, increasing Attack Rating by 500% and an Unblockable Passive, both lasting for 10 second(s). When the Fury expires, the timer restarts. In the event of a tie, both Champions gain the Fury and Unblockable Passives.
The Attackers Aptitude effects are 25% more potent, and the Defender takes 50% less damage from all sources unless the Attacker has an Aptitude active.
The Attackers Aptitude effects are 25% more potent, and the Defender takes 75% less damage from all sources unless the Attacker has an Aptitude active.
The Attackers Aptitude effects are 25% more potent, and the Defender takes 90% less damage from all sources unless the Attacker has an Aptitude active.
When damaged by a Special Attack and Stark Tech AI is active, this enemy gains 1 bar of Power.
At the start of the fight and then every 20 seconds, the Defender gains a 25% Armor Up Buff and a Regeneration Buff, healing 25% of their Max Health. These Buffs last for 6 seconds.
At the start of the fight and then every 15 seconds, the Defender gains a 25% Armor Up Buff and a Regeneration Buff, healing 25% of their Max Health. These Buffs last for 6 seconds.
At the start of the fight and then every 10 seconds, the Defender gains a 25% Armor Up Buff and a Regeneration Buff, healing 25% of their Max Health. These Buffs last for 6 seconds.

Mystic Attackers steal up to 10% of the Defender's current Power with each hit of their Special Attack, while Science Attackers have a 10% chance to place a Falter Debuff on the Opponent with Well-Timed Blocks lasting 2 Seconds.

Mystic Attackers steal up to 15% of the Defender's current Power with each hit of their Special Attack, while Science Attackers have a 15% chance to place a Falter Debuff on the Opponent with Well-Timed Blocks lasting 3 seconds. Cosmic Attackers have a 50% chance to Nullify all Buffs on themselves when activating a Special Attack.

Mystic Attackers steal up to 20% of the Defender's current Power with each hit of their Special Attack, while Science Attackers have a 20% chance to place a Falter Debuff on the Opponent with Well-Timed Blocks lasting 4 seconds. Cosmic Attackers have a 75% chance to Nullify all Buffs on themselves when activating a Special Attack.
For each Buff on the Defender, Mystic Attackers gain: +25% Ability Accuracy +10% Attack +25% Bleed Debuff Duration +25% Armor Break Debuff Duration +10% Power Rate

Whenever a Mystic Attacker fills a Bar of Power they gain a Passive Fury increasing Attack Rating by 70% for 15 seconds. Nullifying a Buff from the Defender or preventing one from triggering converts all temporary Fury Passives into indefinite ones. Max stacks 5.

At the start of the fight, and at the end of each Champions' Special Attacks, one of the following indefinate effects is randomly applied to each Champion: Fatigue, Armor Break, Weakness, Disorient, Bleed, Shock, Tranquilize, Crush, Precision, Armor Up, Fury, Prowess, Regeneration, Cruelty, Resistance Up, Unblockable.
Both Champions start the fight with an indefinite Fear Passive.

For each Armor up buff on the Attacker, to a max of 5, attacks burn 0% of the Defender's current power. Knocking Down the Defender grants Attackers a 0 second armor up buff granting 0 Armor Rating. Additionally each time the Attacker Power Burns, or Drains the Defender Invalidates 0 Prowess effects from them.

The Attacker’s Basic Attacks have a 40% chance to grant them a +40% Armor Up Buff for 8 seconds. The final hit of the Attacker's Special Attacks deal a burst of Direct Damage scaling with their current Armor percentage. Min: 14% of Attack. Max: 126% of Attack.
If the Attacker is Mystic or has TAGtical Edge, they gain a Cross Charge each time they Nullify an Armor Up Buff, including by Armor Break, or prevent an Armor Up Buff from triggering. Max stacks 10.

Bahamet’s Corrupted Armor cooldown is increased by 9 second(s), but every 10 second(s) the Attacker gains Armor Infection, decreasing the duration of the Corrupted Armor cooldown by 3 second(s). Max 6. When the Attacker intercepts Bahamet or inflicts an Armor Break Debuff, one Armor Corruption is removed.

Each Armor Up effect on the Attacker boosts Special Attack Damage by 15% and count as Prowess effects during Phase 4 - Final Objective. Additionally, when blocking Scytalis' Counter Attack Evade the Attacker is also inflicted with an Armor Break Debuff reducing Armor Rating by 15% for 10 seconds.
When inflicted with an Armor Break Debuff, the Defender gains a Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by +30% for 10 seconds.

When the Defender gains an Armor Up effect, they gain an indefinite non-stacking Power Gain Buff granting 1% of Max Power per second. Whenever the Defender is inflicted with an Armor Break, they are Power Drained for 3% of their Max Power. When any Armor Up effect on the Defender ends for any reason, the Power Gain is removed and the Defender is Power Drained for 33% of their Max Power.

When the Defender gains an Armor Up effect, they gain an indefinite non-stacking Power Gain Buff granting 3% of Max Power per second. Whenever the Defender is inflicted with an Armor Break, they are Power Drained for 3% of their Max Power. When any Armor Up effect on the Defender ends for any reason, the Power Gain is removed and the Defender is Power Drained for 33% of their Max Power.

When the Defender gains an Armor Up effect, they gain an indefinite non-stacking Power Gain Buff granting 5% of Max Power per second. Whenever the Defender is inflicted with an Armor Break, they are Power Drained for 3% of their Max Power. When any Armor Up effect on the Defender ends for any reason, the Power Gain is removed and the Defender is Power Drained for 33% of their Max Power.
While the Defender has a Armor Up Buff active they gain +65% attack rating and they become Passively Unblockable.

Tech Attackers apply 100% of their Armor value to their Attack. Whenever a Tech Attacker activates a Special Attack, they gain a 30% Attack Boost for each Armor Up effect they have active for the duration of the Special.

Tech Attackers apply 75% of their Armor value to their Attack. Whenever a Tech Attacker activates a Special Attack, they gain a 20% Attack Boost for each Armor Up effect they have active for the duration of the Special.

Tech Attackers apply 50% of their Armor value to their Attack. Whenever a Tech Attacker activates a Special Attack, they gain a 10% Attack Boost for each Armor Up effect they have active for the duration of the Special.
Whenever a Tech Attacker activates a Striker, they gain 3 Armor Up Buffs increasing Armor by 30% for 20 seconds. These Armor Ups are paused while the Striker is active.
Whenever a Tech Attacker activates a Striker, they gain 3 Armor Up Buffs increasing Armor by 20% for 15 seconds. These Armor Ups are paused while the Striker is active.
Whenever a Tech Attacker activates a Striker, they gain 3 Armor Up Buffs increasing Armor by 10% for 10 seconds. These Armor Ups are paused while the Striker is active.

Both the Attacker and Defender gain a Passive Fury during their Special Attacks based on the Defender's Power. While below 1 Bar of Power, they gain +25% Attack. While between 1 and 2 Bars of Power, they gain +75% Attack. While above 2 Bars of Power, they gain +200% Attack.
Every 10 Hits on the Attacker's Combo Meter afflicts them with a Falter Passive. Falter causes their attacks to Miss, and lasts 3 second(s). When the Attacker is Struck, Falter is removed.
Every 20 Hits on the Attacker's Combo Meter afflicts them with a Falter Passive. Falter causes their attacks to Miss, and lasts 3 second(s). When the Attacker is Struck, Falter is removed.
Every 15 Hits on the Attacker's Combo Meter afflicts them with a Falter Passive. Falter causes their attacks to Miss, and lasts 3 second(s). When the Attacker is Struck, Falter is removed.
Kate is more likely to activate Special Attack 2 and it is always a Perfect Release.
The Defender starts the fight with 3 indefinite Cruelty Passives, each increasing Critical Damage Rating by 20%. Interrupting the Defender's Heavy Attack transfers 1 Cruelty Passive to the Attacker.
The Defender starts the fight with 5 indefinite Cruelty Passives, each increasing Critical Damage Rating by 20%. Interrupting the Defender's Heavy Attack transfers 1 Cruelty Passive to the Attacker.
The Defender starts the fight with 7 indefinite Cruelty Passives, each increasing Critical Damage Rating by 20%. Interrupting the Defender's Heavy Attack transfers 1 Cruelty Passive to the Attacker.
Every 10 seconds, the Attacker and Defender temporarily switch Health Bars for 4 seconds, and then switch back.
As this Defender activates a Special Attack, their successful hits become lethal for 4 seconds plus 1 additional second(s) for each knocked out member of the Attacker's team.

Whenever this Defender fills a bar of Power, they raise their Attack, Armor, Critical Rating, Critical Resitance, Block Penetration, Combat Power Rate, and Ability Accuracy attributes by 5% for the remainder of the fight.
Once per fight, when this Defender drops below 15% Health, they Regenerate 24% Health over 6 seconds and nearby Attackers Degenerate or Regenerate the inverse amount.
Attackers take Direct Damage equal to 50% Health over 12 seconds, but then Regenerate 50% Health instantly.

At the start of the fight, the Attacker's Block Proficiency begins to decay to 0 over 50 seconds and this Defender is Unblockable against enemies with 0 Block Proficiency. In addition, this Defender gains Unstoppable and Stun Immunity for 6 seconds when activating a Special Attack. The Unstoppable effect is removed prematurely if the player intercepts any Dash or Heavy attack.
Whenever a Skill Attacker activates a Striker, they gain 3 Cruelty Buffs increasing Critical Damage Rating by 30% for 20 seconds. These Crueltys are paused while the Striker is active.
Whenever a Skill Attacker activates a Striker, they gain 3 Cruelty Buffs increasing Critical Damage Rating by 20% for 15 seconds. These Crueltys are paused while the Striker is active.
Whenever a Skill Attacker activates a Striker, they gain 3 Cruelty Buffs increasing Critical Damage Rating by 10% for 10 seconds. These Crueltys are paused while the Striker is active.

At the start of the fight the Defender takes no damage from any source and instead stores it in a Damage Battery. Whenever the Defender is knocked down by a Special Attack, the Battery is emptied and the Defender immediately takes 200% of the damage stored. Whenever the Attacker is knocked down, the Battery is emptied and the Attacker takes 100% of the damage stored.

At the start of the fight the Defender takes no damage from any source and instead stores it in a Damage Battery. Whenever the Defender is knocked down by a Special Attack, the Battery is emptied and the Defender immediately takes 200% of the damage stored. Whenever the Attacker is knocked down, the Battery is emptied and the Attacker takes 150% of the damage stored.

At the start of the fight the Defender takes no damage from any source and instead stores it in a Damage Battery. Whenever the Defender is knocked down by a Special Attack, the Battery is emptied and the Defender immediately takes 200% of the damage stored. Whenever the Attacker is knocked down, the Battery is emptied and the Attacker takes 200% of the damage stored.
If the Defender would be struck by a Basic Attack while suffering from a Stun Debuff, they have a 100% chance to Purify it and Evade the attack.

When the Attacker throws their Striker, they gain an Unblockable Buff for 6 seconds on the last hit of their Striker Attack plus an additional second for each Shock, Bleed, or Rupture effect on the Opponent when this Buff is applied.

#God and #Elder Attackers' damage is reduced by 95%, including Damage Over Time effects. #Robot, #Kree, and #Inhuman Attackers gain an indefinite Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by 95% of Base Attack.
All Attacker classes but Tech and Science reduce their Attack by 50%.
All Attacker classes but Skill and Science reduce their Attack by 50%.
Basic Attacks gain +16% Ability Accuracy and +24% Attack Rating.
Heavy Attacks gain +20% Ability Accuracy and +30% Attack Rating.
Light Attacks gain +20% Ability Accuracy and +40% Attack Rating.
Medium Attacks gain +20% Ability Accuracy and +40% Attack Rating.
Special Attacks gain +20% Ability Accuracy and +20% Attack Rating.
+4% Attack Rating for each Buff on the Attacker.
+4% Attack Rating for each Debuff on the Opponent.
The Attacker gains Attack Rating equals to whichever is higher between their Physical and Energy Resistances.
+8% Attack Rating for each unique Buff on the Attacker.
If the Attacker is #AW: Damage Over Time, while the Defender is inflicted with 0 or more Damaging Debuffs, they become Passively Heal Blocked. New Damaging Debuffs re-apply the Heal Block.
If the Attacker is #Metal, whenever a Damage over Time Debuff is applied to the Defender, remove all Indestructible Buffs created by the Bulwark Defense Tactic.
If the Attacker is #Metal, the potency of their Damage over Time effects is increased by 0% for each Damage over Time effect already on the Defender.
If the Attacker is #Control, the last hit of their Heavy Attack reduces the potency of the Defender’s Power Gain effects by 0% for 0 second(s), stacking up to 0 time(s).
If the Attacker is #Control, their Well-Timed Blocks reduce the Defender’s Ability Power Rate by 0% for 0 second(s), stacking up to 0 time(s).
If the Attacker is #Size: L or #Size: XL and they knock down the Defender, all stacks of Protection from the Defense Tactic are removed.
If the Attacker is #Size: L or #Size: XL, they gain an Unstoppable Passive for 0 second(s) whenever the Defender is knocked down.
If the Attacker is #Villain, their Special Attacks grant them a Bulwark Passive, increasing Block Proficiency by 0 for 0 second(s).
If the Attacker is #Villain, their Well-Timed Blocks do not trigger the Block Penetration Passive from the Siphon Defense Tactic.
If the Attacker is #Defensive, their Well-Timed Blocks grant them 0% Perfect Block chance for 0 second(s), stacking up to 0 time(s).

If the Attacker is #Defensive, their Well-Timed Blocks place a stacking Destructible charge on the Defender. When the Defender activates an Indestructible Passive from the Defense Tactic, both it and 0 Destructible charge are instantly removed. If this occurs during a Special Attack, the Defender will not gain Indestructible Passves for the remainder of the Special Attack.
The Attacker's Attack Rating is increased by 10% of their base Attack.
The Attacker's Attack Rating is increased by 25% of their base Attack.
The Attacker's Attack Rating is increased by 35% of their base Attack.
The Attacker's Attack Rating is increased by 50% of their base Attack.
At the start of the fight, the Attacker gains a Regeneration Passive healing 15% of their Base Health over 25 seconds.
Increase Ability Power Rate by 15%.
+1,000 Armor Rating.
+20% Attack Rating.
+1000 Block Proficiency.
+1,000 Critical Damage Rating.
+1,000 Critical Rating.
+2,000 Energy Resistance.
+1,600 Physical Resistance.
All "Attribute Boost" Hacks gain 200% potency.

Your Striker Gauge fills passively by 2.5% per second and all Attribute Boost Hack nodes have their Potency increased by 150%. If the Attacker has a Relic equipped, Potency is increased by 300% instead.
When the Aura of Ouroboros expires, if neither Champion is performing a Special Attack, Doom regains 6 Will. This cannot cause Doom to have more Will than he started the fight with.
Every 15 second(s) the Defender gains a Power Gain Passive, granting 15% of Max Power over 8 second(s).

The Attacker's Critical Damage is doubled, however if damage from a critical hit exceeds 5% of the Defenders max health or the Attacker lands 4 or more guaranteed crits throughout the fight, the Attacker suffers from an Incinerate Debuff dealing damage equal to their last crit over 5 seconds.

While this Defender is pinned against a wall, they gain a permanent Passive Fury and Passive Armor every 3 seconds. Each Fury increases their base Attack by 10% up to 300%, and each Armor increases their Armor Rating by 100 up to 1,000.

Whenever Science Attackers perform a Well-Timed Block, they apply a Power Sting Debuff to the Defender for 5 seconds. Defenders with Power Sting take 100% of the Attacker's Attack Rating as Direct Damage when activating a Special Attack. The Power Sting duration increases by 25% for every Debuff on the Defender.
While Taunted, the Defender's Defensive Combat Power Rate is reduced by 50%. Superiority: The Attacker's Heavy Attacks inflict a non-stacking Taunt Debuff for 8 seconds.
Whenever a Buff would be triggered by the Attacker, they suffer 25% of the Defenders Attack in damage and are Drained of 25% of their Max Power.
When brought below 50% Health the Defender gains a burst of 20% Power. If a reduction to Ability Accuracy prevents this, the Defender instead recovers 15% Max Health.
When brought below 50% Health the Defender gains a burst of 25% Power. If a reduction to Ability Accuracy prevents this, the Defender instead recovers 20% Max Health.
When brought below 50% Health the Defender gains a burst of 30% Power. If a reduction to Ability Accuracy prevents this, the Defender instead recovers 25% Max Health.
When the Defender's health drops below 30%, every 7 seconds, they gain a Resist Physical Buff and Resist Energy Buff, each of 10% Potency and lasting 14 seconds.
When the Defender's health drops below 30%, every 7 seconds, they gain a Resist Physical Buff and Resist Energy Buff, each of 20% Potency and lasting 14 seconds.
When the Defender's health drops below 30%, every 7 seconds, they gain a Resist Physical Buff and Resist Energy Buff, each of 30% Potency and lasting 14 seconds.
Defeating this Defender grants the Attacker a permanent "Bad Breath" Cross-Fight Ability. "Bad Breath" causes the Attacker to inflict Poison Debuffs on Opponents who are near them.

When the Defender is struck, they have a 20% chance to Nullify a Buff on the Attacker. When Nullify fails to trigger due to chance, gain an indefinite Bait Buff, increasing the chance to Nullify a Buff by a flat 20% each.

Only applies to Mystic Champions. Most useful in "The World for the People." Each time the Attacker fills a Bar of Power they have a 100% chance to Purify all non-damaging Debuffs, if the Defender has more power than the Attacker this extends to all Debuffs. Boost not usable in Battlegrounds.

For each Shock applied to the Defender, it will grant them a dormant charge that can stack up to 5 times. If the Defender throws a Special, all those charges will be converted into Direct Damage, each dealing 15% of the Defender Base Attack to the Attacker.

For each Shock applied to the Defender, it will grant them a dormant charge that can stack up to 5 times. If the Defender throws a Special, all those charges will be converted into Direct Damage, each dealing 20% of the Defender Base Attack to the Attacker.

For each Shock applied to the Defender, it will grant them a dormant charge that can stack up to 5 times. If the Defender throws a Special, all those charges will be converted into Direct Damage, each dealing 25% of the Defender Base Attack to the Attacker.

For each Shock applied to the Defender, Debuff or Passive, the Defender gains an Energy Resistance Passive, increasing Resistance by 40% for 15 seconds.
For each Shock applied to the Defender, Debuff or Passive, the Defender gains an Energy Resistance Passive, increasing Resistance by 60% for 20 seconds.

Whichever Champion lands the first hit will place a Curse on the opposing Champion which deals 0.5% of their current Health as Direct Damage per second. Whenever a Champion with the Curse strikes the other Champion or if the Curse has been on the same Champion for 10 seconds, it passes to the other Champion.

Whenever a Champion with the Curse strikes the other Champion or if the Curse has been on the same Champion for 10 seconds, it passes to the other Champion.

Whenever a Champion with the Curse strikes the other Champion or if the Curse has been on the same Champion for 10 seconds, it passes to the other Champion.

Whenever a Champion with the Curse strikes the other Champion or if the Curse has been on the same Champion for 10 seconds, it passes to the other Champion.

Whenever a Champion with the Curse strikes the other Champion or if the Curse has been on the same Champion for 10 seconds, it passes to the other Champion.
The Defender deals 50% additional damage and has 10% Life Steal as long as the Attacker has a Buff.

This Modifier is disabled by default and is only enabled if the associated Linked Node is removed. Striking her while this Regeneration is active removes it and grants the Attacker 20% of a bar of Power.

For every Armor Up on the Defender, their Combat Power Rate is increased by 15%.
For every Armor Up on the Defender, their Combat Power Rate is increased by 20%.

Whenever the Defender is inflicted with a non-damaging Debuff, they gain an Unblockable Passive for 8 second(s).
Whenever the Defender is inflicted with a non-damaging Debuff, they gain an Unblockable Passive for 10 second(s).

The Defender has a 60% chance to Auto-Block Basic Attacks. This Auto-Block counts as a Well-Timed Block. This goes on cooldown for 8 seconds when the Defender is knocked down. Striking the Defender refreshes the cooldown.

For each Debuff on the Defender, they reduce the duration of incoming Debuffs by 20%.
For each Debuff on the Defender, they reduce the duration of incoming Debuffs by 30%.

When the Attacker fills a Bar of Power, a 10 second timer is started. If the Attacker does not use a Special Attack before the timer expires, they are dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 50% of their max Health.

When the Attacker fills a Bar of Power, a 8 second timer is started. If the Attacker does not use a Special Attack before the timer expires, they are dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 50% of their max Health.

When the Attacker fills a Bar of Power, a 6 second timer is started. If the Attacker does not use a Special Attack before the timer expires, they are dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 50% of their max Health.

DISARMED: The Defender gains a non-stacking Unstoppable Passive for 3 seconds when Dashing, and gain a 5% Fury Passive for 10 seconds when struck.

DISARMED: The Defender Passively Regenerate 90% of any damage taken when struck, and their Special Attacks are Passively Unblockable.

While the Defender does not have a Regeneration Buff, they gain an indefinite Fury Passive every 5 seconds. Each Fury increases the Defender's Attack by 50%, and are all removed if the Defender gains a Regeneration Buff.
When the Defender's Auto-Block fails or when their Auto-Block is broken, gain 1 Force Charge.
While the defender is prevented from recovering health, or dealt damage from a Regeneration effect while their Regeneration Rate is below 0, gain 1 Force Charge.
When one of the Defender's Buffs is Nullified, Staggered, or expires, or when a Buff is prevented by Ability Accuracy or Immunity, gain 3 Force Charges.
When the Attacker is Immune to Nullify, gain 5 Force Charges. When the Attacker is Immune to a Buff, gain 1 Force Charge.

When Punishing or Interrupting the Defender's Special or Heavy Attacks, gain 5 Force Charges.

When striking a Defender suffering from Root, gain 5 Force Charges.

When the Defender is struck, there is a 20% chance to inflict the Attacker with a Bleed Debuff. When the Defender Blocks an attack, there is a 50% chance to inflict a Poison Debuff. Each deals 100% of the Defender's Attack as Direct Damage over 7.5 seconds.

When Striking the Defender's Block, the Attacker has a 20% chance to be inflicted with a Poison Debuff, dealing 15% of the Attacker's Base Health over 7.5 seconds.

The Defender has a 50% chance to inflict the Attacker with Rupture Debuff on contact. This effect will not trigger while the Defender is suffering from an Incinerate Debuff. The Defender also takes 100% reduced damage from Bleed and Rupture effects and gains a Regeneration Buff healing 1% of max health per second until the Bleed or Rupture expires.

The Defender has a 50% chance to inflict the Attacker with Poison Debuff on contact. This effects will not trigger while the Defender is suffering from a Shock Debuff. The Defender also takes 100% reduced damage from Bleed and Poison effects, ignores Regen Rate reduction, and gains a Regeneration Buff healing 1% of max health per second until the Poison or Bleed expires.
Subzero temperatures slowly applies damage over time to Attacker Champions. This Damage increases over the course of a fight.

Attackers increases their attack by 100%, but take 5% of their Max Health as Direct Damage every second. This Damage cannot be prevent or reduced, but Attackers are Immune to all other sources of Damage. #Villains do not recieve any of these effects.
Attackers take Direct Damage equal to 100% of their max Health over 30 seconds, but their Special Attacks deal 500% more damage.
While the Defender is Bleeding, the Attacker's Attack Rating is increased by 200% when landing an attack.

Every 16 seconds the Defender gains a Protection Passive, reducing all incoming damage by 20%. Defender begins the fight with a number of Skirmish charges based on the Attacker's Challenge Rating. When the Defender is struck, blocks an attack or lands an attack 1 Charge is lost. When the charges run out, the Defender will fight more erratically, and gain +100% Attack and Ability Accuracy.

When all Skirmish Charges are depleted, the Defender will gain an equal number of Warfare Charges which are lost in the same way as Skirmish Charges. When they have depleted, the Defender gains 2 bars of Power and becomes permanently Unstoppable and Unblockable, these effects are not affected by Ability Accuracy or any mechanic that would try to remove them.

If the Attacker hasn't landed an attack in 8 seconds, the Defender gains a Rampage Charge until they are struck. Rampage grants +100% Attack rating, causes Skirmish & Warfare Charges to slowly deplete & causes the Defender to fight more aggressively.
Every 9 seconds the Defender gains an indefinite Fury Buff increasing their Attack by 10%. While suffering from a Cowardice effect, the Defender cannot gain new Furies.

Blocking the Defender causes all Frostbites on the Attacker to unpause. Intercepting the Defender's dash transfers all unpaused Frostbites on the Attacker to the Defender.

Blocking the Defender causes all Frostbites on the Attacker to unpause. Intercepting the Defender's dash transfers all unpaused Frostbites on the Attacker to the Defender.

Intercepting the Defender's dash refreshes all Whiplashes on the Attacker. Knocking down the Defender with a Special Attack transfers all Whiplashes from the Attacker to the Defender.

Striking the Defender with a basic attack inflicts a 15 second Whiplash Passive on the Attacker which deals 75% of the Defender's Attack when it expires. Only applies to Tech Champions. Most useful in "Winter Morning." If the Defender is under the effect of a Power Gain Buff, draining their Power below a Power Bar threshold or Draining their Power to 0 deals a burst of 70% of the Attackers base attack as direct energy damage per each active Armor Up Buff. Boost not usable in Battlegrounds.

Each time the Attacker inflicts an Armor Break or Shatter Debuff they gain an Aptitude Buff increasing Fury, Armor Up and Precision buffs by 10% for 10 seconds. While under the effect of this Aptitude, the Attacker gains 5% of a Bar of Power each second.

Each time the Attacker Blocks an attack, their Block Proficiency reduces by 2%. After 10 stacks, the Defender's next attack is Unblockable.

Whenever a Buff is gained, 50% chance to gain another random Buff for 10 seconds. Max stacks: 10. The chance for this to activate decreases by 15% for 8 seconds each time it activates, or 7.5% if a Relic is equipped. This chance decrease ignores Ability Accuracy Immunity and reversal.

Whenever the Defender gains a Buff, the Attacker receives an indefinite Power Drain Debuff, draining 10% of a Bar of Power every 6 second(s). These Power Drains are all removed when the Attacker lands a Special Attack.

Armor Up Buffs gain +50% potency.
Fury Buffs gain +40% potency.
Prowess Buffs gain +80% potency.

Whenever the Attacker activates a Precision Buff while they have an Armor Up Buff active, both are removed and the Attacker instead gains a non-stacking True Strike Buff for 15 seconds allowing them to ignore Armor, Resistances, Auto-Block and all Evade effects.

Whenever the Attacker activates a Precision Buff while they have a Cruelty Buff active, both are removed and the Attacker instead gains a Steadfast Buff for 10 seconds, allowing them to Block Unblockable Attacks.

Whenever the Attacker activates a Precision Buff while they have a Fury Buff active, both Buffs are consumed and the Attacker instead gains an indefinite Prowess Buff increasing Special Attack by 50%.

Every 9 seconds, the Defender gains an Unblockable Buff for 3 seconds.
Every 8 seconds, the Defender gains an Unblockable Buff for 4 seconds.
Every 10 seconds, the Defender gains an Unstoppable Buff for 2 seconds.
Every 9 seconds, the Defender gains an Unstoppable Buff for 3 seconds.
Every 8 seconds, the Defender gains an Unstoppable Buff for 4 seconds.
Armor Up Buffs gain +50% Ability Accuracy and +50% duration.
Fury Buffs gain +30% Ability Accuracy and +40% duration.
This Defender takes 100% less damage while the Attacker has less than 2 Buffs applied to them. These Buffs can be of the same type.
This Defender takes 100% less damage while the Attacker has less than 3 Buffs applied to them. These Buffs can be of the same type.
This Defender takes 100% less damage while the Attacker has less than 4 Buffs applied to them. These Buffs can be of the same type.

When the Attacker triggers a Buff, it is immediately Nullified and the Defender Regenerates 10% of their Max Health. This Ability has a 7 second cooldown.
When the Attacker triggers a Buff, it is immediately Nullified and the Defender Regenerates 15% of their Max Health. This Ability has a 7 second cooldown.

When the Attacker triggers a Buff, it is immediately Nullified and the Defender gains a Regeneration Buff, granting 10% of their Max Health over 7 seconds. This Ability has a 7 second cooldown.
When the Attacker triggers a Buff, it is immediately Nullified and the Defender gains a Regeneration Buff, granting 15% of their Max Health over 7 seconds. This Ability has a 7 second cooldown.

When the Attacker charges their Heavy Attack, they gain a non-stacking Fury Passive that lasts until they take damage. The potency of the Fury increases by 1% per second while the Attacker is charging their Heavy Attack.

Any time the Defender is Stunned, they immediately remove the Stun and gain an Evade Charge which grants a 100% Chance to Evade. Each time a Hit is Evaded 1 Evade Charge is removed. If the Attacker avoids a Basic Attack using the Dexterity Mastery, all Evade Charges are removed, and the Defender is Passively Stunned for 1.5 second(s) per Charge removed.
When the Attacker is fighting as RHINO, JUGGERNAUT or ABOMINATION, every strike has a 30% chance to remove one Buff from the Defender and deal an additional 2% of their total Health in Damage.

While either Champion is Cornered, every 2 seconds the Defender gains a Power Gain Passive, each granting 25% of a Bar of Power over 5 seconds. These are paused while either Champion is Cornered and expire one at a time.

While either Champion is Cornered, every 2 seconds the Defender gains a Power Gain Passive, each granting 35% of a Bar of Power over 5 seconds. These are paused while either Champion is Cornered and expire one at a time.

The Attacker's Combat Power Rate is reduced by 15% for each Buff currently active on them. Additionally each time a Buff is Nullified or Expires off them, they are Power Drained for 25% of their Max Power.
When either Champion Blocks an attack, they are inflicted with a Incinerate Debuff dealing 15% of their Opponent's Attack as Energy Damage over 6 seconds.
When either Champion Blocks an attack, they are inflicted with a Incinerate Debuff dealing 25% of their Opponent's Attack as Energy Damage over 6 seconds.
When either Champion Blocks an attack, they are inflicted with a Incinerate Debuff dealing 35% of their Opponent's Attack as Energy Damage over 6 seconds.
When either Champion Blocks an attack, they are inflicted with a Incinerate Debuff dealing 45% of their Opponent's Attack as Energy Damage over 6 seconds.

Whenever the Defender activates a Special Attack, they gain a Burnout Charge increasing their Special Attack by 10% per Charge. When the Defender has 10 or more Burnout Charges, 10 are removed and the Defender is passively Power Locked for 10 seconds. Whenever the Attacker activates Dexterity for any hit from the Defender's Special Attacks, the Defender gains an additional Burnout Charge.

At the start of the fight and every 10 seconds after, the Defender alternates between having a Basic Evade Passive granting a 100% chance to Evade all incoming Basic Attacks, and a Special Miss Passive granting 100% chance for incoming Special Attacks to Miss.

At the start of the fight and every 15 seconds after, the Defender alternates between having a Basic Evade Passive granting a 100% chance to Evade all incoming Basic Attacks, and a Special Miss Passive granting 100% chance for incoming Special Attacks to Miss.

Whenever the Defender activates a Special Attack, they inflict 1 Petrify Debuff at 25% Potency lasting 5 seconds for each Bar of Power spent.
Whenever the Defender activates a Special Attack, they inflict 2 Petrify Debuff at 25% Potency lasting 10 seconds for each Bar of Power spent.

When the Attacker Dodges back, they are inflicted with a Bleed Debuff dealing 50% of the Defender's Attack Rating as Direct Damage over 6 seconds.
When the Attacker Dodges back, they are inflicted with a Bleed Debuff dealing 15% of the Attacker's Base Health as Direct Damage over 6 seconds.
The duration of the Attacker's Unstoppable effects are increased by 100%, however the Defender takes 75% less Damage unless the Attacker is Unstoppable.
The Defender has a passive 50% chance to Evade all attacks in addition to any base abilities.

Inflicting the Defender with an Incinerate, Coldsnap, or Rupture effect grants the Attacker an indefinite 7% Endurance Passive. Max Stacks: 10.

Whenever the Attacker is inflicted with a Root Effect they are also inflicted with a Passive Disorient, reducing Defensive Ability Accuracy and Block Proficiency by 50% for 8 seconds.

Cosmic Attackers gain a True Accuracy for up to 18 seconds after activating a Special Attack depending on the level of Special Attack used, while Mystic Attackers have a 15% chance to Nullify the Defender's Buffs with each hit. Every 8 seconds the Attacker gains a Cement charge. When the Attacker Blocks an attack a Cement charge is removed. When the Attacker reaches 3 Cement charges, they are all consumed and the Attacker is inflicted with a Root Passive for 4 seconds.

Every 6 seconds the Attacker gains a Cement charge. When the Attacker Blocks an attack a Cement charge is removed. When the Attacker reaches 3 Cement charges, they are all consumed and the Attacker is inflicted with a Root Passive for 4 seconds.

Each time the Defender would gain Power while suffering from Petrify, Enervate, Wither or Suppression Effects, Science Attackers gain a 20 second Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by 10. Max 10 stack(s). This ability has a 0 second cooldown.

Whenever the Attacker activates a Special Attack, they are inflicted with a non-stacking 200% Power Detonation Passive for 8 seconds paused during Special Attacks. A Special Attack that removes Power Detonation will not trigger another one.

Whenever the Attacker activates a Special Attack, they are inflicted with a non-stacking 200% Power Detonation Passive for 6 seconds paused during Special Attacks. A Special Attack that removes Power Detonation will not trigger another one.

While this node is active, "Charged Up" is disabled. Removing this Linked Node will enable it.
Attacks ignore Armor and Evasion with a Combo of 15 or more.

Only applies to Science Champions. Most useful in "The World for the People." Opponents are Petrified for 1 second after they fill a bar of Power, reducing their Regeneration and Power Gain effectiveness by 80%.

Whenever the Attacker Dodges an Attack, both Champions are inflicted with a Heal Block Debuff, a Taunt Debuff lowering their Attack Rating by 10%, and a Disorient Debuff reducing their Defensive Ability Accuracy and Block Proficiency by 10%. These Debuffs last for 7 seconds.

Whenever the Attacker Dodges an Attack, both Champions are inflicted with a Heal Block Debuff, a Taunt Debuff lowering their Attack Rating by 10%, and a Disorient Debuff reducing their Defensive Ability Accuracy and Block Proficiency by 10%. These Debuffs last for 12 seconds.

Whenever the Attacker Dodges an Attack, both Champions are inflicted with a Heal Block Debuff, a Taunt Debuff lowering their Attack Rating by 10%, and a Disorient Debuff reducing their Defensive Ability Accuracy and Block Proficiency by 10%. These Debuffs last for 17 seconds.

Whenever the Defender is struck, they gain an indefinite Armor Up Buff increasing their Armor by 20%. Whenever the Defender activates a Special Attack, they convert all Civil Warzone Armor Up Buffs into Fury Buffs increasing their Attack by 25% for 15 second(s).

Whenever the Attacker activates a Striker, remove 5 Scourge Charges.
Whenever the Attacker performs a Well-Timed Block, remove 2 Scourge Charges.

If the Attacker has the #clarity tag, each hit in the Combo Meter and each Buff gained (other than from the Dexterity Mastery) grants a Clarity Charge. Reaching 10 Clarity Charges consumes them to grant a Clarity Passive for 0 seconds. Max stacks: 5. Each Clarity Passive reduces the Opponent's Critical Resistance by 30%, and prevents the activation of Auto-Block and Evade. These Clarity Passives are paused during the Defender's Special Attacks, and are not affected by Ability Accuracy.

When the Defender finishes a Special Attack, they gain a Debuff Immunity Passive for 4 second(s). The duration of this Debuff Immunity is reduced by 2 second(s) for each Debuff that was active when this effect was applied.

When the Defender finishes a Special Attack, they gain a Debuff Immunity Passive for 6 second(s). The duration of this Debuff Immunity is reduced by 2 second(s) for each Debuff that was active when this effect was applied.

When the Defender finishes a Special Attack, they gain a Debuff Immunity Passive for 8 second(s). The duration of this Debuff Immunity is reduced by 2 second(s) for each Debuff that was active when this effect was applied.

When the Defender finishes a Special Attack, they Purify All Debuffs off themselves, and the Attacker is inflicted with a 100% Tranquilize Debuff for 8 seconds. The duration of this Tranquilize Debuff is reduced by 2 seconds for each Debuff that was active when this effect was applied.
Each time the Attacker knocks the Defender down, all Debuffs on the Attacker are Purified.
Whenever the Defender Blocks an attack, the Defender purifies 1 Debuff off of the Attacker.

While close to the Defender the Attacker Regenerates 3% of their Max Health every second. While far away from the Defender, the Attacker takes Direct Damage equal to 1% of their Max Health every second.

While close to the Defender the Attacker Regenerates 2% of their Max Health every second. While far away from the Defender, the Attacker takes Direct Damage equal to 2% of their Max Health every second.

Whenever a Debuff is Purified or Cleansed off of the Attacker, they take a burst of Degeneration damage equal to 30% of the Defender's Attack.
Whenever a Debuff is Purified or Cleansed off of the Attacker, they take a burst of Degeneration damage equal to 40% of the Defender's Attack.

Gives Tech Champions a field that inhibits enemy Combat Power Rate by 18%.
For each champion of the same class on the Attacker's team, they suffer a Degeneration of 25% of their max health over 15 seconds at the start of the fight.
When the Attacker lands the same type of Basic Attack twice in a row, they are inflicted with a Degeneration Debuff, dealing 60% of the Defender's Base Attack as Direct Damage over 10 seconds.

Whenever the Attacker lands the same type of Basic Attack twice in a row, they are inflicted with a 30% Disintegration Debuff, dealing 60% of the Defender's Base Attack as Direct Damage over 10 seconds.

Whenever the Attacker lands the same type of Basic Attack twice in a row, they are inflicted with a 30% Petrify Debuff for 12 seconds.

Whenever the Attacker lands the same type of Basic Attack twice in a row, the Defender gains a +50% Prowess Passive for 10 seconds.
Whenever the Attacker lands the same type of Basic Attack twice in a row, they are inflicted with a Stun Debuff for 2 seconds.

Regenerate 15% of max health over 25 seconds at the beginning of the fight. Boost Lasts for 3 min. Only usable in Alliance War.

While the Defender has a Combo Shield, they are Passively Unblockable. Whenever the Attacker gains a Prowess, a Combo Shield is removed from the Defender. 15 seconds after this, the Defender gains an indefinite Combo Shield Passive if they have none.

While the Defender has a Combo Shield, they are Passively Unblockable. Whenever the Attacker gains a Prowess, a Combo Shield is removed from the Defender. 10 seconds after this, the Defender gains an indefinite Combo Shield Passive if they have none.

While the Defender has a Combo Shield, they are Passively Unblockable. Whenever the Attacker gains a Prowess, a Combo Shield is removed from the Defender. 5 seconds after this, the Defender gains an indefinite Combo Shield Passive if they have none.
When the Attacker ends a combo with the same attack they ended their previous combo with, the Defender's Combo Meter increases by 10.
When the Attacker ends a combo with the same attack they ended their previous combo with, the Defender's Combo Meter increases by 20.
When the Attacker ends a combo with the same attack they ended their previous combo with, the Defender's Combo Meter increases by 30.

The Attacker gains an indefinite +500 Cruelty Buff for every 10 hits in their Combo Meter. If their Combo Meter is set to 0 when struck, all Cruelty Buffs are removed, each dealing 40% of the Defender's Attack as a burst of Direct Damage.

Only applies to Skill Champions. Most useful in "Winter Morning." Every 10 hits in the Attacker's combo meter grants them a Debuff Immunity Buff for 8 seconds. Boost not usable in Battlegrounds.
Inflicting a Damage Over Time Debuff has a 50% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, reducing Armor Rating by 750 for 5 seconds.

Conduit Defenders Regenerate 0% of energy Damage taken from Hits. While under the effect of a Coldsnap, Shock, Plasma, or Incinerate effect, they Regenerate 0% of any damage Taken. Conduit Defenders cannot have their Regeneration Rate affected.

Every 7 seconds the next Debuff activated on the Defender is immediately Purified. Each time this triggers, the Defender gains 50% of a bar of power.
Every 7 seconds the next Debuff activated on the Defender is immediately Purified. Each time this triggers, the Defender gains 75% of a bar of power.
Every 7 seconds the next Debuff activated on the Defender is immediately Purified. Each time this triggers, the Defender gains 100% of a bar of power.
