This Modifier is disabled by default and is only enabled if the associated Linked Node is removed. The Attacker starts the fight with 15 Parry and 17 Dex Charges. Triggering the corresponding Mastery removes one of the charges. If there were no charges remaining to remove, the Attacker is instead Power and Special Locked for 4 second(s). All charges are restored whenever Time Collapse is triggered, and 7 of each are restored when the Power Lock expires.
While this node is active, "Conquer the Conqueror" is disabled. Removing this Linked Node will enable it.

Whenever the Attacker strikes the Defender, if the Combo Meter does not increase by 5 or more before the Combo string ends, the Attacker is inflicted with an Unsteady Debuff for 6 seconds giving their attacks a 100% chance to Glance.

Whenever the Attacker strikes the Defender, if the Combo Meter does not increase by 5 or more before the Combo string ends, the Attacker is inflicted with an Unsteady Debuff for 8 seconds giving their attacks a 100% chance to Glance.

Whenever the Attacker strikes the Defender, if the Combo Meter does not increase by 5 or more before the Combo string ends, the Attacker is inflicted with an Unsteady Debuff for 10 seconds giving their attacks a 100% chance to Glance.

When the Attacker’s abilities fail to trigger due to reduced Ability Accuracy, they gain a Prowess Buff increasing their Special Attack Damage by 20%. These Buffs stack up to 3 times and last until the end of their next Special Attack.

Whenever the Defender is struck or blocks an attack, there is a 30% chance to inflict the Attacker with a Poison Debuff, dealing 100% of the Defender's modified Attack as direct damage over 10 seconds.
Ægon carries 100% of his Combo Meter between fights.
Whenever a Robotic Attacker would gain a Bleed Debuff, they instead gain an Incinerate which deals 85% of the Defender's attack as direct damage over 5 seconds.
Whenever a damage over time Debuff is applied to the Defender, they gain 100% more power for the duration of that Debuff.
Whenever a damage over time Debuff is applied to the Defender, they gain 200% more power for the duration of that Debuff.
Whenever a damage over time Debuff is applied to the Defender, they gain 300% more power for the duration of that Debuff.
Cosmic Champions receive +20% base Attack. Additionally, adjacency in the Class Wheel grants Mystic Champions +10% base Attack.
Cosmic Champions receive +30% base Attack and Tech Champions receive -10% base Attack penalty. Additionally, adjacency in the Class Wheel grants Mystic Champions +15% base Attack.
Cosmic Champions receive +40% base Attack and Tech Champions receive -40% base Attack penalty. Additionally, Mystic Champions receive +20% base Attack.
Whenever Cosmic Attackers activate a Special Attack, they gain a +40% Fury Buff for the duration of that Special Attack for each Unique Buff on them.
Blasts a portion of remaining Health. Effective against Tech but resisted by Mystic.
Cosmic Attacker's Light Attacks have a 50% chance to Armor Break the Defender, reducing their Armor Rating by 40% for 7 second(s). If the Light Hit was Critical, the chance is 100% instead.

Cosmic Attackers who reach a total of 3 Fury, Armor Up, or Precision Buffs gain an indefinite Aptitude Buff. This Aptitude buff increases the potency of all future Fury, Armor, and Precision Buffs by 50% each time they gain a Fury, Armor Up, or Precision Buff beyond 2. Max stacks 10
Whenever a Cosmic Attacker activates a Striker, they inflict a Panic Debuff preventing Miss or Evade for 10 seconds. Striking the Defender with the first hit of a Heavy Attack refreshes this Panic.
Whenever a Cosmic Attacker activates a Striker, they inflict a Panic Debuff preventing Miss or Evade for 12 seconds. Striking the Defender with the first hit of a Heavy Attack refreshes this Panic.
Whenever a Cosmic Attacker activates a Striker, they inflict a Panic Debuff preventing Miss or Evade for 14 seconds. Striking the Defender with the first hit of a Heavy Attack refreshes this Panic.
Whenever the Attacker attempts to remove a Buff with a Nullify, Fate Seal, or Stagger effect, they are Power Locked 4 seconds.
Whenever the Attacker attempts to remove a Buff with a Nullify, Fate Seal, or Stagger effect, they are Power Locked 6 seconds.
Whenever the Attacker attempts to remove a Buff with a Nullify, Fate Seal, or Stagger effect, they are Power Locked 8 seconds.
Cosmic Attacker's Light Attacks have a 50% chance to Armor Break the Defender, reducing their Armor Rating by 20% for 10 second(s). If the Light Hit was Critical, the chance is 100% instead.
This Defender takes 100% less damage while the Attacker has 2 or more Unique Buffs.
This Defender takes 100% less damage while the Attacker has 3 or more Unique Buffs.
This Defender takes 100% less damage while the Attacker has 4 or more Unique Buffs.
All Cosmic Champions in this Arena receive Fury for the length of the fight, raising Attack by 125%.

Cosmic Attackers: Gaining a Buff places a Crush Charge on the Defender. Max stacks: 6. Dodging back and holding Block for 1.2 seconds converts them into a Crush Passive lasting 2 seconds for each Crush Charge converted. Charges cannot be placed while the Passive is active.

Whenever Doom loses a Countdown Charge, the Attacker gains that Charge. Countdown Charges on the Attacker grant +15% Combat Power Rate but increase damage taken by 20%. When the Attacker activates their Special Attack 2, one Countdown Charge is transferred back to Doom. When Doom regains a Countdown Charge, his Aura of Ouroboros is deactivated and he cannot gain Power for the duration of the triggering Special Attack.

The Defender starts with 4 Special Lockdown Charges, with one being removed when the Defender uses a Special Attack 1. Once the Charges reach 0, the Defender cannot use their Special Attack 1 until they use another Special Attack, after which the Charges reset to 4.

The Defender starts with 3 Special Lockdown Charges, with one being removed when the Defender uses a Special Attack 1. Once the Charges reach 0, the Defender cannot use their Special Attack 1 until they use another Special Attack, after which the Charges reset to 3.

The Defender starts with 2 Special Lockdown Charges, with one being removed when the Defender uses a Special Attack 1. Once the Charges reach 0, the Defender cannot use their Special Attack 1 until they use another Special Attack, after which the Charges reset to 2.

The Defender starts with 4 Special Lockdown Charges, with one being removed when the Defender uses a Special Attack 2. Once the Charges reach 0, the Defender cannot use their Special Attack 2 until they use another Special Attack, after which the Charges reset to 4.

The Defender starts with 3 Special Lockdown Charges, with one being removed when the Defender uses a Special Attack 2. Once the Charges reach 0, the Defender cannot use their Special Attack 2 until they use another Special Attack, after which the Charges reset to 3.

The Defender starts with 2 Special Lockdown Charges, with one being removed when the Defender uses a Special Attack 2. Once the Charges reach 0, the Defender cannot use their Special Attack 2 until they use another Special Attack, after which the Charges reset to 2.
The Defender increases Base Attack by 20% for each hit of the Attacker's Combo Meter.
When the Defender Blocks or Auto-Blocks an attack, they gain an Unstoppable Buff for 0.85 seconds.

Using the Dexterity Mastery to avoid an attack grants the Attacker a Fury Charge, increasing their Attack Rating by 5% per Charge. At 10 Fury Charges all Charges are lost and the Defender’s attacks are Passively Unblockable for 15 seconds. These effects cannot be prevented by Ability Accuracy modification.

Using the Dexterity Mastery to avoid an attack grants the Attacker a Fury Charge, increasing their Attack Rating by 10% per Charge. At 7 Fury Charges all Charges are lost and the Defender’s attacks are Passively Unblockable for 12 seconds. These effects cannot be prevented by Ability Accuracy modification.

Using the Dexterity Mastery to avoid an attack grants the Attacker a Fury Charge, increasing their Attack Rating by 15% per Charge. At 5 Fury Charges all Charges are lost and the Defender’s attacks are Passively Unblockable for 9 seconds. These effects cannot be prevented by Ability Accuracy modification.

Every 10 hits on the Attacker's Combo Meter, Scytalis gains a Cleanse Passive, Purifying the next incoming Debuff. This Cleanse Passive has a 50% chance to re-apply itself if a non-damaging Debuff is Purified.

Whenever the Attacker enters into a Block, they deal 1% of the Defender's Max Health as direct damage to the Defender. Damage done to the Defender is capped at 1%. All of the Defender's attacks cannot be Blocked.
Whenever the Defender uses a contact attack during a Special Attack, the Attacker must Well-Timed Block. If they don't, the Attacker is dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 5% of their Max Health.

Whenever the Defender uses a contact attack during a Special Attack, the Attacker must Well-Timed Block. If they don't, the Attacker is dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 10% of their Max Health.

Whenever the Defender uses a contact attack during a Special Attack, the Attacker must Well-Timed Block. If they don't, the Attacker is dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 15% of their Max Health.
Each time a Cosmic Attacker lands an attack they have a 10% chance for each Armor Break on the Defender to gain an indefinite Passive Fury increasing Attack Rating by 35%. Max stacks 10.

Striking the Defender with a Contact attack puts a Passive Energy Damage over time effect on the Attacker dealing 0.5% of their max health every second for 10 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. Striking the Defender with a Non-Contact attack Removes all stacks.
While under the effects of a Weakness Debuff, 10% of the Attacker's Power is Drained every Second, additionally they suffer 25% of the Defenders Attack as Damage each time they land a Hit.
Every 8 seconds the Defender gains an Unstoppable Buff for 4 seconds, unless they are suffering from a Bleed Debuff or Passive when the timer expires.

Whenever the Defender gains a Bar of Power, the Attacker is inflicted with a 8 second Power Detonation Passive unless the Defender is suffering from a Damaging Debuff or Passive or the Attacker is already inflicted with one of these Power Detonations. The potency of this Passive is equal to 100% of the Defender's Base Attack.
Whenever a Buff, Debuff, or Passive fails to apply to the Attacker due to chance, they are inflicted with Heal Block and Power Lock Debuffs for 2 seconds.
Activating a Striker inflicts a 30 second 50% Debilitate Debuff on the Defender. This Debillitate does not affect Stun Debuffs.
Activating a Striker inflicts a 20 second 35% Debilitate Debuff on the Defender. This Debillitate does not affect Stun Debuffs.
Activating a Striker inflicts a 10 second 20% Debilitate Debuff on the Defender. This Debillitate does not affect Stun Debuffs.

Every 20 second(s), the Attacker is afflicted with a Degeneration Passive, dealing 100% of the Defender's Attack Rating over 6 second(s). If the timer expires while the Attacker is performing a Special Attack 1 or 2, instead of being Degenerated, they gain a Fury Passive increasing their Attack Rating by 200% for 12 second(s). If the timer expires while the Defender is performing a Special Attack 1 or 2, the Attacker is still Degenerated and the Defender gains the Fury Passive instead.

column1: Crit Me Baby One More Time - 1
column2: The Defender takes 30% more damage from Critical Hits, but takes 30% less damage from all sources that are not Critical.

column1: Crit Me Baby One More Time - 2
column2: The Defender takes 30% more damage from Critical Hits, but takes 60% less damage from all sources that are not Critical.

column1: Crit Me Baby One More Time - 3
column2: The Defender takes 30% more damage from Critical Hits, but takes 90% less damage from all sources that are not Critical.
Daredevil (Classic), Daredevil (Hell's Kitchen) and Mutant Attackers' Special 1 deals Guaranteed Critical Hits.
Daredevil (Classic), Daredevil (Hell's Kitchen) and Mutant Attackers' Special 2 deals Guaranteed Critical Hits.

column1: Crit Me To Life - Special Attacks
column2: Daredevil (Classic), Daredevil (Hell's Kitchen) and Mutant Attackers' Special 1 and Special 2 deal Guaranteed Critical Hits.

column1: Crit Me With Your Best Shot
column2: This Defender takes 100% less damage from Hits that are not Critical.
For 7 seconds after she steals or plants her Calling Card, Black Cat’s Critical Hits and Critical Hit based abilities can trigger through her Opponent’s Block.
When the Attacker performs 5 Critical Hits, they gain a 80% Endurance Passive for 6 seconds.
When the Attacker performs 7 Critical Hits, they gain a 80% Endurance Passive for 6 seconds.
When the Attacker performs 9 Critical Hits, they gain a 80% Endurance Passive for 6 seconds.

Whenever the Attacker lands a Critical Hit on the Defender, the Defender gains an Unblockable Charge, making their next Attack Passively Unblockable. Unblockable Charges are consumed whenever the Defender attacks, regardless of whether the Attack hits. Intercepting the Defender removes all active Unblockable Charges, and gives the Attacker a 10 second Passive Precision increasing Critical Rating by 20% per charge removed. These passive effects cannot be prevented by Ability Accuracy modification.
The Attacker's Critical Rating is increased by up to 25%, based on their current Power.
When the Attacker performs an Intercept, they gain a Guaranteed Critical Passive for 7 seconds.

While the Attacker has any Precision effect active, they Passively gain True Accuracy, ignoring Evade and Auto-Block effects. While the Attacker has any True Accuracy effect active, their Damaging Debuffs have 20% increased potency.
When the Attacker ends a Combo with the same attack they ended their previous combo with, the attack has 100% Critical Chance.

If either Champion has not made contact in 10 seconds, the Attacker is inflicted with a Critical Shock Passive dealing 10% of the Defender's Attack Rating multiplied by their Critical Damage Rating as Energy Damage over 3 seconds.

If either Champion has not made contact in 8 seconds, the Attacker is inflicted with a Critical Shock Passive dealing 20% of the Defender's Attack Rating multiplied by their Critical Damage Rating as Energy Damage over 3 seconds.

If either Champion has not made contact in 6 seconds, the Attacker is inflicted with a Critical Shock Passive dealing 30% of the Defender's Attack Rating multiplied by their Critical Damage Rating as Energy Damage over 3 seconds.

#Avengers Attackers gain TAGtical Edge. If the Attacker is Tech or has TAGtical Edge, they gain a Power Drain Charge for 6 seconds whenever they land a Critical Hit. Performing a Medium combo ender consumes all charges and inflicts a Power Drain on the Defender for each charge consumed, each draining 5% of the Defender’s Max Power, unaffected by Ability Accuracy.

Whenever the Defender finishes a Special Attack, unless this timer is already active the Attacker has 10 seconds to knock the Defender down with a Heavy Attack or they are dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 33% of their max Health.

Whenever the Defender finishes a Special Attack, unless this timer is already active the Attacker has 8 seconds to knock the Defender down with a Heavy Attack or they are dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 33% of their max Health.

Whenever the Defender finishes a Special Attack, unless this timer is already active the Attacker has 6 seconds to knock the Defender down with a Heavy Attack or they are dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 33% of their max Health.
An Attacker who enters this fight gains a Cross-Fight Passive Fury for 1 fights.
An Attacker who enters this fight gains a Cross-Fight Passive Precision for 5 fights.

While the Defender has a Combo Shield, they gain a +50% Cruelty Passive. Whenever the Attacker gains a Prowess, a Combo Shield is removed from the Defender. 15 seconds after this, the Defender gains an indefinite Combo Shield Passive if they have none.

While the Defender has a Combo Shield, they gain a +50% Cruelty Passive. Whenever the Attacker gains a Prowess, a Combo Shield is removed from the Defender. 10 seconds after this, the Defender gains an indefinite Combo Shield Passive if they have none.

While the Defender has a Combo Shield, they gain a +50% Cruelty Passive. Whenever the Attacker gains a Prowess, a Combo Shield is removed from the Defender. 5 seconds after this, the Defender gains an indefinite Combo Shield Passive if they have none.

Every 5 Hits in the Attacker's Combo meter inflicts an indefinite 25% potency Power Sting Debuff on them. Activating a Striker removes these Power Stings and grants a 15 second 45% Cruelty Buff for each one removed.

Every 5 Hits in the Attacker's Combo meter inflicts an indefinite 50% potency Power Sting Debuff on them. Activating a Striker removes these Power Stings and grants a 12 second 30% Cruelty Buff for each one removed.

Every 5 Hits in the Attacker's Combo meter inflicts an indefinite 75% potency Power Sting Debuff on them. Activating a Striker removes these Power Stings and grants a 9 second 15% Cruelty Buff for each one removed.

If the Attacker hasn't landed a hit in 6 seconds they receive an Armor Break Debuff, reducing their Armor by 250. If an Armor Break is active on the Attacker when they trigger an Armor Up Buff, that Armor Up is immediately removed. Landing a hit removes an Armor Break and resets the timer.

When a #Crush Defender gains a Bar of Power, they inflict a 10% Daunted Passive for 0 seconds. Max stacks: 12. During Special Attacks, if the Attacker is suffering from 0 or more Daunted effects, they are Passively Rooted. When #Crush Defenders activate a Special Attack, they have a 0% chance per Daunted effect on the Attacker to gain an Unblockable Passive for the duration of the attack. Well-Timed Blocks ignore this Unblockable. These abilities can't be affected by Ability Accuracy.

When a #Crush Defender gains a Bar of Power, they inflict two 15% Daunted Passives for 0 seconds. Max stacks: 12. During Special Attacks, if the Attacker is suffering from 0 or more Daunted effects, they are Passively Rooted. When #Crush Defenders activate a Special Attack, they have a 0% chance per Daunted effect on the Attacker to gain an Unblockable Passive for the duration of the attack. Well-Timed Blocks ignore this Unblockable. These abilities can't be affected by Ability Accuracy.

When a #Crush Defender gains a Bar of Power, they inflict two 20% Daunted Passives for 0 seconds. Max stacks: 12. During Special Attacks, if the Attacker is suffering from 0 or more Daunted effects, they are Passively Rooted. When #Crush Defenders activate a Special Attack, they have a 0% chance per Daunted effect on the Attacker to gain an Unblockable Passive for the duration of the attack. Well-Timed Blocks ignore this Unblockable. These abilities can't be affected by Ability Accuracy.

When the Attacker Dodges back, they gain a Crush Timer for 1.2 seconds. Dodging back again while this timer is active inflicts them with a Crush Debuff for 2 seconds. Won't trigger if Crush is already active.

When the Attacker Dodges back, they gain a Crush Timer for 1.2 seconds. Dodging back again while this timer is active inflicts them with a Crush Debuff for 4 seconds. Won't trigger if Crush is already active.

When the Attacker Dodges back, they gain a Crush Timer for 1.2 seconds. Dodging back again while this timer is active inflicts them with a Crush Passive for 2 seconds. Won't trigger if Crush is already active.

When the Attacker Dodges back, they gain a Crush Timer for 1.2 seconds. Dodging back again while this timer is active inflicts them with a Crush Passive for 4 seconds. Won't trigger if Crush is already active.

Whenever a Science Attacker activates a Striker, the Defender is inflicted with a Stun Passive while the Striker is active and a Crush Debuff lasting 35 seconds. This Crush is paused while the Striker is active.

Whenever a Science Attacker activates a Striker, the Defender is inflicted with a Stun Passive while the Striker is active and a Crush Debuff lasting 25 seconds. This Crush is paused while the Striker is active.

Whenever a Science Attacker activates a Striker, the Defender is inflicted with a Stun Passive while the Striker is active and a Crush Debuff lasting 15 seconds. This Crush is paused while the Striker is active.
Attacker's Buff duration is increased by +25% for #Size: XL Champions.

When the Defender reaches 20 Clairvoyance Charges they are immediately removed and replaced with Death Touch, lasting indefinitely. Death Touch is not affected by Ability Accuracy reduction and can only stack 1 time.
Whenever the Attacker is inflicted with a Power Drain, Burn, or Steal effect, they gain a non-stacking 100% Fury Passive for 15 seconds. Superiority: Fury stacks.
Whenever a Robotic Attacker would gain a Bleed Debuff, they instead gain a Shock Debuff dealing 50% of the Defender's Attack Rating as Direct Damage over 5 seconds.
Defeating this Defender grants the Attacker a permanent "Cyber Hive" Cross-Fight Ability ability. "Cyber Hive" grants all of the Attacker's attacks a chance to Poison and Shock the Opponent.

Only applies to Mystic Champions. Most useful in "The World of Today." When activating any Special Attack, the Attacker has a flat 25% chance for each of their active Debuffs to gain an Unstoppable Buff lasting 6 seconds. Boost not usable in Battlegrounds.
Attackers gain 30% Resistance to Damage over time effects for each Debuff on the Defender.

When the Attacker would perform a Well-Timed Block, Viv gains her Phase Passive if possible. The Attacker's Combo-Ending Attacks consume 1 Solar Energy. If no Solar Energy is consumed within 12 seconds, Viv gains a 100% chance to Evade the next incoming attack. After Evading, this timer restarts.

Every 5 seconds after the start of the fight, an effect will trigger based on the Attacker's proximity to the Defender. •Close: the Defender gains 2 Impending Damage Charges, each increasing damage they take from all sources by 5%. Max stacks: 15. •Far: the Attacker has 2% of their max Health restored and an Impending Damage Charge is removed from the Defender. If the Defender has at least 10 Impending Damage Charges when the timer ends, they take 0.5% of their max Health as direct damage over the duration of the next timer. These effects cannot be affected by Ability Accuracy.
Each Shock applied to the Defender, Debuff or Passive, will grant a burst of 10% of a Bar of Power.
Each Shock applied to the Defender, Debuff or Passive, will grant a burst of 25% of a Bar of Power.
Each Shock applied to the Defender, Debuff or Passive, will grant a burst of 50% of a Bar of Power.
Every 12 seconds, the Defender gains an Unblockable Buff for 4 seconds. If the Attacker is out of striking range when this triggers, the Attacker gains Unblockable for half the duration instead.
Every 12 seconds, the Defender gains an Unblockable Buff for 6 seconds. If the Attacker is out of striking range when this triggers, the Attacker gains Unblockable for half the duration instead.
Every 12 seconds, the Defender gains an Unblockable Buff for 8 seconds. If the Attacker is out of striking range when this triggers, the Attacker gains Unblockable for half the duration instead.
Well timed Blocks against contact attacks have a 100% chance to inflict Degeneration, dealing 90% of Attack as Direct Damage over 3 second(s).
While the Defender is Dashing forward, the Attacker's Attack Rating is increased by 200% when landing an attack.
The Attacker starts with their Spirit Gauge at 50%.
If the Attacker is suffering from at least 15 Daunted effects when the Defender activates a Special Attack, the Special Attack is Passively Unblockable.
If the Attacker is suffering from at least 10 Daunted effects when the Defender activates a Special Attack, the Special Attack is Passively Unblockable.
If the Attacker is suffering from at least 5 Daunted effects when the Defender activates a Special Attack, the Special Attack is Passively Unblockable.

Any time any Champion gains a Bar of Power, the Attacker is inflicted with a 10% Daunted Passive for 10 seconds.
Any time any Champion gains a Bar of Power, the Attacker is inflicted with a 10% Daunted Passive for 12 seconds.
Each time the Attacker reaches a Bar of Power they are inflicted with a Taunt Debuff for 4 second(s).
Each time the Attacker reaches a Bar of Power they are inflicted with a Taunt Debuff for 6 second(s).
Each time the Attacker reaches a Bar of Power they are inflicted with a Taunt Debuff for 8 second(s).
The Attacker starts with their Spirit Gauge full.

The Defender gains Indefinite Fury Passives every 10 seconds increasing Damage by 50%. Remove one Fury Passive from the Defender when they are struck for the first time by a Medium Combo Ender, the final hit of a Heavy Attack, or final hit of a Special Attack. After a Fury Passive has been removed by one of these Attacks they cannot be removed again until reset. Attack actions are reset after completing each one once. Max stacks: 5.

The Defender gains Indefinite Protection Passives every 14 seconds reducing Damage by 30%. Remove one Protection Passive from the Defender when they are struck for the first time by a Medium Combo Ender, the final hit of a Heavy Attack, or final hit of a Special Attack. After a Protection Passive has been removed by one of these Attacks they cannot be removed again until reset. Attack actions are reset after completing each one once. Max stacks: 5.
Well-Timed Blocks from the Attacker start a 5 second timer, if the Attacker Well-Timed Blocks again within this window they will be inflicted with a 100% Falter Debuff for 5 seconds.
Well-Timed Blocks from the Attacker start a 7 second timer, if the Attacker Well-Timed Blocks again within this window they will be inflicted with a 100% Falter Debuff for 5 seconds.
Well-Timed Blocks from the Attacker start a 9 second timer, if the Attacker Well-Timed Blocks again within this window they will be inflicted with a 100% Falter Debuff for 5 seconds.
The Defender has a 30% chance to Evade all incoming Attacks unless the Attacker has a Precision. Whenever the Attacker gains a Cruelty Buff or Passive they gain a 15 second 45% Precision Buff.
The Defender has a 60% chance to Evade all incoming Attacks unless the Attacker has a Precision. Whenever the Attacker gains a Cruelty Buff or Passive they gain a 12 second 30% Precision Buff.
The Defender has a 90% chance to Evade all incoming Attacks unless the Attacker has a Precision. Whenever the Attacker gains a Cruelty Buff or Passive they gain a 9 second 15% Precision Buff.

The Defender takes no damage from any source belonging to the Attacker. Whenever the Attacker inflicts the Defender with 1 or more non-Stun Debuffs, the Defender loses 2% of their Max Health as a burst of Direct Damage. This damage cannot be modified or prevented in any way. Cooldown: 1 second(s).

At the start of the fight and every 30 seconds, Hela gains her personal Fury Buff. Additionally, when gaining a Fury Buff, she gains an Unstoppable Passive for 5 seconds. Hela's Spirits drain at a significantly reduced rate.

While Lady Deathstrike has a Ferocity effect active and when the Attacker Dashes back, Lady Deathstrike gains 1 stacking Contingency Charge for max of 1. When Lady Deathstrike Blocks, remove 1 Contingency Charge instead of removing the Ferocity pause.

While Lady Deathstrike has a Ferocity effect active and when the Attacker Dashes back, Lady Deathstrike gains 1 stacking Contingency Charge for max of 3. When Lady Deathstrike Blocks, remove 1 Contingency Charge instead of removing the Ferocity pause.

While Lady Deathstrike has a Ferocity effect active and when the Attacker Dashes back, Lady Deathstrike gains 1 stacking Contingency Charge for max of 5. When Lady Deathstrike Blocks, remove 1 Contingency Charge instead of removing the Ferocity pause.
Debuffs inflicted by the Defender have +100% duration.
#Mighty Avengers, #Young Avengers, and #Robot Attackers inflict the Defender with an indefinite 10% Debilitate Debuff at the start of the fight.
The Defender's Special Attacks cost 50% less power while the Attacker is suffering from any Debuff.
The Defender's Special Attacks cost 80% less power while the Attacker is suffering from any Debuff.
The Defender's Special Attacks cost 100% less power while the Attacker is suffering from any Debuff.

Whenever the Attacker Blocks or Dodges an Attack they gain 1 Detox Charge, up to a max of 6. If the Attacker reaches Max Detox Charges they will consume all Charges and become Debuff Immune for 0 seconds. Whenever the Attacker throws a Special Attack or a Debuff is applied to them, consume all Detox charges and remove 1 of each Debuff affecting the Attacker.

Whenever the Attacker Blocks or Dodges an Attack they gain 1 Detox Charge, up to a max of 6. If the Attacker reaches Max Detox Charges they will consume all Charges and become Debuff Immune for 5 seconds. Whenever the Attacker throws a Special Attack or a Debuff is applied to them, consume all Detox charges and remove 1 of each Debuff affecting the Attacker.
Armor Break Debuffs gain +40% potency.
Bleed Debuffs gain +40% potency.
Degeneration Debuffs gain +50% potency.
Incinerate Debuffs gain +60% potency.
Power Sting Debuffs gain +50% potency.
Shock Debuffs gain +80% potency.

Whenever the Defender receives an Armor Break Debuff while a Stun Debuff is active, both are removed and the Defender is afflicted with a Cold Snap Debuff dealing 200% of the Attacker's Attack as Energy Damage over 10 seconds. Cold Snap also prevents the activation of Evade.

Whenever the Attacker applies a Bleed Debuff to the opponent while the Defender is suffering from a Stun Debuff, both Debuffs are consumed and the Defender is afflicted with a Poison Debuff dealing 200% of the Attacker's Attack as Direct Damage over 15 seconds, and reducing health recovery by 30%.

Whenever the Defender receives a Stun Debuff while a Weakness Debuff is active, both are removed and the Defender is afflicted with a Power Sting Debuff. An Opponent with Power Sting takes 50% of the Attacker's Attack as Direct Damage when activating a Special Attack.
While the Defender is inflicted with 2 or more Debuffs, the Attacker is Immune to Damage Over Time Debuffs.
While the Defender is inflicted with 3 or more Debuffs, the Attacker is Immune to Damage Over Time Debuffs.
While the Defender is inflicted with 4 or more Debuffs, the Attacker is Immune to Damage Over Time Debuffs.
Damage Over Time Debuffs gain +20% Ability Accuracy and +20% duration.
Degeneration Debuffs gain +50% Ability Accuracy and +50% duration.
Power Sting Debuffs gain +50% Ability Accuracy and +50% duration.
Stun Debuffs gain +50% duration.
Knocking down the Defender with a Special Attack inflicts them with a 10% Debilitate Debuff for 15 seconds.
Knocking down the Defender with a Special Attack inflicts them with a 20% Debilitate Debuff for 15 seconds.
Knocking down the Defender with a Special Attack inflicts them with a 30% Debilitate Debuff for 15 seconds.

#AW: Decay Attackers are immune to Placebo Buffs. Whenever they trigger a Buff immunity inflict a 20% Wither Debuff on the Opponent lasting 8 seconds Max: 5. Attackers gain 35% Resistance to Damage over time effects for each Debuff on the Defender. When the Defender is knocked down there is an 25% chance per Debuff active on them to inflict an 10 second Slow Debuff.
Starts the fight with a Fury Buff against Mutant Champions, granting +15% Attack Rating.
The Defender has indefinite Protection, reducing all damage received by 50%. This goes on cooldown for 15 seconds when the Defender is struck by a Striker.
The Defender has indefinite Protection, reducing all damage received by 75%. This goes on cooldown for 15 seconds when the Defender is struck by a Striker.
The Defender has indefinite Protection, reducing all damage received by 90%. This goes on cooldown for 15 seconds when the Defender is struck by a Striker.
The Defender starts the fight with an Armor Up Buff, granting 1 Armor Rating. If this buff is removed, it returns after 5 seconds.

Special Attacks thrown into the Defender's Block gain +100% Block Penetration and +100% Attack Rating. Superiority: +300% Attack Rating instead, and inflict a 2 second Stun Passive at the end of the Special.

Blocking attacks has a 100% chance to apply a Disorient Debuff to the Attacker, reducing Block Proficiency and Defensive Ability Accuracy by 25% for 12 second(s). The chance is reduced by 50% flat if the Block was Well-Timed. The Attacker can dash back and hold block for 1.2 second(s) to remove one of these Debuffs.
The Defender is more likely to use Heavy Attacks and Dash Attacks.
The Defender is less likely to activate Special Attacks 1 and 2, and far more likely to activate Special Attack 3.
The Defender alternates between a Special 1 and Special 2 bias every 10 seconds, increasing the chance of using the selected Special.
The Defender alternates between a Special 1 and Special 2 bias every 8 seconds, increasing the chance of using the selected Special.
The Defender alternates between a Special 1 and Special 2 bias every 5 seconds, increasing the chance of using the selected Special.
The Defender is more likely to Block and Dodge.
The Defender is 5% more likely to use Heavy Attacks.

The Defender’s attacks have a 30% chance to inflict an Energy Vulnerability Passive, lowering Energy Resistance by 10% for 10 seconds. This can trigger through Block.
The Defender’s attacks have a 50% chance to inflict an Energy Vulnerability Passive, lowering Energy Resistance by 10% for 10 seconds. This can trigger through Block.
Science Attackers gain Immunity to Nullify. Whenever a Nullify or Poison fails to apply to the Attacker due to Immunity, they gain a Fury Passive increasing Attack by 80% for 6 second(s).

The Defender has Protection, reducing all incoming damage by 60%. Hitting the Defender with a Heavy Attack removes the Protection and grants the Attacker a Cruelty Passive, increasing Critical Damage Rating by 30% for 12 second(s). When the Cruelty expires, the Protection returns, and all Debuffs on the Defender are Purified.

The Defender has Protection, reducing all incoming damage by 60%. Intercepting the Defender removes the Protection and grants the Attacker a Fury Passive, increasing Attack Rating by 40% for 12 second(s). When the Fury expires, the Protection returns, and all Debuffs on the Defender are Purified.

The Defender has Protection, reducing all incoming damage by 60%. Knocking down the Defender removes the Protection and grants the Attacker a Fury Passive, increasing Attack Rating by 40% for 12 second(s). When the Fury expires, the Protection returns, and all Debuffs on the Defender are Purified.

Defender gains an energy barrier with 15 charges. Striking the Defender, applying a Bleed effect, or applying an Armor Break effect removes a charge. The Defender is immune to all damage while the barrier has charges remaining. Charges are restored to 15 every 20 seconds.
When the Attacker enters an Effect Area, they are inflicted with a Crush Debuff. This Debuff is removed when they leave the Effect Area.
When the Attacker enters an Effect Area, they gain a Fury Buff increasing their Attack by +50%. This Buff is removed when they leave the Effect Area.
When the Attacker enters an Effect Area, they gain a Power Gain Buff granting 5% of a Bar of Power every second. This Buff is removed when they leave the Effect Area.

If the Attacker enters an Effect Area and stays in it for 2.5 seconds, they gain an indefinite 5% Vigor Passive. Max stacks: 20. This timer will only activate twice per Effect Area entry. If the Attacker has 10 of these Vigor Passives and the Defender is inside the Effect Area, the Attacker’s Special Attack and Striker hits damage the Defender for 1% of their Max Health. The effects of this node cannot be prevented by Ability Accuracy Reduction.
When the Attacker enters an Effect Area, they gain an Unblockable Buff. This Buff is removed when they leave the Effect Area.
When the Defender enters an Effect Area, they gain a Power Gain Buff granting 5% of a Bar of Power every second. This Buff is removed when they leave the Effect Area.
When the Defender enters an Effect Area, they gain an Unstoppable Buff. This Buff is removed when they leave the Effect Area.
When the Attacker moves into an Effect Point, they gain a Grit Passive for 15 seconds.
When the Attacker moves into a Beneficial Effect Point they gain a Regeneration Passive, healing 10% of Max Health over 5 seconds. Cooldown: 25 seconds.
Bleed Effects gain +40% potency.
Gain +15% Regeneration Rate while Blocking.
Degeneration Effects gain +50% potency.
Heal Block effects gain +40% Duration.
Incinerate Effects gain +50% potency.
Poison Effects gain +40% potency.
Power Sting Effects gain +50% potency.
Prowess Effects gain +50% potency.
All Regeneration effects gain +10% Potency and +10% Duration.
Spectre, and Petrify effects gain +40% Potency and +40% Duration.
Shock Effects gain +50% potency.
Gain +15% Regeneration Rate while Unstoppable.
Damage Over Time Effects gain +20% Ability Accuracy and +20% duration.
Degeneration Effects gain +50% Ability Accuracy and +50% duration.
Power Sting Effects gain +50% Ability Accuracy and +50% duration.
Stun Effects gain +50% duration.

Every 15 seconds the Attacker is afflicted with a 10 second 100% Power Detonation Passive. Whenever the Attacker activates a Special Attack, future timers are decreased by 2 second(s) to a minimum of 3 second(s). Intercepting the Defender's Dash Attack pauses these Power Detonations for 7 second(s).

Every 13 seconds the Attacker is afflicted with a 10 second 100% Power Detonation Passive. Whenever the Attacker activates a Special Attack, future timers are decreased by 2 second(s) to a minimum of 3 second(s). Intercepting the Defender's Dash Attack pauses these Power Detonations for 7 second(s).

Every 10 seconds the Attacker is afflicted with a 10 second 100% Power Detonation Passive. Whenever the Attacker activates a Special Attack, future timers are decreased by 2 second(s) to a minimum of 3 second(s). Intercepting the Defender's Dash Attack pauses these Power Detonations for 7 second(s).

Whenever a Mystic Attacker Nullifies a Buff on the Defender, they inflict a Neutralize Passive of 30% potency for 20 second(s). Max 5. Whenever a Buff on the Defender is prevented by these Neutralizes, the Attacker Passively gains 3% of their Max Power.

Whenever a Mystic Attacker Nullifies a Buff on the Defender, they inflict a Neutralize Passive of 25% potency for 15 second(s). Max 6. Whenever a Buff on the Defender is prevented by these Neutralizes, the Attacker Passively gains 2% of their Max Power.

Whenever a Mystic Attacker Nullifies a Buff on the Defender, they inflict a Neutralize Passive of 15% potency for 10 second(s). Max 10. Whenever a Buff on the Defender is prevented by these Neutralizes, the Attacker Passively gains 1% of their Max Power.

Each time the Defender is Struck while under the effect of an Armor Up Buff they will Power Burn the Attacker for 5% of a Bar of Power. Power Burn Damage scales with each Armor Up Buff, as well as the Defender's Base Attack.

Each time the Defender is Struck while under the effect of an Armor Up Buff they will Power Burn the Attacker for 10% of a Bar of Power. Power Burn Damage scales with each Armor Up Buff, as well as the Defender's Base Attack.

Each time the Defender is Struck while under the effect of an Armor Up Buff they will Power Burn the Attacker for 18% of a Bar of Power. Power Burn Damage scales with each Armor Up Buff, as well as the Defender's Base Attack.
The duration of the Attacker's Buffs is reduced by 1.5 seconds, and if they are a Robot they suffer 50% reduced Ability Accuracy.
The duration of the Attacker's Buffs is reduced by 3.5 seconds, and if they are a Robot they suffer 60% reduced Ability Accuracy.
The duration of the Attacker's Buffs is reduced by 5 seconds, and if they are a Robot they suffer 70% reduced Ability Accuracy.

While fighting a Tech Attacker, whenever the Defender is inflicted with a Rupture, Incinerate, Plasma, Disintegration, or Poison effect, they are also inflicted with a Shock Passive, dealing 75% of the Attacker's Attack Rating as Energy Damage over 12 seconds.

The Attacker begins the fight with an Incinerate Debuff, a Shock Debuff and a Coldsnap Debuff, each of which lasts 10 seconds and deals 10% of the Attacker's Max Health in direct damage. These Debuffs are tied together and if one is lost or removed, they all are.

The Attacker begins the fight with an Incinerate Debuff, a Shock Debuff and a Coldsnap Debuff, each of which lasts 15 seconds and deals 20% of the Attacker's Max Health in direct damage. These Debuffs are tied together and if one is lost or removed, they all are.

The Attacker begins the fight with an Incinerate Debuff, a Shock Debuff and a Coldsnap Debuff, each of which lasts 20 seconds and deals 30% of the Attacker's Max Health in direct damage. These Debuffs are tied together and if one is lost or removed, they all are.
If the Attacker Purifies, Cleanses, or is Immune to a Debuff, they take a burst of Direct Damage equal to 10% of their Max Health.
If the Attacker Purifies, Cleanses, or is Immune to a Debuff, they take a burst of Direct Damage equal to 20% of their Max Health.
If the Attacker Purifies, Cleanses, or is Immune to a Debuff, they take a burst of Direct Damage equal to 30% of their Max Health.
If the Attacker Purifies, Cleanses, or is Immune to a Debuff, they take a burst of Direct Damage equal to 50% of their Max Health.
The Attacker’s Well-Timed Blocks inflict a Debuff on the Defender for 10 seconds. This Debuff cycles between Slow or Panic, starting with Slow.
The Attacker’s Well-Timed Blocks inflict a Debuff on the Defender for 5 seconds. This Debuff cycles between Slow or Panic, starting with Slow.

When the attacker completes a 5-Hit combo, both champions are afflicted with a Power Sting debuff for 9 seconds. When either champion uses a Special Attack, they receive damage equal to 50% of the Attacker's Attack Rating and all Power Stings from this buff are removed from both champs.
All Power Lock, Heal Block and Fate Seal Debuffs are automatically shared with the Attacker for 4 seconds. Attacker begins the fight with these 3 Debuffs for 8 seconds.
All Power Lock, Heal Block and Fate Seal Debuffs are automatically shared with the Attacker for 7 seconds. Attacker begins the fight with these 3 Debuffs for 15 seconds.

Whenever the Defender is Immune to a Debuff, they gain 66% of a Bar of Power.
Whenever the Defender is Immune to a Debuff, they gain 100% of a Bar of Power.
Whenever the Defender is Immune to a Debuff, they gain an Unstoppable Passive for 2 seconds.
When the Attacker Dodges or Evades an attack, they gain +40% Attack Rating indefinitely. Max stacks: 10.
When the Attacker Dodges or Evades an attack, they gain +30% Attack Rating indefinitely. Max stacks: 10.
When the Attacker Dodges or Evades an attack, they gain +20% Attack Rating indefinitely. Max stacks: 10.

When the Attacker performs an Intercept, they gain +30% Attack Rating indefinitely. Max stacks: 10.
When the Attacker performs an Intercept, they gain +20% Attack Rating indefinitely. Max stacks: 10.
Defenders are immune to the effects of Nullify, Stagger, Fate Seal, Buff Immunity, Neutralize and cannot have their Buff Ability Accuracy Modified.
Every 25 seconds the Attacker is Passively Rooted for 4 seconds unless they are performing a Special Attack when the timer expires.
Every 16 seconds the Attacker is Passively Rooted for 4 seconds unless they are performing a Special Attack when the timer expires.
Every 12 seconds the Attacker is Passively Rooted for 4 seconds unless they are performing a Special Attack when the timer expires.

Every 25 seconds the Attacker is Passively Stunned for 3 seconds unless they are performing a Special Attack when the timer expires. Every 30 seconds the Attacker is inflicted with a Stun Debuff for 3 seconds, unless they are performing a Special Attack when the timer expires. While this Stun is active, the Attacker's Armor Rating is doubled.

Every 25 seconds the Attacker is inflicted with a Stun Debuff for 3 seconds, unless they are performing a Special Attack when the timer expires. While this Stun is active, the Attacker's Armor Rating is doubled.

The Defender reduces all incoming damage by 100%. This damage reduction is reduced by 25% for each Debuff on the Defender. Max 0%. Pause all Debuffs on the Defender during their Special Attacks.

The Attacker's Combat Power Rate is reduced to 0%, but the Attacker generates 10% of a Bar of Power per second. Whenever the Attacker gains 3 Bars of Power, all of the Attacker's Power is removed and the Attacker loses 50% of their Max Health.

The Attacker's Combat Power Rate is reduced to 0%, but the Attacker generates 15% of a Bar of Power per second. Whenever the Attacker gains 3 Bars of Power, all of the Attacker's Power is removed and the Attacker loses 50% of their Max Health.

When the Defender finishes a Special Attack, a 4 second timer starts unless it's already active, or unless a Soul Barb effect is active on either Champion. If the Defender is struck by a Heavy or Special Attack while the timer is active, they are inflicted with a non-stacking 1,000 potency Soul Barb Debuff for 10 seconds. If the timer expires, the Soul Barb is instead inflicted on the Attacker with 200 potency and the duration halved.

When the Defender finishes a Special Attack, a 6 second timer starts unless it's already active, or unless a Soul Barb effect is active on either Champion. If the Defender is struck by a Heavy or Special Attack while the timer is active, they are inflicted with a non-stacking 1,000 potency Soul Barb Debuff for 10 seconds. If the timer expires, the Soul Barb is instead inflicted on the Attacker with 200 potency and the duration halved.

A chance to Stun opponents on attacks. A chance to Evade when attacked. A third Special Attack has been activated! Opponents can only do up to 50,000 damage in a single attack. At the start of the fight, Attack is increased the lower the opponents Health.
During Basic Attacks, gain +20% Attack Rating, +30% Buff and Debuff duration, and +20% Offensive Combat Power Rate.

Every 6 hits inflict Stun.

Only applies to Cosmic Champions. Most useful in "The World for the People." Whenever the Attacker would be Poisoned but is Immune they receive a Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by 20% for 6 seconds. Additionally, while this Fury is active the Attacker cannot land Critical Hits. Boost not usable in Battlegrounds.
Whenever the Defender is inflicted with a Debuff, it is immediately Purified and the Defender Regenerates 5% of their Max Health. This Ability has a 7 second cooldown.

Whenever the Defender is inflicted with a Debuff, it is immediately Purified and the Defender gains a Regeneration Buff, granting 5% of their Max Health over 7 seconds. This Ability has a 7 second cooldown.

Whenever the Defender is inflicted with a Debuff, it is immediately Purified and the Defender gains a Regeneration Buff, granting 10% of their Max Health over 7 seconds. This Ability has a 7 second cooldown.

Whenever the Defender is inflicted with a Debuff, it is immediately Purified and the Defender gains a Regeneration Buff, granting 15% of their Max Health over 7 seconds. This Ability has a 7 second cooldown.

The Defender starts with 3 indefinite Cleanse Passives. When these Cleanses are depleted the Attacker is Rooted for 4 seconds. When this Root is removed, expires, or fails to trigger, the Defender regains 3 Cleanses after 12 seconds.

The Defender starts with 5 indefinite Cleanse Passives. When these Cleanses are depleted the Attacker is Rooted for 4 seconds. When this Root is removed, expires, or fails to trigger, the Defender regains 5 Cleanses after 12 seconds.

The Defender starts with 7 indefinite Cleanse Passives. When these Cleanses are depleted the Attacker is Rooted for 4 seconds. When this Root is removed, expires, or fails to trigger, the Defender regains 7 Cleanses after 12 seconds.
If Morningstar has less than 2 Souls she gains 1.

When Black Cat stands up after being Knocked Down, for the next 9 second(s) she will steal her Calling Card from her Opponent when one of her attacks makes contact. When an Opponent’s ability fails to trigger, Black Cat will take the opportunity to plant her Calling Card on them.

The Defender benefits from max Rank of the following Masteries: Courage, Pierce, Precision, Cruelty, Despair, Deep Wounds, Assassin, Recovery, Block Proficiency, Perfect Block, Stand Your Ground, Inequity, Parry, Limber, Dexterity, Stupefy, Petrify, Pacify, Collar Tech, and Mystic Dispersion.
The defender benefits from Rank 1 of the Recoil Mastery, and max Rank of the Liquid Courage and Double Edge Masteries.
The defender benefits from max Rank of the Salve and Willpower Masteries.
#Villain Attackers increase the duration of Bleed, Poison, Incinerate, and Shock Debuffs on their Opponent by 100%
When the Defender activates a Special Attack, the Attacker generates a fixed 33% of a Bar of Power, ignoring Power Rate. This is the only way the Attacker can gain Power in this fight.
When the Defender activates a Special Attack, the Attacker generates a fixed 50% of a Bar of Power, ignoring Power Rate. This is the only way the Attacker can gain Power in this fight.
When the Defender activates a Special Attack, the Attacker generates a fixed 1 Bar of Power, ignoring Power Rate. This is the only way the Attacker can gain Power in this fight.
When Punisher 2099's Battery reaches intervals of exactly 25%, he gains 25% of his Max Power over 5 seconds.

While the Defender is charging a Heavy Attack, if the Attacker is within striking distance and suffering from any Debuff, they are inflicted with a Stun Debuff for 1.2 seconds.

At the start of the fight, the Attacker is afflicted with a Meltdown Timer for 30 second(s). Whenever the owner of the Meltdown Timer activates a Special Attack, the Meltdown Timer is refreshed and applied to their Opponent with -5 second(s). When the Meltdown Timer reaches zero, it deals it's owner a burst of damage equal to 200% of their Attack. It then resets back to 30 second(s) and applies itself to the Attacker.
The Defender reduces all incoming damage by 95%, unless the Attacker is #Mercenary, Deadpool, Deadpool (X-Force), Goldpool, Platinumpool, Gwenpool, Venompool, or Masacre.

Whenever the Attacker avoids a Hit with the Dexterity Mastery, they gain a Mercy Passive. Executing a Well-Timed Block will remove all Mercy Passives from the Attacker and apply them to the Defender, where they will fall off 1 at a time every 1.5 seconds. The Defender reduces damage taken from all sources by 90% unless they have a Mercy Passive. If the Defender has a Mercy Passive, the Attacker gains +80% Attack Rating for their Special Attacks.
A 7% chance to Evade attacks and leave the attacker Stunned for 1 second(s).
Interrupting the Defender's Heavy Attack makes them Angry for 6 seconds. Angry Opponents are more aggressive, Passively Unblockable, and have their Defensive Combat Power Rate reduced by 20%.
When the Defender Glances an attack, the Attacker receives 200% of the damage dealt.
While the Defender is Cornered, they are Immune to Debuffs. While the Defender is suffering from a Damage Over Time effect they gain a 5% Inexorable Passive.
#Size:M Attackers gain a non-stacking indefinite Fury Passive when the Defender activates a Special Attack, increasing Attack Rating by 50%. This Fury is removed when the Attacker's Combo falls to 0.
When the Defender Dashes forward they Purify all Debuffs and become Debuff Immune until the end of the Dash Attack.
When the Defender Dashes forward they Purify all Debuffs and become Debuff Immune, and Passively Unstoppable until the end of the Dash Attack.
When the Defender Dashes forward they Purify all Debuffs and become Debuff Immune, Passively Unstoppable, and gains +200% Attack Rating until the end of the Dash Attack.
At the start of the fight, the Attacker is inflicted with an indefinite Reversed Controls Passive, unless they are a #Robot or have #Psychic Shielding. Unaffected by Ability Accuracy modification.
Skill Attackers gain an indefinite Passive Fury increasing Attack rating by 35% each time the Defender’s Evade effect is prevented. Max stacks 10.
Attackers struck by a Special 3 Attack are instantly knocked out.
Attackers take Direct Damage equal to 25% Health over 12 seconds, but then Regenerate 25% Health instantly.
Every 7 seconds, automatically mirrors all Cruelty, Precision, Resistance, Fury, Armor Up and Regeneration Buffs for 6 seconds.

Lane Killer Cross-Fight: Performing a Well-Timed Block grants the Attacker a Passive Vigilance Charge. Intercepting the Defender grants 2 charges. Vigilance Charges prevent the Attacker from Missing, when this occurs a charge is removed. The effects of this node lasts for this fight and the next 3 Fights.

Whenever a Buff expires or is removed on a Attacker, #Miss-tic Dispersion Defenders have a 100% chance to gain a Miss Passive causing all attacks to Miss for 0 seconds. Intercepting the opponent will remove this Miss Passive. This Miss Passive goes on cooldown for 20 seconds after it expires or is removed. Anytime an Attackers attacks Miss, the Defender gains a Protection Passive, reducing any incoming damage by 0% for 0 seconds. Max Stacks 3.

Whenever a Buff expires or is removed on a Attacker, #Miss-tic Dispersion Defenders have a 100% chance to gain a Miss Passive causing all attacks to Miss for 0 seconds. Intercepting the opponent will remove this Miss Passive. This Miss Passive goes on cooldown for 20 seconds after it expires or is removed. Anytime an Attackers attacks Miss, the Defender gains a Protection Passive, reducing any incoming damage by 0% for 0 seconds. Max Stacks 3.

Each Dodged hit during a Special Attack grants the Attacker a stacking 20% Energy Resistance Buff for 10 seconds. The Attacker's Physical Resistance is reduced by 5% per stack of Energy Resistance Buff on them.

Each Dodged hit during a Special Attack grants the Attacker a stacking 15% Energy Resistance Buff for 10 seconds. The Attacker's Physical Resistance is reduced by 7% per stack of Energy Resistance Buff on them.

Each Dodged hit during a Special Attack grants the Attacker a stacking 10% Energy Resistance Buff for 10 seconds. The Attacker's Physical Resistance is reduced by 10% per stack of Energy Resistance Buff on them.

Lane Killer Cross-Fight: The Attacker builds Focus by Dashing back and holding Block. Any Focus built cannot be lost. Once the Attacker has maintained 10 seconds of Focus they become Fixated for 10 seconds, giving the Defender's Unblockable Attacks a 100% chance to Miss. Focus is gained 3 times faster while the Defender is Unblockable. No Focus can be gained while Fixated. The effects of this node lasts for this fight and the next 3 Fights.

Whenever a Buff on the Defender Expires, if the Attacker lands a Heavy or Special Attack within 5 seconds the Defender is Faltered for 3 seconds, otherwise, the Attacker is. Faltered Champions have 100% chance for their attacks to Miss.

Whenever a Buff on the Defender Expires, if the Attacker lands a Heavy or Special Attack within 4 seconds the Defender is Faltered for 4 seconds, otherwise, the Attacker is. Faltered Champions have 100% chance for their attacks to Miss.

Whenever a Buff on the Defender Expires, if the Attacker lands a Heavy or Special Attack within 3 seconds the Defender is Faltered for 5 seconds, otherwise, the Attacker is. Faltered Champions have 100% chance for their attacks to Miss.

Whenever the Defender Misses the Attacker, the Attacker gains a +20% Prowess Buff for 6 seconds.
Whenever the Defender Misses the Attacker, the Attacker gains a +15% Prowess Buff for 6 seconds.

Gain 1 Fervor charge when landing a Basic Attack. Charges fall off one at a time when the Attacker is far away from the Defender. If 0 Fervor charges remain the Attacker is inflicted with a Degeneration Debuff dealing 50% of the Defenders Attack Rating over 10 seconds.

Whenever a Mystic Attacker knocks down the Defender, the Attacker has a 100% chance to gain an Unstoppable Buff for 6 second(s). If the Attacker was already Unstoppable, they instead gain an indefinite Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by 50%. A maximum of 4 Fury Buffs can be gained this way.

Mutant Attackers increase their Offensive Combat Power Rate, up to 20%, every time they fill a Bar of Power or trigger a Regeneration Buff or Passive effect. Tech Attackers gain up to 20% increased Special Attack Damage based on their Armor Rating.

Mutant Attackers increase their Offensive Combat Power Rate, up to 25%, every time they fill a Bar of Power or trigger a Regeneration Buff or Passive effect. For each Mutant brought on your team each of your Mutants gains the following abilities: 1 Mutant: Your Offensive Combat Power Rate is increased by 5% per Mutant. 2 Mutants: Each time the Attacker fills a Bar of Power generate a Passive Prowess increasing the Special Attack damage by 15% and stacking up to 2 times per Mutant on your team. 3 Mutants: Special Attacks become Unblockable at 5+ Prowess effects. Additionally for each stack of Prowess increase, Attack Rating during Special attacks by 10%.
Mutant Champions receive +20% base Attack. Additionally, adjacency in the Class Wheel grants Tech Champions +10% base Attack.
Mutant Champions receive +30% base Attack and Skill Champions receive -10% base Attack penalty. Additionally, adjacency in the Class Wheel grants Tech Champions +15% base Attack.
Mutant Champions receive +40% base Attack and Skill Champions receive -40% base Attack penalty. Additionally, adjacency in the Class Wheel grants Tech Champions +20% base Attack.
Special Damage is increased by 80%.

The Potency of Regeneration and Damage Over Time effects is increased by up to 70% based on Stored Power. Special Attack cost is just applied at the end of the Special and staying at full Power for longer than 5 seconds gradually drains Power until a Special Attack is used.
Blasts a portion of remaining Health. Effective against Skill but resisted by Tech.

Reduces opponent's Attack with Specials by 25% when facing a target of the Mutant Class.

While suffering from a Concussion, Fatigue or Exhaustion Debuff, those bonuses are removed.

When this Defender is Struck while their Ability Accuracy is being passively reduced or when the Attacker activates a Buff, for 15 seconds, this Defender receives 60% less damage, +80% Ability Accuracy and Nullifies all of the Attacker's Buffs on an interval of 3 seconds.

The Defender benefits from a 50% Energize Passive unless they are suffering from a Degeneration Debuff or Passive. Whenever the Attacker inflicts a Fate Seal, Stagger, or Soul Barb Debuff or Passive they inflict a 15 second Degen Debuff dealing 200% of the Attacker's Attack.
