When a Power Detonation expires naturally on the Attacker, deal a burst of 40% of Base Attack Rating as Direct Damage for each Disintegration effect on the Attacker.
Whenever a Robotic Attacker would gain a Poison Debuff, they instead gain Shock which deals 85% of the Defender's attack as direct damage over 5 seconds.
Armor Break Debuffs inflicted on the Defender are 25% more potent, however, the Defender takes 50% less damage from all sources unless they are inflicted with an Armor Break Debuff.
Armor Break Debuffs inflicted on the Defender are 25% more potent, however, the Defender takes 75% less damage from all sources unless they are inflicted with an Armor Break Debuff.
Armor Break Debuffs inflicted on the Defender are 25% more potent, however, the Defender takes 90% less damage from all sources unless they are inflicted with an Armor Break Debuff.

Every 8 seconds, the Defender either removes all Non-Damaging Debuffs on them, or the Attacker has all of their active personal Buffs and Passives removed. Starting with the Defender removing Non-Damaging Debuffs, and cycling between the two.

Red Guardian has 3 cumulative phases that grant permanent additional effects in this fight. Phase 1 - Fight Start: Red Guardian loses 1 Durability in his Ablative Shield each time he is Struck by any Attack except a Heavy Attack. Phase 2 - Defender goes below 70% Health: When Red Guardian's Shield becomes Fractured, the cooldown is always 8 seconds. If already active, the Shield's cooldown is set to 8 seconds upon entering this phase. Phase 3 - Defender goes below 40% Health: Every 12 seconds both Champions gain an Unblockable Passive for 4 seconds.

Omega Sentinel has 3 cumulative phases that grant permanent additional effects in this fight. Phase 1 - Fight Start: Omega Sentinel's Auto-Block can trigger the Parry Mastery. Phase 2 - Defender goes below 70% Health: Omega Sentinel gains one of her Personal Armor Up Buffs whenever she is struck by a Critical Hit. Phase 3 - Defender goes below 40% Health: Omega Sentinel becomes Armor Break Immune for 4 seconds whenever either Champion blocks an attack.

Nimrod has 3 cumulative phases that grant permanent additional effects in this fight. Phase 1 - Fight Start: Whenever Nimrod is knocked down, he gains a Protocol Charge. Phase 2 - Defender goes below 70% Health: When Nimrod would gain a Protocol Charge while he has 10, he immediately enters Eradicate Protocol. When Nimrod enters Eradicate Protocol he becomes passively Debuff Immune for 3 seconds. Phase 3 - Defender goes below 40% Health: Nimrod's Special Lock lasts for an extra 0.25 seconds for each Protocol Charge he has.

The Defender has 3 cumulative phases that grant permanent additional effects in this fight. Phase 1 - Fight Start: At the start of the fight and every 18 seconds, the Defender picks 1 of 3 Alchemical Ingredients. When the Attacker throws a Light Attack it rotates the Attacker's dormant Alchemical Ingredient from Emberboon to Lifestitch and then Ironskin before repeating. Performing a Medium Combo Ender brews the dormant Alchemical Ingredient, replacing any existing one. A brewed Alchemical Ingredient can be consumed by dashing back and holding Block for 0.6 seconds. If the Alchemical Ingredient picked by the Defender is not consumed by the Attacker before the next one triggers, the Attacker is dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 15% of their max Health. Phase 2 - Defender goes below 70% Health: Consuming Alchemical Ingredients now requires the Attacker to dash back and hold Block for 1.2 seconds. Phase 3 - Defender goes below 40% Health: Alchemical Ingredients now take 3 seconds to brew before they can be consumed.

Kitty Pryde has 3 cumulative phases that grant permanent additional effects in this fight. Phase 1 - Fight Start: Kitty Pryde is Immune to all Cowardice effects. Whenever a Prowess effect is removed from her due to one of the Attacker's abilities, she gains one of her personal Prowess Passives. Phase 2 - Defender goes below 70% Health: Every 10th Hit in the Attacker's Combo Meter must be due to a Light Attack or Kitty gains a 100% Damage Over Time Resistance Passive for 7 seconds. Phase 3 - Defender goes below 40% Health: Blocking any hit of Kitty's Special Attack 1 grants her 2 Bars of Power that are unaffected by Ability Power modification, a 6 second Taunt Passive, and 8 of her personal Prowess Passives at the end of that Special Attack. Whenever Kitty activates a Special Attack, the Attacker gains a Bulwark Passive for the duration of that Special Attack, increasing Block Proficiency by 10000.

While the Attacker is close to Red Goblin, he gains 1 Bloodshed Charge every 0.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 25. While the Attacker is outside of striking distance of Red Goblin, he loses 1 Bloodshed Charge every 0.5 seconds. For every 5 Bloodshed Charges Red Goblin has he gains 1 temporary Bloodlust, which cannot exceed his maximum of 5. For each Bloodlust that Red Goblin has, the Attacker's Combat Power Rate and Block Proficiency are passively reduced by 10%.

Whenever the Attacker blocks an attack they gain 5% of a Bar of Power. At the start of the fight the Defender activates a timer of 12 seconds and randomly selects Heavy Attack, Special Attack or Block an Attack. This timer is paused during Special Attacks and while either champion is charging or performing a Heavy Attack. If the selected action is not performed before the timer expires, all of the Attacker's Buffs are removed and they are dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 15% of their max Health. If the selected action is performed, the Defender selects a new action and restarts the timer. Action selections that have been successfully performed will not repeat until all actions have been successfully performed.

If the Attacker has the Willpower Mastery active, it is removed. Whenever the Defender strikes the Attacker or their Block with a Basic Attack, the Attacker loses 5% of their Max Health as a burst of Direct Damage. This damage cannot be modified or prevented in any way.

The Attacker is Immune to Bleed, Poison and Incinerate Debuffs. Black Widow (Claire Voyant) cycles between her three Curses every 6 seconds in order. When she changes Curses, the Attacker gains 3 indefinite Placebo Buffs. While Black Widow has 0 Clairvoyance Charges or 20 Clairvoyance Charges she gains Death Touch for 8 seconds. While Death Touch is active Black Widow is Passively Unblockable and her successful hits instantly knockout the Attacker. When Death Touch ends, all Clairvoyance Charge are removed and Black Widow cannot enter Death Touch in this way for 15 seconds.

Whenever either Champion strikes their Opponent's Block, the Defender's Combo Meter increases by 6 and they gain a Pierce Passive of 400 Potency lasting for a duration equal to their Combo Meter value. Whenever the Defender activates a Special Attack, if the Defender does not have a Pierce Passive active that Special Attack costs 100% less power.
Whenever Misty Knight would gain Anti-Metal or Cryogenic Charges, she will instead increase her lower Charge by the amount of Charges she would have gained.
Whenever the Defender Blocks an attack the Attacker is inflicted with 5 5% Rupture Debuffs for 8 seconds.

Whenever the Defender uses a non-contact attack during a Special Attack, the Attacker must Block it with a Well-Timed Block. If they don't, the Attacker is dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 10% of their Max Health. This Defender is more likely to activate Special Attack 1. During the Defender's Special Attacks the Attacker's Block Proficiency is increased by 10000.

Each of Jubilee's Firework Surges corresponds to a Basic Attack. Orange is Heavy Attacks, Pink is Light Attacks, and Blue is Medium Attacks. While a Firework Surge is active, the corresponding Basic Attack gains +200% Attack Rating for the Attacker. If the Attacker uses a Basic Attack that does not correspond with an active Firework Surge, or whenever any hit from Jubilee's Special Attacks is avoided using the Dexterity Mastery, Jubilee instantly gains 100% of a Bar of Power.

Every 6 seconds, the Defender gains an indefinite 5% Armor Up Passive, unless the Attacker is far away from the Defender. Max Stacks: 5. Striking the Defender's Block removes one of these Armor Up Passives. Whenever the Defender Blocks an attack while they have an Armor Up effect active, they gain 10% of a Bar of Power.

Every 20 seconds Apocalypse gains 1 Genetic Code and 1 personal Passive Prowess. The Attacker starts with 6 Light Charges, 6 Medium Charges, and 2 Heavy Charges. A Charge is removed whenever the Attacker lands a corresponding Attack. When all Charges reach 0, all Charges are reset and Apocalypse loses 1 Genetic Code and 1 personal Passive Prowess.

Whenever the Attacker dashes back, they gain a Chicken Timer for 0.8 second(s). Dashing back again while the Chicken Timer is active pauses Titania's Haymaker Passives for 1 second. This timer cannot activate while the Haymaker Passives are paused. If the Haymaker Passives are not active, the Attacker is instead inflicted with 5 5% Weakness Debuffs for 8 seconds.

The last hit of Kraven's Special Attack 2 places a Trap at the Attacker's location that arms after 2 seconds and lasts until triggered. New Traps replace existing ones. This Trap can exist at the same time as his Special Attack 1 Trap. Whenever one of Kraven's Traps arms, he gains a Hunter Charge. When Kraven gains 3 Hunter Charges, all Charges are consumed and the Attacker is dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 15% of their max Health. Whenever one of Kraven's Traps activates or is prevented due to a Special Attack, he loses a Hunter Charge.

Attuma has 3 cumulative phases that grant permanent additional effects in this fight. Phase 1 - Fight Start: While Attuma has 15 or more stacks of Hydration, he is inflicted with a permanent Concussion Passive, reducing his Ability Accuracy by 50%. Phase 2 - Defender goes below 70% Health: Attuma's Hydration stacks are paused for 2 seconds whenever the Attacker strikes Attuma's block. Phase 3 - Defender goes below 40% Health: Attuma's Hydration stacks are paused for 2 seconds whenever the Attacker Dashes Back.

The Defender takes 100% less damage while they are not inflicted with a Damaging Debuff or Passive. Whenever the Defender activates a Special Attack, they increase their Physical Resistance by 1% and decrease the Attacker's Critical Penetration by 1% for the rest of the fight.

Captain America gains the benefits of his Signature Ability as a Defender. He starts on Mutant and every 8 seconds he cycles to the next Class Ability. Class Abilities that trigger on Well-Timed Block trigger on either Champions Well-Timed Block. If Captain America is struck while he has 5 or more Kinetic Potential he consumes all Kinetic Potential and inflicts the Attacker with a Concussion Debuff for 10 seconds, reducing their Ability Accuracy by 100%.

The Defender has 3 cumulative phases that grant permanent additional effects in this fight. Phase 1 - Fight Start: Whenever the Attacker finishes a Special Attack, the Defender gains an indefinite Protection Passive, reducing all incoming damage by 30%. Max stacks 3. One of these Protection Passives is removed whenever the Attacker strikes the Defender with the first hit of their Heavy Attack while the Defender is not Stunned, or whenever the Attacker intercepts the Defender's first Medium or Light attack with any attack, or whenever the Attacker interrupts the Defender's Heavy Attack with any attack other than a Heavy Attack. Phase 2 - Defender goes below 70% Health: The Defender now gains a Protection passive whenever they finish a Special Attack as well. Phase 3 - Defender goes below 40% Health: Repeating one of the above actions twice in a row no longer removes a Protection Passive.

If the Attacker hasn't landed a hit in 6 seconds, Silver Centurion's Lock-On timer is decreased by 2 seconds. If Lock-On is currently active, the timer is instead paused for 2 seconds. While Silver Centurion's Lock-On is active, his Special Attacks cost 100% less power.

The Defender takes no damage from any source belonging to the Attacker. Every 15 seconds the Defender alternates between Anger and Sadness. While in Anger the Defender is more likely to be aggressive, they gain a 30% Fury Passive, and every time the Defender is Intercepted or their Heavy Attack is Interrupted they lose 2% of their Max Health as a burst of Direct Damage. While in Sadness the Defender is more likely to be defensive, and every time the Attacker strikes the Defender's Block the Defender loses 0.25% of their Max Health as a burst of Direct Damage. These sources of damage cannot be modified or prevented in any way. Additionally, whenever the Defender alternates modes they remove all Prowess effects from the Attacker unless the Defender was inflicted with a Stun effect while that mode was active.
Every 10 seconds Hit-Monkey activates both Assassin's Cunning and Primal Rage for 6.5 seconds. This timer is reset when Hit-Monkey is knocked down.

Whenever the Attacker uses the same Special Attack twice in a row, Ant-Man (Future) gains 2 of his personal Nano-Armor Up Buffs. Whenever the Attacker intercepts Ant-Man, the Attacker's Special Attack 1 is disabled for 5 seconds.

Except when they are dashing forward, the Defender is Immune to Nullify, Fateseal, Stagger and cannot have their Buff Ability Accuracy modified. While the Attacker is close to the Defender, a 6 second timer is started. This timer is removed when the Attacker leaves striking distance of the Defender. If this timer expires, the Defender gains a Nova Force Charge. When the Defender gains 5 Nova Force Charges, all Charges are consumed and all of the Attacker's current Power is Burned.

The Attacker gains 15000 Block Proficiency for the duration of this fight. This Defender takes 100% less damage while they have less than 6 Buffs applied to them. These Buffs can be of the same type. Whenever the Defender charges a Heavy Attack, both Champions gain an Indestructible, an Unstoppable and a Special Lock Passive for 1.5 seconds.

America Chavez has 3 cumulative phases that grant permanent additional effects in this fight. Phase 1 - Fight Start: Whenever America Chavez is knocked down, a 12 second timer is started. If she is knocked down again while this timer is active, she activates her Negative Zone Dimension. Phase 2 - Defender goes below 70% Health: If America Chavez activates the same Parallel Dimension twice in a row she instantly steals all of the Attacker's current Power and gains none of the power stolen. Phase 3 - Defender goes below 40% Health: When this Power Steal occurs, America Chavez gains 50% of the power stolen.
Every 15 seconds the Defender gains a 75% Energize Passive for 10 seconds. Striking the Defender's Block resets this timer.

Every 15 seconds Air-Walker gains his Power of Galactus Buff for 10 seconds. This timer is reset whenever the Attacker knocks down Air-Walker. If this Buff is Nullified or prevented from triggering, Air-Walker instantly gains 3 Bars of Power.
Whenever a Debuff is Purified off of the Attacker, they are inflicted with a Reversed Controls Passive for 4 seconds.
Whenever he is struck by a Critical Hit, Sauron gains a personal Prowess Passive and if his Unblockable Passive is currently active, it is paused for 2 seconds.

If the Attacker has the Willpower Mastery active, it is removed. Whenever the Attacker is inflicted with any Debuff or when Sandman is inflicted with a Stun Debuff, Sandman gains 5 personal Resistance Up Passives. Whenever Sandman becomes Unstable or charges a Heavy Attack while Unstable, he Passively Roots the Attacker for 1.5 seconds. While Sandman is close to the Attacker while they are Rooted, he is 90% more likely to use Heavy Attacks.

Whenever the Defender activates a Special Attack, they inflict a Reckless Research Debuff on themselves for that Special Attack, increasing their Defensive Combat Power Rate by 30%. If the Attacker was struck by the last hit of a Special Attack, inflict 1 additional copy of the Debuff. Reckless Research Debuffs are removed when the Defender activates a Special Attack that is different than the one that triggered the Debuff. When the Defender has 3 copies of a Reckless Research Debuff, they are combined into a Passive that lasts for the rest of the fight. Max stacks 10.

If the Attacker has the Willpower Mastery active, it is removed. At the start of the fight the Attacker is inflicted with an indefinite Wither Debuff of 125% potency. This Wither Debuff is removed whenever the Attacker avoids any hit from the Defender by using the Dexterity Mastery. This Wither Debuff is reapplied 6 seconds after it is removed for any reason. While the Attacker is not inflicted with a Wither effect, all Debuffs on them are paused. Every 10 seconds the Defender gains an indefinite Power Gain Passive, granting them 1% of their Max Power each second. Whenever the Attacker Blocks an attack, a Power Gain Passive is removed.

The Attacker is Passively Special Locked for 6 seconds after using a Special Attack 3. Whenever the Attacker Purifies an Armor Break or Coldsnap Debuff or prevents Armor Break or Coldsnap effects via Immunity, the Defender gains a Power Gain Passive, granting them 10% of their Max Power over 10 seconds.

Sunspot is now Immune to all Shock effects. Whenever Sunspot is struck by a Critical Hit or activates Special Attack 1 he loses 5 Solar Charges and whenever he activates Special Attack 2 he loses 15. When Sunspot reaches 0 Solar Charges he enters Solar Flare mode, lasting for 20 seconds and granting him 80 Solar Charges when it ends. While in Solar Flare mode, whenever the Attacker makes contact with Sunspot they are inflicted with a 0% Nova Flame Passive for 20 seconds, reducing Block Proficiency by 100%, inflicting Power Sting and reducing Solar Flare modes duration by 1 second. An Opponent with Power Sting takes 40% of the Defender's Attack as Direct Damage when they activate a Special Attack.

Purgatory has permanent access to all of her Class Soul Abilities against all Classes. The Mystic Soul now Regenerates her due to Blocked Hits dealt to either Champion, and the Skill Soul now also inflicts a 50% Disorient Passive for 9 seconds and triggers when either Champion has a Damage Over Time Debuff expire, be Purified or fail due to an Immunity. Whenever either Champion activates a Special Attack Purgatory gains 10 Bloodthirst, and Demonic Rampage is now paused during either Champion's Special Attacks.

Whenever the Attacker and the Defender have the same number of Bars of Power, including less than a Bar of Power, a 12 second timer is started. This timer is removed as soon as the Attacker and the Defender have a different number of Bars of Power. If this timer expires, the Defender Power Steals all of the Attacker's current Power.

The Defender takes no damage from any source belonging to the Attacker. Whenever the Attacker gains 1 or more Buffs the Defender loses 0.5% of their Max Health as a burst of Direct Damage. This damage cannot be modified or prevented in any way. Cooldown: 0.5 seconds.

The Defender has 3 cumulative phases that grant permanent additional effects in this fight. Phase 1 - Fight Start: Every 12 seconds the Attacker is inflicted with a Special Lock Passive for 4 seconds. If the Attacker is far away from the Defender when this triggers, the Defender is Special Locked instead. Phase 2 - Defender goes below 70% Health: Striking the Defender's Block grants the Defender a 50% Prowess Buff for 10 seconds. Phase 3 - Defender goes below 40% Health: The Defender's Buffs now have their Ability Accuracy increased by +50%.

Whenever the Defender is struck by a Critical Hit, they gain a dormant Stun Immune Charge. Upon reaching 3 dormant Charges, all Charges are consumed and the Defender gains a Stun Immune Passive for 6 seconds. While the Attacker's back is against the wall, all dormant Stun Immune Charges are removed.

The Defender cycles between a dormant Unstoppable and 100% Untouchable, each lasting 15 seconds. Whenever the Defender activates a Special Attack the Attacker gains a Passive of the current dormant type for 10 seconds. If the dormant timer expires, the Defender instead gains a Passive of the expiring dormant type for 5 seconds. When any of these effects expire, the dormant type cycles and the timer restarts.

Storm (Pyramid X) has 3 cumulative phases that grant permanent additional effects in this fight. Phase 1 - Fight Start: While both of Storm's Tempests are active, if she causes an attack to Glance she gains a personal Prowess Buff. Phase 2 - Defender goes below 70% Health: If not already active, Storm activates her Alternate Tempest for 12 seconds whenever she activates a Special Attack. Phase 3 - Defender goes below 40% Health: Storm's Tempests are paused for 2 seconds whenever the Attacker blocks one of Storm's attacks.

Quicksilver has 3 cumulative phases that grant permanent additional effects in this fight. Phase 1 - Fight Start: The Attacker's True Strike and True Accuracy abilities suffer -100% Ability Accuracy. Phase 2 - Defender goes below 70% Health: Whenever Quicksilver activates a Special Attack he gains 50 Momentum Charges, unaffected by his Heavy modifier. Phase 3 - Defender goes below 40% Health: Every 10 seconds Quicksilver gains 100 Momentum Charges, unaffected by his Heavy modifier. Intercepting the Defender resets this timer.

The Defender's Buff Ability Accuracy cannot be modified. The Defender cycles between dormant icons every 8 seconds in the order of Bleed, Incinerate, then Shock. Whenever a Buff is removed from the Defender or expires, they convert that dormant icon into an active Debuff on themselves, dealing 5% of their Base Attack Rating over 15 seconds.

If the Attacker has the Willpower Mastery active, it is removed. Every 22 seconds Tippy-Toe attaches to the Attacker for 15 seconds, inflicting an instant 25% Rupture for each Rupture Debuff that was on the Attacker, removing all Rupture Debuffs. While Tippy is attached to the Attacker, their Block Proficiency is increased by 10000 and they are inflicted with a Rupture Debuff every second, dealing 1% of the Defender's Attack as Direct Damage over 15 seconds. Whenever the Attacker would strike Squirrel Girl with a Heavy Attack while she is Stunned, she gains an Unstoppable Passive for 2 seconds.

Whenever the Attacker is Immune to one of Immortal Abomination's Poison Debuffs, Immortal Abomination is inflicted with one of his personal Poison Debuffs. Poison Debuffs inflicted by Toxic Aura do not trigger this effect. Whenever Immortal Abomination would inflict himself with a Poison Debuff while he is already inflicted with 12 or more Poison Debuffs, the Attacker is inflicted with an Acid Burn Passive dealing 25% of the Defender's Attack as Direct Damage over 5 seconds.

The Attacker's True Strike, True Accuracy and True Sense abilities suffer -100% Ability Accuracy. Whenever Shocker Blocks an attack, he gains 10 Vibro-Shock Charges. Whenever Shocker begins charging a Heavy Attack he gains an Indestructible Passive and an Unstoppable Passive, lasting until the final hit of his Heavy Attack occurs. At 50+ Vibro-Shock Charges if the Attacker is within striking distance while Shocker is charging a Heavy Attack, 50 Vibro-Shock Charges are removed and the Attacker is Passively Rooted for the duration of his Heavy Attack.

While Tigra's Primal Sense is active, whenever she Strikes the Attacker or their Block she inflicts them with a 1% Rupture Debuff for 8 seconds. While Tigra's Huntress Sense is active, the Attacker's Light Attacks have a 50% chance to Miss.

Shang-Chi has 3 cumulative phases that grant permanent additional effects in this fight. Phase 1 - Fight Start: Shang-Chi performs his Wushu Strikes when the Attacker performs the corresponding combos as though he had performed the combos himself. Whenever the Attacker lands a Heavy Attack, all Unreadied Wushu Strikes are Readied. Whenever Shang-Chi finishes his Special Attack 1 he loses 1 Chi Charge. If Shang-Chi activates a Special Attack while he has no Chi Charges, the Attacker is dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 15% of their max Health. Phase 2 - Defender goes below 70% Health: If the Attacker lands a combo that would trigger one of Shang-Chi's Unreadied Wushu Strikes, the Attacker is dealt a burst of Direct Damage equal to 15% of their max Health. Phase 3 - Defender goes below 40% Health: The Attacker's Heavy Attacks no longer Ready Wushu Strikes. Instead, when all Wushu Strikes become Unreadied, all Stun effects on the Attacker are removed and all Wushu Strikes become Readied.
Every 10 seconds the Defender gains an indefinite +15% Armor Up Passive. Max stacks: 10. Striking into the Defender's Block removes one stack.
Every 8 seconds the Defender gains an indefinite +15% Armor Up Passive. Max stacks: 10. Striking into the Defender's Block removes one stack.
Every 6 seconds the Defender gains an indefinite +15% Armor Up Passive. Max stacks: 10. Striking into the Defender's Block removes one stack.

This Modifier is disabled by default and is only enabled if the associated Linked Node is removed. Each Paradox on the Attacker grants them an indefinite Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by 8%. The damage reduction from Kang’s Neuro-Kinetic Suit is increased by 150% at all times. If the Attacker is Cosmic, Skill, or Science, it is decreased by 25% for each Fury or Precision effect on them, to a maximum reduction of -200%.
While this node is active, "Neuro-Kinetic Paradox - Fury" is disabled. Removing this Linked Node will enable it.

This Modifier is disabled by default and is only enabled if the associated Linked Node is removed. Each Paradox on the Attacker grants them an indefinite Prowess Buff, increasing Special Attack Damage by 10%. The damage reduction from Kang’s Neuro-Kinetic Suit is increased by 150% at all times. If the Attacker is Tech, Mutant, or Mystic, it is decreased by 25% for each Armor, Prowess, or Power Gain effect on them, to a maximum reduction of -200%.
While this node is active, "Neuro-Kinetic Paradox - Prowess" is disabled. Removing this Linked Node will enable it.

While the Attacker is close to the Defender, a 2 second timer is started. This timer is removed when the Attacker leaves striking distance of the Defender and is paused during Special Attacks. If this timer expires, the Attacker is inflicted with a 200% Neutralize Passive for 6 seconds.

While the Attacker is close to the Defender, a 2 second timer is started. This timer is removed when the Attacker leaves striking distance of the Defender and is paused during Special Attacks. If this timer expires, the Attacker is inflicted with a 200% Neutralize Passive for 8 seconds.

While the Attacker is close to the Defender, a 2 second timer is started. This timer is removed when the Attacker leaves striking distance of the Defender and is paused during Special Attacks. If this timer expires, the Attacker is inflicted with a 200% Neutralize Passive for 10 seconds.

When the Attacker dashes back, they gain a Regeneration Timer for 1.2 second(s). Dashing back again while the Regeneration Timer is active grants the Defender a Regeneration Passive restoring 5% of their Max Health over 5 seconds. Max 1 stack.

When the Attacker dashes back, they gain a Regeneration Timer for 1.2 second(s). Dashing back again while the Regeneration Timer is active grants the Defender a Regeneration Passive restoring 7.5% of their Max Health over 5 seconds. Max 1 stack.

When the Attacker dashes back, they gain a Regeneration Timer for 1.2 second(s). Dashing back again while the Regeneration Timer is active grants the Defender a Regeneration Passive restoring 10% of their Max Health over 5 seconds. Max 1 stack.

Whenever the Defender is knocked down they gain a non-stacking Unstoppable Passive lasting 20 seconds. Intercepting the Defender's Light or Medium Attack while they are Unstoppable inflicts a 15 second Passive Slow on the Defender, and transfers the Unstoppable to the Attacker for 20 seconds.

Whenever either Champion gains a Buff, the Defender gains an indefinite Cleanse Passive. Whenever the Defender is knocked down, these Cleanses are consumed and grant them an Unstoppable Passive lasting 1 second for every Cleanse consumed.

Whenever either Champion gains a Buff, the Defender gains 2 indefinite Cleanse Passives. Whenever the Defender is knocked down, these Cleanses are consumed and grant them an Unstoppable Passive lasting 1 second for every Cleanse consumed.

Whenever either Champion gains a Buff, the Defender gains 3 indefinite Cleanse Passives. Whenever the Defender is knocked down, these Cleanses are consumed and grant them an Unstoppable Passive lasting 1 second for every Cleanse consumed.
Each time the Defender receives a Stun Debuff, they reduce the Duration of further Stun Debuffs by 0.1 seconds.
Each time the Defender receives a Stun Debuff, they reduce the Duration of further Stun Debuffs by 0.2 seconds.
Each time the Defender attempts an evade, they gain a Physical Resistance Passive, increasing Physical Resistance by 10% for 10 seconds. Max 3 Stacks.
Each time the Defender attempts an evade, they gain a Physical Resistance Passive, increasing Physical Resistance by 20% for 10 seconds. Max 3 Stacks.
Each time the Defender attempts an evade, they gain a Physical Resistance Passive, increasing Physical Resistance by 30% for 10 seconds. Max 3 Stacks.
When the Defender is knocked down they gain a +350% Cruelty Buff for 5 seconds. While the Defender has a Cruelty Buff, they can perform Critical Hits through the Attacker's Block.
When the Defender is knocked down they gain a +350% Cruelty Buff for 7 seconds. While the Defender has a Cruelty Buff, they can perform Critical Hits through the Attacker's Block.
When the Defender is knocked down they gain a +350% Cruelty Buff for 10 seconds. While the Defender has a Cruelty Buff, they can perform Critical Hits through the Attacker's Block.
When the Defender is knocked down they gain a +350% Cruelty Passive for 5 seconds. While the Defender has a Cruelty Passive, they can perform Critical Hits through the Attacker's Block.
When the Defender is knocked down they gain a +350% Cruelty Passive for 7 seconds. While the Defender has a Cruelty Passive, they can perform Critical Hits through the Attacker's Block.
When the Defender is knocked down they gain a +350% Cruelty Passive for 10 seconds. While the Defender has a Cruelty Passive, they can perform Critical Hits through the Attacker's Block.
Elektra's Signature Ability is enhanced against enemies with 50% or less remaining Health.
Inflicting a Debuff reduces opponent's Ability Accuracy by 100% for 0.7 seconds.

When the Attacker dashes back, they gain a Degen Timer for 1.5 seconds. Dashing back again while the Degen Timer is active causes a Passive Degen, dealing 15% of the Attacker's Base Health as Direct Damage over 5 seconds.

When the Attacker dashes back, they gain Degen Timer for 1.2 seconds. Dashing back again while the Degen Timer is active causes a Passive Degen, dealing 200% of the Defender's Attack as direct damage over 5 seconds.

The Attacker resists up to 90% of Degeneration Damage. Resistance potency reduced by a flat 30% for each of the Attackers filled bars of Power. Additionally, Knocking the Defender down removes the Attackers Degeneration effects, each inflicting one on the Defender, dealing 1,000% damage over 5 seconds.
Professor X becomes more aggressive while the Attacker is Mind Controlled.

Each non-Critical Hit on the Defender has a 25% chance to inflict a random Debuff on the Attacker for 15 seconds. These random Debuffs can be Weakness, Decelerate, Debilitate, Atrophy, or Trauma, all with 10% potency. The Attacker's Salve and Willpower Masteries are removed at the start of the fight.

Each non-Critical Hit on the Defender has a 50% chance to inflict a random Debuff on the Attacker for 15 seconds. These random Debuffs can be Weakness, Decelerate, Debilitate, Atrophy, or Trauma, all with 10% potency. The Attacker's Salve and Willpower Masteries are removed at the start of the fight.

Each non-Critical Hit on the Defender has a 100% chance to inflict a random Debuff on the Attacker for 15 seconds. These random Debuffs can be Weakness, Decelerate, Debilitate, Atrophy, or Trauma, all with 10% potency. The Attacker's Salve and Willpower Masteries are removed at the start of the fight.
Regenerates 10% Health when killing opponents.

When the Attacker activates a Special Attack, they reflect 35% of damage taken per Debuff on them, for 0.7 seconds. If the Attacker's Attack Rating is being reduced by at least 50%, the amount reflected is capped at 50%. If 100% of the damage taken is reflected, its potency is increased by 200%.

When the Attacker activates a Special Attack, they reflect 25% of damage taken per Debuff on them, for 0.7 seconds. If the Attacker's Attack Rating is being reduced by at least 50%, the amount reflected is capped at 50%. If 100% of the damage taken is reflected, its potency is increased by 250%.

When the Attacker activates a Special Attack, they reflect 20% of damage taken per Debuff on them, for 0.7 seconds. If the Attacker's Attack Rating is being reduced by at least 50%, the amount reflected is capped at 50%. If 100% of the damage taken is reflected, its potency is increased by 300%.

When the Defender is Critically Hit, a 5 second timer starts. If they are Critically Hit again in that time, the Attacker is inflicted with a non-stacking 50% Cowardice Debuff until the end of their next Special Attack.

When the Defender is Critically Hit, a 8 second timer starts. If they are Critically Hit again in that time, the Attacker is inflicted with a non-stacking 50% Cowardice Debuff until the end of their next Special Attack.

When the Defender is Critically Hit, a 12 second timer starts. If they are Critically Hit again in that time, the Attacker is inflicted with a non-stacking 50% Cowardice Debuff until the end of their next Special Attack.
Every 10 seconds the Attacker is inflicted with a Falter Debuff giving them a 100% chance to Miss for 3 seconds. If the Attacker lands a hit this timer is reset.
Every 8 seconds the Attacker is inflicted with a Falter Debuff giving them a 100% chance to Miss for 3 seconds. If the Attacker lands a hit this timer is reset.
Every 6 seconds the Attacker is inflicted with a Falter Debuff giving them a 100% chance to Miss for 3 seconds. If the Attacker lands a hit this timer is reset.
Each time the Defender’s Miss Effect is prevented, Cosmic Attackers gain an indefinite Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by 35%. Max 10 stack(s).
Every 20 seconds the Attacker is inflicted with a Passive Power Lock and Special Lock for 6 seconds. If the Attacker lands a Special Attack this timer is reset.
Every 15 seconds the Attacker is inflicted with a Passive Power Lock and Special Lock for 6 seconds. If the Attacker lands a Special Attack this timer is reset.
Every 10 seconds the Attacker is inflicted with a Passive Power Lock and Special Lock for 6 seconds. If the Attacker lands a Special Attack this timer is reset.
Once the Defender Nullifies 7 Buff(s), they gain a Power Gain Buff granting 50% of Max Power over 10 second(s).
Once the Defender Nullifies 7 Buff(s), they gain a Power Gain Buff granting 75% of Max Power over 10 second(s).
Once the Defender Nullifies 4 Buff(s), they gain a Power Gain Buff granting 100% of Max Power over 10 second(s).
When the Defender is struck, they have a 20% chance to Nullify a Buff on the Attacker.
When the Defender is struck, they have a 40% chance to Nullify a Buff on the Attacker.
When the Defender is struck, they have a 60% chance to Nullify a Buff on the Attacker.

When the Defender performs the first attack in any combo, the Defender is Stun Immune until the attack ends. This immunity goes on cooldown for 10 second(s) when the Attacker performs a Well-Timed Block.

When the Defender performs the first attack in any combo, the Defender is Stun Immune until the attack ends. This immunity goes on cooldown for 8 second(s) when the Attacker performs a Well-Timed Block.

When the Defender performs the first attack in any combo, the Defender is Stun Immune until the attack ends. This immunity goes on cooldown for 6 second(s) when the Attacker performs a Well-Timed Block.
Each time a Mystic Attacker gains a Regeneration Effect, Power Drain 10% of the Defender's Max Power.
The Defender is immune to Nullify, Stagger and Fateseal. Knocking down the Defender with a Heavy Attack disables this immunity for 15 seconds.
The Defender is immune to Nullify, Stagger and Fateseal. Intercepting or Interrupting the Defender's Basic Attacks disables this immunity for 15 seconds.
The Defender is immune to Nullify, Stagger and Fateseal. Punishing the Defender's Special Attack disables this immunity for 15 seconds.
If the Attacker's Grade is 3, 5, 7, 9, 11 or 13, when they Dodge back they are inflicted with a non-stacking 40% Cowardice Debuff for 6 seconds.

The Attacker's Odometer starts at 0 and goes up to 200, increasing as they dash forwards and backwards and resetting each time they are knocked down by a Special. While the Odometer is below or equal to 100, the Defender reduces all damage based on the Odometer's value. While the Odometer is above 100, the Defender becomes Unblockable and the Attacker gains a Fury increasing Attack Rating based on the Odometer's value.
Hulk chance to SMASH on All Attacks increases by 400% while Face Me is active.
Whenever a hit from the Defender's Special Attack is Dodged, the Attacker gains a 20% Prowess Passive for 10 seconds. Each of these Prowess Passives reduces the Attacker's Block Proficiency by 10%.
Whenever a hit from the Defender's Special Attack is Dodged, the Attacker gains a 20% Prowess Passive for 10 seconds. Each of these Prowess Passives reduces the Attacker's Block Proficiency by 20%.
Whenever a hit from the Defender's Special Attack is Dodged, the Attacker gains a 20% Prowess Passive for 10 seconds. Each of these Prowess Passives reduces the Attacker's Block Proficiency by 30%.
Opponents are treated as #Mercenary for Hit-Monkey's abilities while he is below 35% Health.

When the Defender blocks a hit, they gain an indefinite Fury Passive increasing their Attack Rating by 50%. When the Defender has 6+ of these Fury Passives, they begin to expire one at a time every 3 second(s). While these Fury Passives are expiring the Defender is passively Unblockable and cannot gain more Fury Passives.
When the Attacker gains a Bar of Power, they are Special Locked for 1 second.
When the Attacker gains a Bar of Power, they are Special Locked for 2 seconds.
When the Attacker gains a Bar of Power, they are Special Locked for 3 seconds.

Every 8 second(s), the Defender cycles through a dormant Fury, Armor Up, and Power Gain Buff. Whenever the Defender is knocked down, they activate a Buff of the dormant type for 30 second(s). When the Defender gains 3 Fury, Armor Up or Power Gain Buffs, remove all One Armed Bandit Buffs. For each Buff removed this way, deal Direct Damage to the Defender equal to 200% of the Attacker's Attack Rating.
100% of the Damage dealt to the Defender while they are stunned is dealt back to the Attacker.
The Attacker gains an indefinite 200% Fury Buff if they throw all their Special Attacks in any order. This resets if the Attacker throws a repeated Special.
The Attacker gains an indefinite 160% Fury Buff if they throw all their Special Attacks in any order. This resets if the Attacker throws a repeated Special.
The Attacker gains an indefinite 120% Fury Buff if they throw all their Special Attacks in any order. This resets if the Attacker throws a repeated Special.

Every 12 seconds, the Defender gains an indefinite Lethal Charge, up to 5, making their next successful hit lethal. Lethal Charges are consumed whenever the Defender attacks, regardless of whether the attack hits. When the Defender is struck, reset the timer.

Every 8 seconds, the Defender gains an indefinite Lethal Charge, up to 5, making their next successful hit lethal. Lethal Charges are consumed whenever the Defender attacks, regardless of whether the attack hits. When the Defender is struck, reset the timer.

Every 5 seconds, the Defender gains an indefinite Lethal Charge, up to 5, making their next successful hit lethal. Lethal Charges are consumed whenever the Defender attacks, regardless of whether the attack hits. When the Defender is struck, reset the timer.

When the Defender gains a Bar of Power, the Attacker is inflicted with a Power Sting Debuff for 4 seconds. Power Sting triggers and is removed if the Attacker activates a Special Attack, dealing direct damage equal to 50% of the Defender’s Attack.

When the Defender gains a Bar of Power, the Attacker is inflicted with a Power Sting Debuff for 6 seconds. Power Sting triggers and is removed if the Attacker activates a Special Attack, dealing direct damage equal to 50% of the Defender’s Attack.

When the Defender gains a Bar of Power, the Attacker is inflicted with a Power Sting Debuff for 8 seconds. Power Sting triggers and is removed if the Attacker activates a Special Attack, dealing direct damage equal to 50% of the Defender’s Attack.

Each time a Science Attacker knocks the Defender down while they’re suffering from a Power Sting, Slow or Weakness Effect, the Defender is inflicted with a non-stacking Petrify Passive of 50% Potency for 10 second(s).
Disable all statmods on attacker except for Parry
This Defender gains +10% Attack on Hit for each Buff on them.
This Defender gains +25% Attack on Hit for each Buff on them.
This Defender gains +50% Attack on Hit for each Buff on them.

Thanos' Army crushes those without the power of the Stone. Attacking Champions who are not under the effects of an Infinity Stone have their Attack reduced by 80% and take Direct Damage equal to 100% of their health over 35 Seconds.
When Morningstar is Blocked, she gains a Soul Charge. Slight delay between Oppressive Curse activations.
Gains Fury, Armor Up, and Health Steal as long as they remain below 25% HP.
The speed of the fight starts at 0% of normal. Basic Attacks increase it by 0%, and Special Attacks decrease it by 0%, to a minimum of 10% and a maximum of 200%.

Prowess Passives granted by Divine Punishments last for 8 seconds but fall off one at a time. Performing an Intercept refreshes all of these Prowess Passives. The Prowess Passives expire slower during Glykhan’s Special Attacks and while he has more than 2 Bars of Power.

The stack limit for Divine Punishments is reduced to 2. Their potencies and the bonus to Spirit Rate are increased to compensate. The threshold for converting them all is reduced to 10. The number removed at the end of the fight is reduced to 2.

Orochi gains 2 extra Phases, with her normal Phase 6 now becoming Phase 8. Phase 6: Aspect of Corruption - All of Orochi’s attacks inflict Degeneration Passives, dealing 3% of her Attack as Direct Damage over 3 seconds. These can be inflicted through Block. Phase 7: Aspect of Torment - If Orochi is near the Attacker for 2 seconds, she inflicts a Degeneration Passive dealing 10% of her Attack as Direct Damage over 3 seconds.

Whenever a Science Attacker activates a Special Attack, they have a 100% chance to Enervate the Defender for 6 second(s), preventing them from gaining Power when struck. Whenever this Enervate would expire, it consumes one Debuff on the Defender to reapply itself.

Tech Attackers: When inflicting a Power Drain, Power Burn, or Power Lock effect, gain an indefinite +35% Fury Passive, up to 10. Additionally, while an Armor Up is active, Well-Timed Blocks Power Drain 15% of the Defender's Max Power.
Whenever the Attacker Misses, gain a Power Thief Passive for 10 seconds. While Power Thief is active, all hits steal 5% of the Attacker's current Power.
Whenever the Attacker Misses, the Defender gains a 50% Power Efficiency Passive for 10 seconds.
When the Defender gains a Prowess Effect, they generate 5% of their Max Power.
When the Defender gains a Prowess Effect, they generate 10% of their Max Power.
When the Defender gains a Prowess Effect, they generate 33% of their Max Power.
Each time the Attacker is inflicted with any Debuff, the Defender gains a Power Gain Passive granting 5% of Max Power over 8 seconds. This Power Gain does not stack multiple times.
Each time the Attacker is inflicted with any Debuff, the Defender gains a Power Gain Passive granting 10% of Max Power over 8 seconds. This Power Gain does not stack multiple times.
Each time the Attacker is inflicted with any Debuff, the Defender gains a Power Gain Passive granting 15% of Max Power over 8 seconds. This Power Gain does not stack multiple times.

For every hit on the Attacker's Combo Meter, the Defender's Power Gain is increased by 0.5% and their Special Attack Cost is decreased by -0.5%, up to 50% each. When the Attacker uses Special Attack 3, their Combo Meter is reset.
For every non-Damaging Debuff inflicted on the Defender, they gain a 10% Energize Passive for 10 seconds. Max Stacks: 3
For every non-Damaging Debuff inflicted on the Defender, they gain a 20% Energize Passive for 10 seconds. Max Stacks: 3
For every non-Damaging Debuff inflicted on the Defender, they gain a 30% Energize Passive for 10 seconds. Max Stacks: 3

For each Bar of Power the Attacker currently has, they gain a +50% Cruelty Passive. For every level of Special Attack the Attacker uses, the Defender gains a +50% Cruelty Passive for 10 seconds, and the Attacker loses a Cruelty Passive.

For each Bar of Power the Attacker currently has, they gain a +100% Cruelty Passive. For every level of Special Attack the Attacker uses, the Defender gains a +100% Cruelty Passive for 10 seconds, and the Attacker loses a Cruelty Passive.

For each Bar of Power the Attacker currently has, they gain a +150% Cruelty Passive. For every level of Special Attack the Attacker uses, the Defender gains a +150% Cruelty Passive for 10 seconds, and the Attacker loses a Cruelty Passive.
The Defender is Immune to Power Drain, Power Burn, Power Steal, Power Lock, Special Lock, and Enervate effects.
The Defender is Immune to Power Drain, Power Burn, Power Steal, Power Lock, Special Lock, and Enervate effects. Additionally, their Power Rates cannot be reduced below their starting values.

At the start of the fight, and 7 seconds after it is removed, the Defender gains an indefinite Cleanse Passive. When they are inflicted with a Debuff, it is immediately Purified and Cleanse is removed. Each time this Cleanse is removed the Attacker is Power Drained for 25% of a bar of Power.

At the start of the fight, and 7 seconds after it is removed, the Defender gains an indefinite Cleanse Passive. When they are inflicted with a Debuff, it is immediately Purified and Cleanse is removed. Each time this Cleanse is removed the Attacker is Power Drained for 50% of a bar of Power.

At the start of the fight, and 7 seconds after it is removed, the Defender gains an indefinite Cleanse Passive. When they are inflicted with a Debuff, it is immediately Purified and Cleanse is removed. Each time this Cleanse is removed the Attacker is Power Drained for 100% of a bar of Power.
Each time the Attacker leaves striking distance, the Defender gains a Power Gain Buff. When entering striking distance the Buff is removed.

#New Avengers, #A-Force or #Fantastic Four Attackers gain TAGtical Edge. If the Attacker is Cosmic or has TAGtical Edge, they gain a Power Gain Buff whenever they interrupt any of the Defender’s attacks, granting 33% of a Bar of Power over 8 seconds. Max stacks 1.
The Attacker cannot gain Power during the fight through normal means. While the Attacker is charging a Heavy Attack, they gain 8% of a Bar of Power every 0.1 seconds.
When the Attacker is Immune to a Power Drain, Power Burn, or Power Steal effect, they lose 10% of their Max Health.
When the Attacker is Immune to a Power Drain, Power Burn, or Power Steal effect, they lose 20% of their Max Health.
When the Attacker is Immune to a Power Drain, Power Burn, or Power Steal effect, they lose 30% of their Max Health.
When the Attacker is Immune to a Power Drain, Power Burn, or Power Steal effect, they lose 50% of their Max Health.

The Defender is immune to Stun Debuffs. While the Attacker has 1 or more Precision Buffs active, whenever they perform a Well-Timed Block they apply a Passive Stun to the Defender for 0.5 second(s) per Precision Buff. When this Passive Stun expires, all Precision Buffs on the Attacker are removed.
Whenever the Attacker ends a Combo with the same attack they ended their previous combo with, that attack has a 100% chance to be Auto-Blocked.
While the Defender has an Undermine effect, they gain a 400 Fury Passive, and a 400 Pierce Passive.
While the Defender has an Undermine effect, they gain a 550 Fury Passive, and a 550 Pierce Passive.
While the Defender has an Undermine effect, they gain a 700 Fury Passive, and a 700 Pierce Passive.
While the Defender is Unstoppable, they are Stun Immune.

The Attacker starts the fight with a Pressure Gauge value of 5. Landing Basic Attacks increases the value by 1 for each hit. Blocking an attack, or activating a Special Attack decreases the value by 1. If the value reaches 0, the Attacker's Power is drained to 0. If the value reaches 10, the Attacker receives a burst of direct energy damage equal to 100% of the Defenders Attack. If either of these are triggered, the Pressure Gauge value is resets to 5.

The Attacker starts the fight with a Pressure Gauge value of 5. Landing Basic Attacks increases the value by 1 for each hit. Blocking an attack, or activating a Special Attack decreases the value by 1. If the value reaches 0, the Attacker's Power is drained to 0. If the value reaches 10, the Attacker receives a burst of direct energy damage equal to 200% of the Defenders Attack. If either of these are triggered, the Pressure Gauge value is resets to 5.

The Attacker starts the fight with a Pressure Gauge value of 5. Landing Basic Attacks increases the value by 1 for each hit. Blocking an attack, or activating a Special Attack decreases the value by 1. If the value reaches 0, the Attacker's Power is drained to 0. If the value reaches 10, the Attacker receives a burst of direct energy damage equal to 300% of the Defenders Attack. If either of these are triggered, the Pressure Gauge value is resets to 5.
The Attacker's Special Attacks and Damage Over Time effects deal 95% less damage, but their Light and Medium Attacks deal 200% more damage.
The Attackers Well-Timed Blocks place a random Debuff from Weakness, Armor Break, Supression, or Disorient on the Defender for 13 seconds.

Each time a Fate Seal, Stagger, or Neutralize effect is applied to the Defender the Attacker steals 3% of a bar of Power from the Opponent. Whenever the Defender's Buffs are Nullified via Fate Seal or Stagger, or fail to trigger due to Neutralize, the Attacker gains a non-stacking Flourish Passive, increasing Combat Power Rate and Ability Power Rate by 10% for 10 seconds.

Whenever the Attacker's Buffs are nullified, expire, or fail to trigger due to reduced Ability Accuracy, the Defender gains a Passive Prowess increasing Special Attack damage by 30% until their next Special Attack.

Whenever the Attacker's Buffs are nullified, expire, or fail to trigger due to reduced Ability Accuracy, the Defender gains a Passive Prowess increasing Special Attack damage by 70% until their next Special Attack.

Whenever the Attacker's Buffs are nullified, expire, or fail to trigger due to reduced Ability Accuracy, the Defender gains a Passive Prowess increasing Special Attack damage by 100% until their next Special Attack.
The Defender gains 1% of their Max Power each time a Buff is Nullified or expires off the Attacker. Armor Break Debuffs Nullify Armor Up Buffs.
The Defender gains 2% of their Max Power each time a Buff is Nullified or expires off the Attacker. Armor Break Debuffs Nullify Armor Up Buffs.
The Defender gains 3% of their Max Power each time a Buff is Nullified or expires off the Attacker. Armor Break Debuffs Nullify Armor Up Buffs.

The Defender gains 12% of their Max Power each time a Buff is Nullified or expires off the Attacker. Armor Break Debuffs Nullify Armor Up Buffs.

The Defender starts the fight with an indefinite Prime Time Passive reducing the Ability Accuracy of incoming Damaging effects by 100%. Intercepting the Defender removes Prime Time. When it is removed or fails, Prime Time reactivates 12 seconds later.

The Defender starts the fight with an indefinite Prime Time Passive reducing the Ability Accuracy of incoming Damaging effects by 100%. Punishing the Defender's Heavy Attack removes Prime Time. When it is removed or fails, Prime Time reactivates 12 seconds later.

The Defender starts the fight with an indefinite Prime Time Passive reducing the Ability Accuracy of incoming Damaging effects by 100%. Punishing the Defender's Special Attack removes Prime Time. When it is removed or fails, Prime Time reactivates 12 seconds later.
Instantly gain 10% of his Max Power each time he Exploits a Weakness.
The Defender gains 1 Scourge Charge every 2 seconds. Max: 20. This timer is paused during Special Attacks, and for 3 seconds whenever the Attacker's Combo Meter reaches a multiple of 5.
The Defender gains 1 Scourge Charge every 2 seconds. Max: 20. This timer is paused during Special Attacks, and while the Defender is Cornered.
The Defender gains 1 Scourge Charge every 2 seconds. Max: 20. This timer is paused during Special Attacks, and for 1 second every time the Defender is inflicted with a Damage Over Time Debuff.
The Defender gains 1 Scourge Charge every 2 seconds. Max: 20. This timer is paused during Special Attacks, and for 2 seconds every time the Attacker Dodges an attack.
The Defender gains 1 Scourge Charge every 2 seconds. Max: 20. This timer is paused during Special Attacks, and for 3 seconds every time the Defender is knocked down by a Heavy Attack.
The Defender gains 1 Scourge Charge every 2 seconds. Max: 20. This timer is paused during Special Attacks, and for 4 seconds every time the Defender is Intercepted.

The Defender gains 1 Scourge Charge every 2 seconds. Max: 20. This timer is paused during Special Attacks, and for 1 second every time the Defender is inflicted with a non-Damaging Debuff, excluding Stuns.
The Defender gains 1 Scourge Charge every 2 seconds. Max: 20. This timer is paused during Special Attacks, and for 4 seconds every time the Defender's Special Attacks are Punished.
The Defender gains 1 Scourge Charge every 2 seconds. Max: 20. This timer is paused during Special Attacks, and for 3 seconds every time the Attacker Dodges a Special Attack hit.

The Defender gains 1 Scourge Charge every 2 seconds. Max: 20. This timer is paused during Special Attacks, and for 1 seconds every time the Defender is knocked down by a Special Attack per level of the Special Attack.
The Defender gains 1 Scourge Charge every 2 seconds. Max: 20. This timer is paused during Special Attacks, and for 4 seconds every time the Defender's Block is struck.

If the Defender would lose more than 5% health from a single source that damage is capped and the Protection shield shuts down for 10 seconds.
If the Defender would lose more than 4% health from a single source that damage is capped and the Protection shield shuts down for 8 seconds.

#Provocateur Defenders gain the following effects: •Regeneration and Ability Power Rates cannot be reduced below -50%. •When struck, gain a Regeneration Passive healing 1% of Base Health over 10 seconds. Max stacks: 10. •Gaining a Regeneration effect also grants an indefinite Power Gain Charge. Cannot gain Power Gain Charges for 7 seconds after having a Special Attack Punished. •Reaching 20 Power Gain Charges converts them into a Power Gain Passive, granting 100% of Max Power over 18 seconds. While this Power Gain is active, Defenders are more likely to throw Special Attacks and incoming Attacks have a 20% chance to Miss. These effects cannot be reduced by Ability Accuracy.

#Provocateur Defenders gain the following effects: •Regeneration and Ability Power Rates cannot be reduced below -25%. •When struck, gain a Regeneration Passive healing 3% of Base Health over 10 seconds. While this Power Gain is active, Defenders are more likely to throw Special Attacks and incoming Attacks have a 30% chance to Miss. These effects cannot be reduced by Ability Accuracy.

If the Defender has 3 Prowess Buffs or Passives, all their Specials are Passively Unblockable until the Prowesses are removed.
While the Defender has a Prowess effect, knocking them down with a Heavy Attack Invalidates 1 Prowess and grants the Attacker a 0.3% Prowess Buff for 15 seconds.
While the Defender has a Prowess effect, knocking them down with a Heavy Attack Invalidates 1 Prowess and grants the Attacker a 0.3% Prowess Buff for 10 seconds.

These effects all last for 10 seconds for each champions with these tags on your team: 1 tagged champion: Gain a Vigilance Passive. 2 tagged champions: Gain a True Accuracy Passive. 3 tagged champions: Block Unblockable Special Attacks.

Bosses cannot take more than .25% of their Max Health In a single hit. This Protection is removed for 5 Seconds when finishing a “Raid - Mission” Prompt, paused for 1 second when Striking the Defender.

Raid Bosses Cannot lose more than 12% of their Max HP in a single fight. When this threshold is hit they go unstoppable, unblockable, gain 1000% Attack, gain 100% of max power every second, and cannot have their Ability Accuracy reduced.

Effects from this node are unaffected by Ability Accuracy. Every 4% HP that a Raid boss loses causes them to enter their next Phase. The effects of these phases come from “Raid - Phase” Nodes. Whenever the Defender enters a new Phase: • Gain a 15 second Indestructible and Unblockable Passives. Striking the Defender with a Striker removes these Passives. While either are active, Defenders are more aggressive, and Attackers gain 50% increased Spirit Rate. •End the Current Influence Timer and Gain an Additional Influence.
The Attacker starts the fight with max Role Charges.
Every 25 seconds the Defender gains an Influence Charge.
Defenders gain 30% Critical Rating for each Influence Charge active. While at 5 or more Influence Charges, Defenders can Crit through Block.
Defenders gain 5% Block and Armor Penetration for each Influence Charge active. While at 5 or more Influence Charges, reduce the duration of incoming stun effects on the Defender by 100%.
Defenders gain 75% Attack Rating for each Influence Charge active. While at 5 or more Influence Charges, the Opponent is Rooted for the Duration of the Defender's Special Attacks.

At the Start of the fight, a random prompt of strike the Defender with 4 Medium Attacks, or 5 Light Attacks will be chosen. Each time this is done successfully, gain Raid Fervor, and reroll for a prompt. At 50 Raid Fervor, complete the Mission and gain a Role Charge.
Attackers must alternate their Combo Enders between Medium and Light Attacks. Each time this is done successfully, gain Raid Fervor. At 50 Raid Fervor, complete the Mission and gain a Role Charge.

M.O.D.O.K will call out a random game action of Whiff 2 Attacks, Knockdown the Defender while not Stunned, or Hit into Block 4 times. After the called-out action is completed, gain Raid Fervor. At 50 Raid Fervor, complete the Mission and gain a Role Charge.
Attackers must Punish the Defender's Heavy or Special Attacks. Each time this is done successfully, gain Raid Fervor. At 50 Raid Fervor, complete the Mission and gain a Role Charge.
Attackers must alternate their Special Attacks. Each time this is done successfully, gain Raid Fervor. At 50 Raid Fervor, complete the Mission and gain a Role Charge.

Thanos will call out a random game action of Strike the opponent with a light while not stunned, Knockdown, or Dodge a Hit. After the called-out action is completed, gain Raid Fervor. At 50 Raid Fervor, complete the Mission and gain a Role Charge.

Whenever a Penance Timer expires, defenders inflict a Crush Passive for 5 seconds, increased by 1 second per Penance charge. While active, defenders are unstoppable during their Dash Attacks.

Whenever a Penance Timer expires, defenders gain a 10% Inexorable Passive for 12 seconds, increased by 1 second per Penance charge. While active, Defenders are stun immune during Medium and Light Attacks and deal a burst of 20% of their Attack as Direct Damage on Contact.

At the start of the fight a 30 second Penance Timer with 10 Penance Charges begins. This timer is paused during Special Attacks and restarts as soon as it expires. When the timer expires, the Defender gains a 5% Inexorable Passive for 10 seconds. Each Penance Charge increases the potency by an additional flat +5%. Penance Charges are removed each time a prompt from a RAIDS - Mission is completed.
Whenever a Penance timer expires, the Defender gains a 5% Inexorable Passive for 10 seconds. Each Penance Charge increases the potency by an additional flat +5%.

While the Attacker has more than 33% of their Max Power, their Combat Power Rate is increased by 75%. If the Attacker has more than 75% of their Max Power, they are immediately Power Drained down to zero.

For each Debuff, Defender gains +65% Attack and +20% Combat Power Rate. Bleed, Poison and Armor Break Debuffs count twice for this effect.

Intercepting the opponent’s Dash Attack with a Basic Attack grants the Attacker a Reinforce Passive and a Bulwark Passive increasing Block Proficiency by 10000, both lasting for 15 seconds.

If this Incinerate is Purified or prevented by Immunity, instead inflict a Degeneration Passive dealing 60% of the Defender's Attack over 7 seconds.

If this Shock is Purified or prevented by Immunity, instead inflict a Degeneration Passive dealing 60% of the Defender's Attack over 7 seconds.
When the Attacker activates a Special Attack while the Defender is Passively Stunned, they gain a non-stacking 100% Reverb Passive for 8 seconds, paused until the end of their Special.
When the Attacker activates a Special Attack while the Defender is Passively Stunned, they gain a non-stacking 150% Reverb Passive for 8 seconds, paused until the end of their Special.

When the Defender Blocks an attack, they have a 50% chance to gain a 10% Reverb Passive for 15 seconds.
When the Defender Blocks an attack, they have a 70% chance to gain a 10% Reverb Passive for 15 seconds.

Whichever Champion has more Unique Buffs gains a stacking Passive Fury every 1 second(s), each increasing Attack rating by 10%.
Whichever Champion has more Unique Buffs gains a stacking Passive Fury every 1 second(s), each increasing Attack rating by 15%.

Whichever Champion has more Unique Buffs gains 15% of a Bar of Power per second.
While the Attacker's back is against the wall, the Defender's Special Attacks cannot be avoided with Dexterity.

Whenever the Attacker blocks a hit during the Defender's Specials, they gain a non-stacking Bulwark Passive increasing their Block Prof. by 60% for 9 second(s). Well Timed Blocks increase this bonus to 90%.

The Defender gains a 4 second Debuff Immunity Passive whenever they activate a Special Attack. Activating a Striker transfers the Debuff Immunity from the Defender to the Attacker for 12 seconds.
The Defender gains a 8 second Debuff Immunity Passive whenever they activate a Special Attack. Activating a Striker transfers the Debuff Immunity from the Defender to the Attacker for 12 seconds.
The Defender gains a 12 second Debuff Immunity Passive whenever they activate a Special Attack. Activating a Striker transfers the Debuff Immunity from the Defender to the Attacker for 12 seconds.

When the Defender is knocked down by a Heavy or Special Attack they become Debuff Immune for 6 seconds.
When the Defender is knocked down by a Heavy or Special Attack they become Debuff Immune for 8 seconds.

At the start of the fight, and whenever the Defender is struck with the first hit of a Heavy Attack, they gain an indefinite Unblockable Buff. Whenever they are knocked down by a Special Attack, they gain an Unstoppable Buff. Gaining one of these Buffs removes the other one.

At the start of the fight, and whenever the Defender is struck with the first hit of a Heavy Attack, they gain an indefinite Unblockable Passive. Whenever they are knocked down by a Special Attack, they gain an indefinite Unstoppable Passive. Gaining one of these Passives removes the other one. Both Passives are unaffected by Ability Accuracy.

Whenever the Attacker gains a Buff they have a 25% chance to Purify a Debuff. Superiority: Chance increases by a flat 25% per Buff.
When the Defender is knocked down a 4 second timer starts. While active, each time the Defender lands a hit or strikes into the block, they gain 15% of a Bar of Power.
When the Defender is knocked down a 4 second timer starts. While active, each time the Defender lands a hit or strikes into the block, they gain 30% of a Bar of Power.
When the Defender is knocked down a 4 second timer starts. While active, each time the Defender lands a hit or strikes into the block, they gain 50% of a Bar of Power.
Ægon's Persistent Combo increases by 10 every 5 second(s).

When the Defender is Struck, the Attacker gains a Fury Buff granting 2.5% Attack Rating for 25 seconds. Once the Attacker has 10 Fury Buffs, any additional ones will inflict them with a stacking Passive Degeneration dealing 12% the Defender's Attack over 4 seconds. If the Attacker lands a Heavy Attack their Fury Buffs are removed.
Whenever the Attacker does not have any Buffs applied to them, the Defender passively Regenerates 1% of their Max Health every second.
The Attacker gains a Fury Passive equal to +200% of their Armor rating for the duration of their Special Attacks.

When the Defender is struck by or Blocks a Light or Medium Attack, there is a 70% chance to inflict the Attacker with a 25% Petrify Debuff for 8 seconds. While the Attacker is suffering from a Petrify effect, the Defender gains 10% of a Bar of Power every second.

When the Defender is struck by or Blocks a Light or Medium Attack, there is a 70% chance to inflict the Attacker with a 50% Petrify Debuff for 8 seconds. While the Attacker is suffering from a Petrify effect, the Defender gains 10% of a Bar of Power every second.

When the Defender is struck by or Blocks a Light or Medium Attack, there is a 70% chance to inflict the Attacker with a 100% Petrify Debuff for 8 seconds. While the Attacker is suffering from a Petrify effect, the Defender gains 10% of a Bar of Power every second.
The Class Relationships on this Node are reversed.
Each time the Defender receives a Stun Debuff, they reduce the duration of further Stun Debuffs by 20% unless the Attacker has an active Buff or Prowess Passive when the Stun Debuff is inflicted.
This Defender's Special Attack damage is increased by 10% every 10 second(s).

Every 12 seconds, the Attacker gets Passively Rooted for 5 seconds. If the Attacker is far away from the Defender when this triggers, the Defender gets Passively Rooted instead. The timer will only restart after the Root has expired and it is paused during Specials.

Blocking Hits grants a Root Charge, up to a max of 15. Well-Timed Blocks grant 5 Root Charges instead. Once the Attacker has max Root Charges, a Well-Timed Block or dashing back and holding Block for 1.2 seconds Passively Roots the Opponent for 3.5 seconds. A Rooted Champion’s Special Attacks remove Root. Boost not usable in Battlegrounds.

Landing hits grants a Root Charge, up to a max of 15. The last hit of Heavy Attacks grants 5 Root Charges. Once the Attacker has max Root Charges, the last hit of their Heavy Attack instead removes all Charges and Passively Roots the Opponent for 3.5 seconds. A Rooted Champion’s Special Attacks remove Root. Boost not usable in Battlegrounds.

Whenever either Champion gains a Bar of Power, the Attacker gains 5 Root Charges, up to 15. Once the Attacker has max Root charges, activating a Special Attack Passively Roots their Opponent for 3.5 seconds, paused during the Attacker’s Special Attacks. A Rooted Champion’s Special Attacks remove Root. Boost not usable in Battlegrounds.

When the Attacker is Struck, 40% chance to Root their Opponent for 3.5 seconds. Chance is increased by 60% flat if the Attacker is Stunned, or their Opponent is Unblockable or Unstoppable. This ability has a 18 second cooldown. A Rooted Champion’s Special Attacks remove Root. Boost not usable in Battlegrounds.

The Attacker gains 1 Root Charge every second, up to a max of 15. Once the Attacker has max Root charges, a 5 second countdown timer starts. When the timer expires, their Opponent is Passively Rooted for 3.5 seconds. A Rooted Champion’s Special Attacks remove Root. Boost not usable in Battlegrounds.
After the Defender’s Special Attack ends, the Attacker is Rooted for 5 seconds. Remove Root by Launching Special Attacks. Landing basic attacks allows translation.
After the Defender’s Special Attack ends, the Attacker is Rooted for 5 seconds. Remove Root by landing a Light Attack or Launching a Special Attack.
After the Defender’s Special Attack ends, the Attacker is Rooted for 5 seconds. Remove Root by charging a Heavy Attack or Launching a Special Attack.

Whenever the Attacker's Combo Meter reaches 20, or a multiple of 20, the Defender gains a stacking 5 second Unblockable Buff.

The first blast of the Grandmaster's Special 1 is no longer Unblockable, however it gains +200% Attack Rating.
Attack Rating granted from each Token of Competence is increased by 50%, however the Grandmaster also gains +30% Attack Rating for each Token.
The amount of Tokens of Competence that can persist between fights is increased to a maximum of 10, however the Tokens of Blunder required for Game Over is now 3.

The Attacker starts with 7 Rushdown Charges. When the Defender's Dash Attack lands or is Blocked, remove 1 Charge. Knocking Down the Defender restores 1 Charge. When the Attacker has no Charges, they are inflicted with a Stun Passive for 3 seconds, then all their Rushdown Charges are restored.

The Attacker starts with 5 Rushdown Charges. When the Defender's Dash Attack lands or is Blocked, remove 1 Charge. Knocking Down the Defender restores 1 Charge. When the Attacker has no Charges, they are inflicted with a Stun Passive for 3 seconds, then all their Rushdown Charges are restored.

The Attacker starts with 3 Rushdown Charges. When the Defender's Dash Attack lands or is Blocked, remove 1 Charge. Knocking Down the Defender restores 1 Charge. When the Attacker has no Charges, they are inflicted with a Stun Passive for 3 seconds, then all their Rushdown Charges are restored.
If the Defending Red Guardian's shield becomes Fractured, its cooldown can't exceed 10 seconds.

When the Defender is struck, 40% chance to inflict Armor Break on the Attacker, reducing their Armor Rating by 25% over 10 seconds. If the Attacker has 5 or more of these Armor Breaks active on them, they are consumed and turned into an indefinite Armor Break Debuff.

Prevents the Defender from losing more than 2% Health from any source while being Struck or Blocking Hits.

#Saga Attackers gain an indefinite 35% Endurance Passive when the Dormant Virus expires, if they do not already have it. While this Endurance is active, each time the Dormant Virus activates, they gain 15% of Missing Health as Adrenaline and gain a 15% Fury Passive lasting 5 seconds. This Fury Passive starts paused and unpauses when the Attacker lands a hit.

#Saga Attackers gain a Dormant Virus, granting 80% Critical Damage Rating and 15% Critical Resistance for 10 seconds. This ability starts on a 10 second cooldown and repeats the cooldown each time the Dormant Virus expires.

#Saga Attackers have a 10% chance to spread their Outbreak to the Defender each time contact is made, increased to 30% while the Dormant Virus is active. Outbreak deals 10% of the Attacker’s Attack as Direct Damage over 8 seconds. Applying this Outbreak a total of 10 times upgrades the Attacker's Dormant Virus to an indefinite Spreading Virus, with a 40% chance to apply Outbreak.

#Saga Attackers Gain the Following Bonuses •Dodging grants a 0.5s Untouchable passive. •Any time the opponent Misses a hit, gain a 15 second Cruelty Passive increasing Critical Damage rating by 500. Max: 5. These Cruelty’s are paused until the attackers Struck, or Blocks a hit. •If at 5 Cruelty Passives, gain 2000 Critical Rating.

#Saga Attackers Gain the Following Bonuses •Knocking down the opponent inflicts a 15 second 20% Potency Debuff Siphon Passive. Max: 3 •If 3 Debuff Siphon Passives are active, Attackers Special, and Heavy Attacks gain 50% Attack Rating.

#Saga Attackers gain the following bonuses: •Blocking an attack or being struck grants 1 Rock Stack. Well-Timed Blocks grant 5 Rock Stacks. Max: 15. Rock Stacks increase Physical and Energy Resistance by +100.: •Activating a Special Attack consumes all Rock Stacks to grant a Fury Passive for 15 seconds, increasing Attack Rating by +20% for each Rock Stack consumed. Max: 2. •If struck while one of these Fury Passives are active, consume it to gain an Unstoppable Passive for 2 seconds.

#Saga Attackers Gain the Following Bonuses •Charging a Heavy Attack grants 10 Temperature per second. Striking the Opponent with a Heavy Attack grants 5 Temperature. •When Reaching 100 Temperature, gain a Flame on Passive. While active, Basic attacks deal a burst of 50% of the Attackers Attack as Direct Damage. Temperature cannot be gained while a Flame On passive is active, and reduces by 5 every second. Flame on is removed when reaching 0 Temperature.

The Defender is Immune to Power Lock, Drain, Burn, and Steal. This Immunity goes on cooldown for 4 seconds after the Defender uses a Special Attack. Striking the Defender refreshes the cooldown.
A certain nephew starts the fight with a Passive Fury increasing Attack Rating by +200%.

The Defender has a 30% chance to deal 30% of their Base Attack as Physical Damage when struck unless they are suffering from a Petrify Debuff or Passive. Whenever the Attacker inflicts a Slow, Decelerate or Taunt Debuff or Passive they inflict a 20 second 25% Petrify Debuff.

The Defender has a 60% chance to deal 30% of their Base Attack as Physical Damage when struck unless they are suffering from a Petrify Debuff or Passive. Whenever the Attacker inflicts a Slow, Decelerate or Taunt Debuff or Passive they inflict a 15 second 25% Petrify Debuff.

The Defender has a 90% chance to deal 30% of their Base Attack as Physical Damage when struck unless they are suffering from a Petrify Debuff or Passive. Whenever the Attacker inflicts a Slow, Decelerate or Taunt Debuff or Passive they inflict a 10 second 25% Petrify Debuff.
Every 10 seconds the Attacker is inflicted with a Root Debuff for 4 seconds. This Timer is paused while the Attacker is Rooted and is reset if the Attacker lands a hit.
Every 8 seconds the Attacker is inflicted with a Root Debuff for 4 seconds. This Timer is paused while the Attacker is Rooted and is reset if the Attacker lands a hit.

Each time the Attacker is inflicted with any Debuff, the Defender gains a Fury Buff granting 120% Attack Rating for 6 seconds. This Fury does not stack multiple times.
Each time the Attacker is inflicted with any Debuff, the Defender gains a Fury Buff granting 240% Attack Rating for 8 seconds. This Fury does not stack multiple times.

Science Champions receive +20% base Attack. Additionally, adjacency in the Class Wheel grants Skill Champions +10% base Attack.
Science Champions receive +30% base Attack and Mystic Champions receive -10% base Attack penalty. Additionally, adjacency in the Class Wheel grants Skill Champions +15% base Attack.
Science Champions receive +40% base Attack and Mystic Champions receive -40% base Attack penalty. Additionally, adjacency in the Class Wheel grants Skill Champions +20% base Attack.

After Evading or Auto-Blocking an attack, Attack Rating is increased by 40% for the next 10 hits. Evade and Auto-Block Ability Accuracy is increased by 60% and those do not trigger if a Parry is about to activate.

If landing an attack causes a Debuff to activate that Debuff gains +50% duration. Additionally, all Special Attacks have a 40% chance to inflict Concussion on their last hit, reducing the opponent's Ability Accuracy by 25% for 8 seconds.
Blasts a portion of remaining Health. Effective against Mystic but resisted by Skill.
Reduces the duration of the target's Debuff effects by 50% when facing a target of the Science Class.
All Science Champions in this Arena receive Fury for the length of the fight, raising Attack by 125%.

Science Attackers: While the Defender is suffering from a non-Damaging Debuff, the Attacker gains +300 Energy Resistance. While they are suffering from more than 1, also gain +300 Physical Resistance. Basic Attacks deal up to 15% of Attack as bursts of Physical Damage based on Energy Resistance, and up to an additional 15% based on Physical Resistance. Max potency at 300 Energy/Physical Resistance.

Cross-Fight Ability: Entering into a fight with any Science Champion without a Combustion Passive, grants them 3 which are Persistant throughout the quest. Each Combustion Passive grants the Attacker +20% Ability Accuracy and +30% Prowess. At the end of every fight, regardless of result, remove 1 Combustion Passive from the Attacker.

For each Science Champion brought on your team, each of your Science Champions gains the following abilities: 1 Champion: Your Offensive Combat Power Rate is increased by 5% per Science Champion, Max of 15%. 2 Champions: Each time the Attacker fills a Bar of Power generate a Passive Prowess increasing the Special Attack damage by 15% and stacking up to 2 times per Science Champion on your team. 3 Champions: Special Attacks become Unblockable at 5+ Prowess effects. Additionally for each stack of Prowess increase, Attack Rating during Special attacks by 10%.

Science Attackers have a 20% chance per Weakness, Exhaustion or Fatigue Debuff on the Defender to inflict a 20 seconds Fragility Debuff on each hit. Fragility increases the Attacker's Critical Damage by +30 and lowers the Defender's Block Proficiency by 10%. Additionally Science Attackers gain an Indefinite 35% Fury Passive each time a Debuff expires on the Defender. Max: 10.
Science Attackers gain 50% Fury Passive at the beginning of the fight, and 16.6% is removed for every 10 hits on their Combo Meter. Skill Attackers gain 10% increased Critical Rating.

Science Attackers gain 55.5% Fury Buff at the beginning of the fight, and 11.1% is removed for every 10 hits on their Combo Meter. Skill Attackers gain 15% increased Critical Rating. Mystic Attackers suffer 25% reduced Power from all sources.

Science Attackers gain 50% Fury at the beginning of the fight, and 8.3% is removed for every 10 hits on their Combo Meter. Skill Attackers gain 20% increased Critical Rating. Mystic Attackers suffer 40% reduced Power from all sources.

Cross-Fight: When an attacking Science champion on your team is affected by a: Bleed, Poison, Shock, Incinerate, Coldsnap Debuff for 5 seconds total in a fight they Purify all of that type of Debuff, and reduce the potency of any future Debuffs of that type by 100%. This Champion has this effect for their next 3 fights.
