Once per fight, if a hit will knock an Attacker out, instead the Attacker gains an Indestructible Passive lasting for 7 seconds. During this time, the Defender is more aggressive. Each time the Attacker is struck, they gain a permanent 50% Fury Passive.

This War Machine enters the fight with a "second line of equipment", granting a massive amount of Fury and Armor Up Buffs. Fury Buffs are removed when War Machine lands hits and Armor Up Buffs are removed when struck. Each Fury grants 2% Attack Rating and each Armor Up grants 5.5% Armor Rating.
Whenever the Defender Purifies or Cleanses a Debuff, they gain a Damage Reflection Passive for 4 seconds dealing back 10% of the damage dealt by the Attacker.
Whenever the Defender Purifies or Cleanses a Debuff, they gain a Damage Reflection Passive for 6 seconds dealing back 25% of the damage dealt by the Attacker.
Whenever the Defender Purifies or Cleanses a Debuff, they gain a Damage Reflection Passive for 8 seconds dealing back 50% of the damage dealt by the Attacker.

Whenever the Defender Purifies or Cleanses a Debuff, they gain an Unblockable Charge. If the Defender reaches 4 Unblockable Charges, they gain an Unblockable Passive for 6 seconds.
Whenever the Defender Purifies or Cleanses a Debuff, they gain an Unblockable Charge. If the Defender reaches 3 Unblockable Charges, they gain an Unblockable Passive for 8 seconds.

#Secutor Attackers gain the following effects: •Inflicting any Debuff other than Stun grants 1 indefinite Secutor Charge. •Reaching 5 Secutor Charges consumes them to inflict the Defender with a Heal Block Passive for 15 seconds. •While the Defender is suffering from a Heal Block effect, their Ability Power Rate is reduced by 75%, and the Attacker cannot Miss. These effects cannot be reduced by Ability Accuracy.

Mutant Attackers reduce the potency of Bleed Debuffs by 90%, and when activating a Special Attack they remove any Bleed Debuffs on themselves. When this happens their Ability Accuracy is increased by 100%. Whenever a Mutant Attacker Purifies, removes, or is immune to a Bleed effect they gain an indefinite Passive Fury increasing their base Attack Rating by 35%. Max stacks 10.

Every 20 second(s) the Defender’s health is instantly restored to Full and any Debuffs on them are removed, this cannot be prevented with Ability Accuracy Reduction. Incinerate and Shock Debuffs prevent this Regeneration.

The Defenders Special 1 and Special 3 are Special Locked.
The Defenders Special 1 and Special 2 are Special Locked.
Increase the Defender's Ability Power Rate by 50% while the Attacker is suffering from a Debuff.
Increase the Defender's Ability Power Rate by 100% while the Attacker is suffering from a Debuff.
Increase the Defender's Ability Power Rate by 200% while the Attacker is suffering from a Debuff.

When Corrupted Armor re-activates, Scytalis gains one of the following Buffs at random: Pierce Buff: increasing Block Penetration by 15% indefinitely. Amplify Buff: increasing Ability Power Rate by 40% indefinitely.
Whenever the Defender blocks an Attack, the Attacker is inflicted with a 100% Petrify Passive for 15 seconds. Superiority: Intercepting the Defender inflicts them with the Petrify instead.

Whenever the Defender is knocked down they remove their active Debuffs. If more than 6 Debuffs are removed, they take 500% of the Attacker's Attack as direct damage. Otherwise, the Attacker takes a burst of physical damage equal to 50% of the Defender's Attack.
If the Attacker's Grade is 7 or below, or ISO, their Well-Timed Blocks grant them a +50% Prowess Passive for 10 seconds.
If the Attacker's Grade is 7 or above, or ISO, their Well-Timed Blocks grant them a +50% Prowess Passive for 10 seconds.

When the Attacker Whiffs a Basic Attack, they generate a fixed 25% of a Bar of Power, ignoring Power Rate. This is the only way they can gain Power in this fight.
When the Attacker Whiffs a Basic Attack, they generate a fixed 20% of a Bar of Power, ignoring Power Rate. This is the only way they can gain Power in this fight.

Every 10 second(s) the Attacker is inflicted with an indefinite Concussion Passive reducing Ability Accuracy by 20%. Max 5. Whenever the Attacker knocks down the Defender, all Concussions are removed.
Skill Attackers Purify 1 Debuff(s) whenever they Dash backwards. The number of Debuffs Purified increases by 1 for every subsequent Dash performed in a row.
When striking into the Defenders block, the Attacker has a 40% chance to be inflicted with a Bleed Debuff dealing up to 1% of the Defenders Attack as direct damage over 10 seconds.
When striking into the Defenders block, the Attacker has a 70% chance to be inflicted with a Bleed Debuff dealing up to 1% of the Defenders Attack as direct damage over 10 seconds.
When striking into the Defenders block, the Attacker has a 100% chance to be inflicted with a Bleed Debuff dealing up to 1% of the Defenders Attack as direct damage over 10 seconds.
Any time the Attacker triggers a Regeneration Buff or Passive effect, the Defender gains 100% of the health the Attacker gains from that Buff or Passive effect.
When the Attacker Blocks an attack, they are inflicted with 5 Bleed Debuffs, each dealing 10% of the Defender's Attack over 3 seconds. Cooldown: 3 seconds.
When the Attacker Blocks an attack, they are inflicted with 5 Bleed Debuffs, each dealing 35% of the Defender's Attack over 3 seconds. Cooldown: 3 seconds.
When the Attacker Blocks an attack, they are inflicted with 5 Bleed Debuffs, each dealing 50% of the Defender's Attack over 3 seconds. Cooldown: 3 seconds.
Each time the Attacker has an effect Nullified they receive a burst of Direct Damage equal to 20% of the Defender's Modified Attack Rating. Armor Break Debuffs Nullify Armor Up Buffs.
Each time the Attacker has an effect Nullified they receive a burst of Direct Damage equal to 30% of the Defender's Modified Attack Rating. Armor Break Debuffs Nullify Armor Up Buffs.

When the Defender Nullifies a Buff off the Attacker, the Attacker takes 1300 Direct Damage.

When the Attacker gains a Bar of Power, a 10 second timer starts. If the timer expires, the Defender gains a Debuff Immunity Passive for 10 seconds. Knocking down the Defender removes the timer.
When the Attacker gains a Bar of Power, a 5 second timer starts. If the timer expires, the Defender gains a Debuff Immunity Passive for 15 seconds. Knocking down the Defender removes the timer.

When the Defender is Knocked Down they gain an Auto-Block charge for 6 seconds. If the Defender is struck while this charge is active, it is consumed and the Defender gains a 100% chance to Auto-Block the attack.

When the Defender is Knocked Down they gain an Auto-Block charge for 8 seconds. If the Defender is struck while this charge is active, it is consumed and the Defender gains a 100% chance to Auto-Block the attack.

When the Defender is Knocked Down they gain an Auto-Block charge for 10 seconds. If the Defender is struck while this charge is active, it is consumed and the Defender gains a 100% chance to Auto-Block the attack.
The Defender starts the fight with Bleed Immunity, which alternates every 10 second(s) with Poison Immunity. When an Immunity triggers, it Purifies any corresponding effects.

Only applies to Mutant Champions. Most useful in "Winter Morning." When the Defender is struck by a Special 1 or 2, they Passively heal 200% damage mitigated by Armor or Resistances. Boost not usable in Battlegrounds.

When the Defender gains a bar of power, a 5 second timer is started, unless already active. If the Attacker activates a special attack before the timer expires, they steal 10% of the Defender's current Power and gain Power equal to that stolen, and the timer is removed. If the timer expires naturally, the Attacker drains 10% of the Defender's power.

If summoned after landing the fourth Light Attack, the Regeneration restores 6% of their missing Health over 10 second(s) instead. Landing Hits and being Struck builds the meter for this Striker.
If the Attacker doesn't have a Striker equipped, or their Spirit Gauge is empty and a Striker is not active, they lose 2% of Max Health every 0.5 seconds.
If the Attacker doesn't have a Striker equipped, or their Spirit Gauge is empty and a Striker is not active, the Defender generates 2% Max Power every 0.5 seconds.

If the Attacker doesn't have a Striker equipped, or their Spirit Gauge is empty and a Striker is not active, the Attacker is indefinitely Passively Rooted. If this Root is prevented or removed due to a Special Attack, it activates at the end of the Attack.
Defender’s attacks have a 10% chance to inflict a Stun Debuff for 1.5 seconds.
While the Defender is Stunned, the Attacker's Attack Rating is increased by 200% when landing an attack.
When the Attacker gains a Bar of Power, they are inflicted with a Power Sting Debuff for 6 seconds that deals 40% of the Defender's Attack Rating as damage.
When the Attacker gains a Bar of Power, they are inflicted with a Power Sting Debuff for 6 seconds that deals 70% of the Defender's Attack Rating as damage.
When the Attacker gains a Bar of Power, they are inflicted with a Power Sting Debuff for 6 seconds that deals 100% of the Defender's Attack Rating as damage.

Whenever a Mutant Attacker's Parry Stun is Purified, Cleansed, or prevented due to Ability Accuracy, they instead inflict a a Stun Passive for 3 seconds, unaffected by Ability Accuracy. At the start of the fight, the Defender gains a indefinite Stun Shield. While this shield is active the Defender can't be Stunned. Every time a Stun is attempted, the Attacker is inflicted with a Stun Debuff for 3 seconds. Inflicting the Defender with either Bleed or Shock puts the Shield on cooldown for 8 seconds. While this cooldown is active, the Attacker gains a +40% Fury Passive.

While this cooldown is active, the Attacker gains +40% Attack Rating.
If a Romance synergy or the Self Love Boost is active on the Attacker, they prevent Stun reflection from the Hard Head node. Each time this happens, they gain an indefinite +35% Fury Passive.
Increase the duration of Stun effects on the Attacker by 100%.

If Tactus Charges are not at 0 when the timer expires, the Attacker is inflicted with a Degen Passive dealing 50% of the Attacker's Max Health over 5 seconds. When the timer expires, the timer and Tactus Charges are reset.
While the Defender is suffering from a Weakness or Disorient Debuff, the Attacker deals a burst of Physical Damage on all Basic Attacks equal to 50% of their Attack.
While the Defender is suffering from a Weakness or Disorient Debuff, the Attacker deals a burst of Physical Damage on all Basic Attacks equal to 100% of their Attack.

The Attacker starts the fight with a Thermostat value of 10. Basic Attacks increase the value by 1. Blocking an attack or activating a Special Attack decreases the value by 2.\mIf the Thermostat reaches 0, the Attacker is inflicted with Coldsnap Debuff, and if it reaches 20, an Incinerate Debuff. These Debuffs deal 100% of the Defender's Attack Rating as Energy Damage over 2 seconds. Triggering either of these resets the Thermostat to 10.

Whenever the attacker gains an Unblockable, Unstoppable, Indestructible, Power Gain or Evade effect, the Defender gains a Buff that is a version of that effect, lasting for 5 second(s). Power Gain grants 5% of max Power and has a max stacks of 5, and evade grants 10% chance to evade. Power Gain from Mystic Dispersion does not interact with this effect.

Whenever the attacker gains an Unblockable, Unstoppable, Indestructible, Power Gain or Evade effect, the Defender gains a Buff that is a version of that effect, lasting for 10 second(s). Power Gain grants 10% of max Power and has a max stacks of 5, and evade grants 20% chance to evade. Power Gain from Mystic Dispersion does not interact with this effect.

Power Gain grants 15% of max Power and has a max stacks of 5, and evade grants 30% chance to evade. Power Gain from Mystic Dispersion does not interact with this effect.

Whenever Scourge reaches a multiple of 5, the Defender gains Debuff Immunity for 3 seconds and Scourge gains are paused for 3 seconds. When this happens at 15 Scourge, if Scourge doesn't decrease by the end of the pause, the Attacker is Eradicated for 20% of the Defender's Base Attack.

Whenever Scourge reaches a multiple of 5, the Attacker is inflicted with a Falter Debuff for 4 seconds and Scourge gains are paused for 3 seconds. When this happens at 15 Scourge, if Scourge doesn't decrease by the end of the pause, the Attacker is Eradicated for 20% of the Defender's Base Attack.

Whenever Scourge reaches a multiple of 5, the Defender gains a 20% Inexorable Passive for 4 seconds and Scourge gains are paused for 3 seconds. When this happens at 15 Scourge, if Scourge doesn't decrease by the end of the pause, the Attacker is Eradicated for 20% of the Defender's Base Attack.

Whenever Scourge reaches a multiple of 3, the Attacker is inflicted with a 200% Neutralize Passive for 6 seconds and Scourge gains are paused for 3 seconds. When this happens at 15 Scourge, if Scourge doesn't decrease by the end of the pause, the Attacker is Eradicated for 20% of the Defender's Base Attack.

Whenever Scourge reaches a multiple of 5, the Attacker is inflicted with a Reversed Controls Passive for 3 seconds and Scourge gains are paused for 3 seconds. When this happens at 15 Scourge, if Scourge doesn't decrease by the end of the pause, the Attacker is Eradicated for 20% of the Defender's Base Attack.

Whenever Scourge reaches a multiple of 5, the Attacker is Passively Rooted for 3 seconds and Scourge gains are paused for 3 seconds. When this happens at 15 Scourge, if Scourge doesn't decrease by the end of the pause, the Attacker is Eradicated for 20% of the Defender's Base Attack.

Whenever Scourge reaches a multiple of 5, the Defender gains an Unblockable Passive for 6 seconds and Scourge gains are paused for 3 seconds. When this happens at 15 Scourge, if Scourge doesn't decrease by the end of the pause, the Attacker is Eradicated for 20% of the Defender's Base Attack.

Defeat the Defender before the timer runs out! Pausing does not pause the timer! If you fail to defeat the Defender in time, both the Attacker and Defender will be reset to Full Health on your next attempt. Special 3 is not enabled on the Defender.

Every 10 seconds the Defender gains an indefinite Perforate Charge, making the next hit of their Special Attack Passively Unblockable. Perforate Charges are consumed regardless of whether the Attack hits. This timer is paused during either Champion's Special Attacks. Dodging back and holding Block activates a 0.6 second timer. When the Defender gains a Regen effect they also gain a Precision Passive granting +60% Crit Chance for 8 seconds.

Lane Killer Cross-Fight: The Attackers Well-Timed Blocks inflict a Debilitate Charge, each increasing the duration of the next Bleed, Poison, Incinerate, Coldsnap or Armor break Debuff inflicted onto the Defender by 50%. Max stacks 3. The effects of this node lasts for this fight and the next 3 Fights.
When the Attacker fills a bar of Power, they have 10 second(s) to use a Special Attack, or 20% of their Max Power is instantly Drained.
When the Attacker fills a bar of Power, they have 8 second(s) to use a Special Attack, or 20% of their Max Power is instantly Drained.
When the Attacker fills a bar of Power, they have 6 second(s) to use a Special Attack, or 20% of their Max Power is instantly Drained.
The Attacker's total Combat Power Rate is reduced by 100%. Every 10 hits on the Attacker's Combo Meter, steal 100% of a bar of power from the Defender. Gain 100% of the Power stolen.
The Attacker's total Combat Power Rate is reduced by 100%. Every 15 hits on the Attacker's Combo Meter, steal 100% of a bar of power from the Defender. Gain 100% of the Power stolen.
The Attacker's total Combat Power Rate is reduced by 100%. Every 20 hits on the Attacker's Combo Meter, steal 100% of a bar of power from the Defender. Gain 100% of the Power stolen.
Night Thrasher's Special Attack 1 releases all 3 Gadget Debuffs at once and can be inflicted when Blocked.

Only applies to Mystic Champions. Most useful in "Revolt." Whenever the Attacker Nullifies one of the Defenders Buffs, the Defender is inflicted with a Passive Degeneration, dealing 50% of the Attackers Attack as direct damage over 8 seconds. Each time a Degeneration is inflicted, all active Degenerations from this Boost are refreshed, stacking up to a maximum of 10. Boost not usable in Battlegrounds.

Every 16 seconds the Defender gains a Protection Passive, reducing all incoming damage by 20%. All Protection Passives are removed whenever the Defender is struck by a Striker while the Attacker has a Prowess effect. While the Defender does not have one of these Protection Passives, the Attacker gains 50% of their base Attack Rating.

Every 14 seconds the Defender gains a Protection Passive, reducing all incoming damage by 20%. All Protection Passives are removed whenever the Defender is struck by a Striker while the Attacker has a Prowess effect. While the Defender does not have one of these Protection Passives, the Attacker gains 50% of their base Attack Rating.

Every 12 seconds the Defender gains a Protection Passive, reducing all incoming damage by 20%. All Protection Passives are removed whenever the Defender is struck by a Striker while the Attacker has a Prowess effect. While the Defender does not have one of these Protection Passives, the Attacker gains 50% of their base Attack Rating.
Whenever the Defender Auto-Blocks, Evades or causes an attack to Miss, their chance to activate Special Attacks increases for 1 second.

For every 10 hits in the Attacker's Combo Meter, the Defender gains a Vex Charge. Intercepting the Defender removes all Vex Charges. When the Defender would be knocked down while they have at least 1 Vex Charge, they consume all Vex Charges to become Passively Unstoppable for 15 second(s), and gain 10% of their Max Power for each Vex Charge consumed.
Science Attackers gain an indefinite Passive Fury increasing Attack Rating by 20% every time they remove a Poison effect or are immune to one. Max Stacks 15.

For every 2 hits in the Defender's Combo Meter, they gain a 5% Vicious Buff for 5 seconds. Max Stack: 5. When the Defender reaches max stacks, all stacks are removed and the Attacker is Passively Rooted for 4 seconds.

For every 2 hits in the Defender's Combo Meter, they gain a 10% Vicious Buff for 5 seconds. Max Stack: 5. When the Defender reaches max stacks, all stacks are removed and the Attacker is Passively Rooted for 4 seconds.

For every 2 hits in the Defender's Combo Meter, they gain a 20% Vicious Buff for 5 seconds. Max Stack: 5. When the Defender reaches max stacks, all stacks are removed and the Attacker is Passively Rooted for 4 seconds.
Every 15 seconds after the start of the fight, the Defender Regenerates 50% of Base Health over 5 seconds. The timer refreshes when the Defender reaches intervals of 25% missing Health.
While the Defender has a Regen Buff active they gain +65% attack rating and their attacks become Unblockable.
Villains in this arena periodically gain Cruelty, increasing Critical Damage by 250% for 7 seconds.

Lane Killer Cross-Fight: Each time the Attacker Purifies a Debuff they gain a Steadfast Charge, these charges let the Attacker block Unblockable and Heavy Attacks at the cost of 1 charge each. The effects of this node lasts for this fight and the next 3 Fights.
When the Defender strikes the Attacker's Block, the Defender regenerates 250% of damage dealt.
When the Defender strikes the Attacker's Block, the Defender regenerates 500% of damage dealt.
When the Defender strikes the Attacker's Block, the Defender regenerates 700% of damage dealt.
Whichever Champion starts the fight with a greater percentage of their total Health gains a percent Attack bonus equal to the difference between their Health Percentage, and their Opponent's.
The Defender gains 100% Defensive Combat Power Rate and is Immune to Power Drain, Power Steal and Power Burn.
The Defender gains 200% Defensive Combat Power Rate and is Immune to Power Drain, Power Steal and Power Burn.
Starts the fight with 3 of his Indestructible and Unstoppable Charges.
While in Karolina’s sun, the Attacker is inflicted with an Incinerate Debuff every 1.5 seconds, each dealing 5% of the Defender's Attack as Energy Damage over 6 seconds.
This Defender has 100% Block Proficiency and is exceptionally defensive.
A third Special Attack has been activated!

When the Attacker purifies a Debuff, the Defender gains a Fury Passive increasing their Attack by 25% for 12 second(s). If the Attacker intercepts the Defender, all Fury Passives are removed and the Defender is afflicted with a Degeneration Debuff dealing 100% of the Attacker's Attack Rating for each Fury removed, over 6 second(s).

Whenever the Defender's Buffs are removed due to Attacker's abilities, they gain a Falter Charge. Whenever they Attack, a Charge is converted into a 0.5 second Falter Passive. Upon reaching 6+ Charges, they are all removed to make the Defender Immune to Pulverize, Armor Break, Buff Immunity, Destroy, Nullify, Stagger, and Fate Seal for 10 seconds.

Whenever the Defender's Buffs are removed due to Attacker's abilities, they gain a Falter Charge. Whenever they Attack, a Charge is converted into a 0.5 second Falter Passive. Upon reaching 5+ Charges, they are all removed to make the Defender Immune to Pulverize, Armor Break, Buff Immunity, Destroy, Nullify, Stagger, and Fate Seal for 10 seconds.

Whenever the Defender's Buffs are removed due to Attacker's abilities, they gain a Falter Charge. Whenever they Attack, a Charge is converted into a 0.5 second Falter Passive. Upon reaching 4+ Charges, they are all removed to make the Defender Immune to Pulverize, Armor Break, Buff Immunity, Destroy, Nullify, Stagger, and Fate Seal for 10 seconds.
Every 15 seconds, the Defender alternates between being more aggressive and being more defensive.
At the start of the fight, the Attacker is inflicted with a 200% Spectre Debuff for 10 seconds. Once it expires, it goes on cooldown for 10 seconds and then repeats.
The Defender's Ability Accuracy cannot be reduced. Hitting the Defender with a Heavy Attack disables this effect for 10 seconds.
The Defender's Ability Accuracy cannot be reduced. Intercepting the Defender disables this effect for 10 seconds.
Whenever the Attacker Nullifies a Buff on the Defender, the Attacker has a 100% chance of Purifying all Debuffs.

column1: We Should All Have This Power Anyway
column2: This doesn't make sense. Why don't all my copies have the same abilities as me!? Grant Attacking Deadpool (X-Force), Goldpool, Platinumpool, Gwenpool, Venompool, or Masacre permanent Passive Regeneration of 120% of their Max Health per minute, scaling with their Power.
The Attacker is inflicted with a permanent Passive Weakness reducing their Attack Rating by 30%. This Weakness is removed while the Defender is suffering from a Non-Damaging Debuff.

Gain a 50% chance to Glance incoming hits and a 150% chance to Glance blocked hits. When glancing, gain an indefinite 5% Fury Passive, additionally, gaining a Bar of Power doubles these Passives. Max 30.
When striking or hitting into block, inflict an 50% Armor Break Debuff per non-Damaging Debuff on the Opponent for 10 seconds. Max 5.

When inflicting an Armor Break Debuff while the Opponent has an Armor Up effect, or when striking the Opponent or their Block while they are suffering from an Armor Break Debuff, inflict a Poison Passive dealing 150% of Attack over 12 seconds.
When inflicting a non-Damaging Debuff, gain a 25% Fury Passive for 10 seconds. While this Fury is active, become Immune to Nullify, Stagger, and Armor Break effects.

When landing a Critical Hit, including through Block, inflicts a Stagger Debuff for 10 seconds. When a Stagger triggers, the Opponent takes a burst of direct Damage equal to 200% of the Champion's Attack.
When inflicting a Power Burn or Power Drain effect, also inflict a 50% Rupture Passive for 12 seconds. If these effects reduce the Opponent's Power below any Bar of Power, inflict 4 more Ruptures.
After finishing a Special Attack, regain 40% of the Power spent, increased by a flat 10% per Unique Buff on the Opponent.
While charging a Heavy Attack, gain 3 indefinite 10% Energize Buffs every second. Max 10. Being knocked down removes these Energize Buffs.
When inflicting a Debuff, gain an indefinite 25% Prowess Passive. Whenever a Debuff is Purified, gain another Prowess.

When performing a Dash or charging a Heavy Attack, gain a non-stacking Unstoppable Passive for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 7 seconds. Activating a Special Attack while this Unstoppable is active pauses it, and grants a 500% Fury and Unblockable Passives for the duration of the Special.
When hitting into Block or Blocking a hit, gain a +1,000 Pierce Passive for 15 seconds. While this Pierce Passive is active, gain 10% Max Power when hitting into Block or Blocking a hit.

When striking the Opponent or their block, inflict a 100% Shock Passive for 15 seconds. The potency and duration increases by a flat 150% and 5 seconds, respectively, for each level of the Special Attack.

When hitting into Block or Blocking a hit, the Opponent gains a Placebo Buff for 20 seconds. Activating a Special Attack inflicts a 15 seconds Soul Barb Pasive with 15% of potency per level of the Special Attack.

When Blocking or Evading an Attack, inflict a 50% Incinerate Passive dealing for 10 seconds. The potency and duration increases by a flat 100% and 5 seconds, respectively, per unique Buff on themselves.

When activating a Special Attack, inflict a non-stacking 150% Power Sting Passive for 15 seconds. The potency and duration increases by 200% and 2 seconds, respectvely, per Prowess effect on themselves. Max 2000%.

When performing a Dash or Dodge, gain a non-stacking True Strike Passive for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 9 seconds. Activating a Special Attack while this True Strike is active pauses it, and grants a 500% Fury and Unblockable Passives for the duration of the Special.
When making contact with the Opponent, there is a 20% chance to inflict an indefinite 50% Trauma Debuff. All Traumas are removed when finishing a Special Attack.
For each Buff on the Champion, their Opponent suffers from a 30% Disorient Passive.
When activating a Special Attack, inflict a Heal Block Passive for 15 seconds. While the Opponent is Heal Blocked, they suffer from a 200% Physical Vulnerability Passive.
When landing a Critical Hit, including through Block, inflict a 5% Critical Coldsnap Passive for 12 seconds, dealing increased damage based on the Critical Damage Rating.
When hitting the Opponent or their Block, gain a 50% Cruelty Passive per Armor Up on themselves, for 15 seconds. This Cruelty grants Guaranteed Critical Hits that can be inflicted through block.
When Blocking an Attack, there is a 50% chance to inflict a Power Burn Debuff burning 50% of a Power Bar over 6 seconds. This chance increases to 100% on Well-Timed Block and Auto-Block.

When hitting into Block or Blocking a hit, inflict a non-stacking Power Lock Passive for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 9 seconds. When the Opponent would gain Power while Power Locked, they are inflicted with a 50% Fragility Passive for 12 seconds.

When a Buff on the Opponent is removed for any reason other than expiry, they are inflicted with a 150% Bleed Passive for 10 seconds. If a Buff was prevented due to Ability Accuracy, inflicts 3 Bleeds instead.
When the Attacker performs 3 Well-Timed Blocks, both Champions gain Disintegration Immunity for 20 seconds.
When the Attacker performs 3 Well-Timed Blocks, both Champions gain Disintegration Immunity for 15 seconds.
When the Attacker performs 3 Well-Timed Blocks, both Champions gain Disintegration Immunity for 10 seconds.
When the Attacker performs 3 Well-Timed Blocks, both Champions gain Plasma Immunity for 20 seconds.
When the Attacker performs 3 Well-Timed Blocks, both Champions gain Plasma Immunity for 15 seconds.
When the Attacker performs 3 Well-Timed Blocks, both Champions gain Plasma Immunity for 10 seconds.
Guillotine's Soul Charges never expire, and new Souls join her cause throughout the fight.
When the Attacker performs 3 Well-Timed Blocks, both Champions gain Neuroshock Immunity for 20 seconds.
When the Attacker performs 3 Well-Timed Blocks, both Champions gain Neuroshock Immunity for 15 seconds.
When the Attacker performs 3 Well-Timed Blocks, both Champions gain Neuroshock Immunity for 10 seconds.

Whenever the Defender has a Weakness Debuff applied to them, a Fury Buff with 60% of the Weakness' potency is given to the Attacker for 5 seconds. While the Attacker does not have a Fury Buff from this effect, the Attacker deals 75% less damage to the Defender.

Whenever the Defender is struck while their back is against the wall, the Attacker gains an indefinite Prowess Buff increasing their Special Attack damage by 20%. Max 10 stacks. These Prowesses are consumed on Special Attack activation. The Defender's Defensive Combat Power Rate is increased by 5% for each active Prowess on the Attacker up to 50%.
Each time the Attacker is inflicted with a Non-Damaging Debuff, the Defender gains a Fury Buff granting 120% Attack Rating for 6 seconds. This Fury effect does not stack multiple times.
Each time the Attacker is inflicted with a Non-Damaging Debuff, the Defender gains a Fury Buff granting 240% Attack Rating for 8 seconds. This Fury effect does not stack multiple times.
Each time the Attacker is inflicted with a Non-Damaging Debuff, the Defender gains a Fury Buff granting 480% Attack Rating for 10 seconds. This Fury effect does not stack multiple times.

This Defender takes 60% less damage while they have no Debuffs applied to them. For each Debuff on the Defender, this damage reduction is decreased by 20% until it reaches 0%. These Debuffs can be of the same type.
All of Moon Knight’s passive abilities are activated, regardless of the current lunar phase.

Every 16 seconds the Defender gains a Protection Passive, reducing all incoming damage by 20%. All Protection Passives are removed whenever the Defender is struck by a Striker while they are inflicted with a Petrify, Wither or Suppression effect. While the Defender does not have one of these Protection Passives, the Attacker gains 50% of their base Attack Rating.

Every 14 seconds the Defender gains a Protection Passive, reducing all incoming damage by 20%. All Protection Passives are removed whenever the Defender is struck by a Striker while they are inflicted with a Petrify, Wither or Suppression effect. While the Defender does not have one of these Protection Passives, the Attacker gains 50% of their base Attack Rating.

Every 12 seconds the Defender gains a Protection Passive, reducing all incoming damage by 20%. All Protection Passives are removed whenever the Defender is struck by a Striker while they are inflicted with a Petrify, Wither or Suppression effect. While the Defender does not have one of these Protection Passives, the Attacker gains 50% of their base Attack Rating.
Each time the Defender is knocked down, the Defender suffers an Armor Break Debuff, decreasing their Armor Rating by 50 for 3 seconds.
Each time the Defender is knocked down, the Defender suffers an Armor Break Debuff, decreasing their Armor Rating by 50 for 5 seconds.
Each time the Defender is knocked down, the Defender suffers an Armor Break Debuff, decreasing their Armor Rating by 50 for 7 seconds.

The Defender starts the fight Stun Immune. Whenever they would be Stunned, the Attacker is instead Stunned for 4 second(s). The Immunity lasts for 12 second(s), then goes on cooldown for 12 second(s) before returning. When the Immunity returns, it Passively Purifies all Stun Debuffs on the Defender, then they are removed by the Immunity.
While Taunted, the Defender's Ability Power Rate is reduced by 50%.
While Taunted, the Defender's Ability Power Rate is reduced by 30%.
While Taunted, the Defender's Ability Power Rate is reduced by 10%.

Orochi gains Immunity to Power Burn and Drain, and her Special Attacks cost 30% less Power. In Phases 1 to 5, when the Attacker performs an attack within striking distance during or immediately after Orochi’s Special Attacks, she loses 30% of a Bar of Power. In Phase 6, she starts at and can exceed 2 Bars of Power.

Whenever the Defender activates a Special Attack, the Attacker's Combo Meter is consumed and reset to zero. For each Hit in the Combo Meter consumed, the Defender gains a Passive Prowess, increasing Special Attack by 20% for 8 seconds. Max 30. If the Defender is knocked down while these Prowess are active, they are consumed and deal the Defender Direct Damage equal to 10% of the Attacker's Attack per Prowess consumed.
When struck by a Heavy Hit Nova gains 25 Nova Charges.
Whenever Nova's Power is Drained, Locked, Burned, or Stolen, generate 25 Nova Charges.
Whenever the Defender's Regeneration Buffs or Passives are removed or prevented from triggering by the Attacker's abilities, the Attacker loses 10% of their Max Health.
Whenever the Defender's Regeneration Buffs or Passives are removed or prevented from triggering by the Attacker's abilities, the Attacker loses 20% of their Max Health.
Whenever the Defender's Regeneration Buffs or Passives are removed or prevented from triggering by the Attacker's abilities, the Attacker loses 30% of their Max Health.
Whenever the Defender's Regeneration Buffs or Passives are removed or prevented from triggering by the Attacker's abilities, the Attacker loses 50% of their Max Health.

If the Defender has the #Wrath tag, every 7 seconds, the Attacker is inflicted with 1 Rage Debuff lasting for 30 seconds. If the Attacker gains 9 Non-Damaging Debuffs, the Defender gains an Unstoppable Passive for 7 Seconds, unaffected by Ability Accuracy. The Defender cannot gain an Unstoppable Passive if one is already active, and goes on cooldown for 5 seconds if this Unstoppable Passive ends.

If the Defender has the #Wrath tag, every 7 seconds, the Attacker is inflicted with 1 Rage Debuff lasting for 30 seconds. If the Attacker gains 7 Non-Damaging Debuffs, the Defender gains an Unstoppable Passive for 7 Seconds, unaffected by Ability Accuracy. The Defender cannot gain an Unstoppable Passive if one is already active, and goes on cooldown for 5 seconds if this Unstoppable Passive ends.

If the Defender has the #Wrath tag, every 7 seconds, the Attacker is inflicted with 1 Rage Debuff lasting for 30 seconds. If the Attacker gains 5 Non-Damaging Debuffs, the Defender gains an Unstoppable Passive for 7 Seconds, unaffected by Ability Accuracy. The Defender cannot gain an Unstoppable Passive if one is already active, and goes on cooldown for 5 seconds if this Unstoppable Passive ends.

For every 10 hits on their Combo Meter, the Attacker gains an indefinite 350 potency Energy Resistance Buff. When the Attacker loses their Combo due to being struck, they lose all Energy Resist Buffs and take 40% of the Defender's Attack as Direct Damage for each Energy Resist Buff removed this way. If these Buffs fail due to Immunity or Ability Accuracy reduction, the Attacker takes twice as much Direct Damage instead.

Based on the number of #X-Men tagged champions on your team, #X-Men Attackers gain the following benefits when the opponent is knocked down. These effects all last for 10 seconds per #X-Men on your team: 1 #X-Men: Gain a Vigilance Passive. 2 #X-Men: Gain a True Accuracy Passive. 3 #X-Men: #X-Men tagged champions can Block Unblockable Special Attacks.

All #X-Men tagged Attackers gain a 100% chance to gain a 1 second Unblockable Passive when launching a Special Attack. If this champions Special Attack Breaks the opponents Block gain a Passive Fury granting +1,500 Attack for 10 seconds.
All Champion classes but Mutant reduce their Base Attack by 50%.

If the Attacker has the #X-Magica tag, performing a Well-Timed Block or striking the Opponent's Block with a Light Attack grants them an indefinite 0% Prowess Passive. Max stacks: 0. Each of these Prowess reduces the Defender's Purify Ability Accuracy by 0%. Each of these Prowess also reduces the Defender's Ability Power Rate by 0%, to a maximum reduction of 100%. When a #Magic Thief Defender activates a non-instant Indestructible effect while the Attacker has a tactic Prowess or vice versa, one of each effect is instantly removed. These effects cannot be affected by Ability Accuracy.
Whenever a Mutant Attacker activates a Striker, they gain an indefinite Prowess Passive increasing Special Attack by 200%. These Prowesses are consumed at the end of an Attackers Special.
Whenever a Mutant Attacker activates a Striker, they gain an indefinite Prowess Passive increasing Special Attack by 150%. These Prowesses are consumed at the end of an Attackers Special.
Whenever a Mutant Attacker activates a Striker, they gain an indefinite Prowess Passive increasing Special Attack by 100%. These Prowesses are consumed at the end of an Attackers Special.
Whenever a Mutant Attacker activates a Striker, they gain a non-stacking 30% Energize Passive for 10 seconds. Striking the Defender with the first hit of a Heavy Attack refreshes this Energize.
Whenever a Mutant Attacker activates a Striker, they gain a non-stacking 30% Energize Passive for 12 seconds. Striking the Defender with the first hit of a Heavy Attack refreshes this Energize.
Whenever a Mutant Attacker activates a Striker, they gain a non-stacking 30% Energize Passive for 14 seconds. Striking the Defender with the first hit of a Heavy Attack refreshes this Energize.

The final hit of the Defender's Special Attacks inflicts an Imminent Death that Knocks Out the Attacker after 5 seconds and cannot be prevented by any means. Intercepting the Defender safely removes Imminent Death.

The final hit of the Defender's Special Attacks inflicts an Imminent Death that Knocks Out the Attacker after 6 seconds and cannot be prevented by any means. Intercepting the Defender safely removes Imminent Death.

The final hit of the Defender's Special Attacks inflicts an Imminent Death that Knocks Out the Attacker after 7 seconds and cannot be prevented by any means. Intercepting the Defender safely removes Imminent Death.

The final hit of the Defender's Special Attacks inflicts an Imminent Death that Knocks Out the Attacker after 6 seconds and cannot be prevented by any means. Knocking down the Defender safely removes Imminent Death.

The final hit of the Defender's Special Attacks inflicts an Imminent Death that Knocks Out the Attacker after 7 seconds and cannot be prevented by any means. Knocking down the Defender safely removes Imminent Death.

When the Attacker performs a Well-Timed Block they gain a Falter Charge. Striking the Defender's Block removes 1 Falter Charge. When the Attacker reaches 3 Falter Charges they are all consumed and the Attacker is inflicted with a Falter Passive for 7 seconds.

When the Attacker performs a Well-Timed Block they gain a Falter Charge. Striking the Defender's Block removes 1 Falter Charge. When the Attacker reaches 4 Falter Charges they are all consumed and the Attacker is inflicted with a Falter Passive for 7 seconds.

When the Attacker performs a Well-Timed Block they gain a Falter Charge. Striking the Defender's Block removes 1 Falter Charge. When the Attacker reaches 5 Falter Charges they are all consumed and the Attacker is inflicted with a Falter Passive for 7 seconds.
Defeating this Defender grants the Attacker a permanent "You Shall Not Cast" Cross-Fight Ability. "You Shall Not Cast" grants Power Steal to the Attacker's Heavy and Special Attacks.
The Defender can block Unblockable Attacks, and cannot be inflicted with Crush effects. The Attacker cannot gain Undermine or Trample effects.
The Defending Spiral fires her Dancing Blades when activating a Special Attack.

column1: You're Trapped in Here With Me
column2: If both Champions are inside an Effect Area when the Attacker activates a Special Attack or Striker, the Defender is Passively Rooted until the end of the Special Attack or Striker.
Every 20 seconds the Defender Steals 10% of the Attacker's Max Power. This timer is paused during the Defender's Special Attacks, and refreshed when the Defender is struck by a Heavy Attack.
Every 15 seconds the Defender Steals 10% of the Attacker's Max Power. This timer is paused during the Defender's Special Attacks, and refreshed when the Defender is struck by a Heavy Attack.
Every 10 seconds the Defender Steals 10% of the Attacker's Max Power. This timer is paused during the Defender's Special Attacks, and refreshed when the Defender is struck by a Heavy Attack.
Every 20 seconds the Defender Steals 10% of the Attacker's Max Power. This timer is paused during the Defender's Special Attacks, and refreshed when the Defender is Intercepted.
Every 15 seconds the Defender Steals 10% of the Attacker's Max Power. This timer is paused during the Defender's Special Attacks, and refreshed when the Defender is Intercepted.
Every 10 seconds the Defender Steals 10% of the Attacker's Max Power. This timer is paused during the Defender's Special Attacks, and refreshed when the Defender is Intercepted.
When the Attacker Dodges back, they are inflicted with a Shock Debuff dealing 10% of the Defender's Attack Rating as Energy Damage over 6 seconds.
When the Attacker Dodges back, they are inflicted with a Shock Debuff dealing 25% of the Defender's Attack Rating as Energy Damage over 6 seconds.
When the Attacker Dodges back, they are inflicted with a Shock Debuff dealing 50% of the Defender's Attack Rating as Energy Damage over 6 seconds.
Every 15 seconds the Defender gains an Indestructible Buff and an Unblockable Buff for 5 seconds. These Buffs are paused indefinitely unless the Attacker is close to the Defender.
